Fall in love with our match.com dating app. Download now to browse single members and stay in touch with your matches on the move. match.com has thousands of members for you to meet, browse and chat with and we are committed to giving our users the best possible online mobile dating experience. match.com is the UK's best known dating site and offers more ways to meet singles, browse members and find love. Our advanced search features allow you to filter matches by location, appearance, interests and personality traits. So whether you have a picture of your perfect date in mind or fancy meeting someone with a different outlook on life, we will help you find love. ----------------------------------- Browse, chat and wink when you’re on the move, find singles to date near you, fall in love and much more! Download it for free and enjoy match.com on your mobile! By downloading the match.com app, you will be able to: • Create a profile or log in with your existing match.com account • Browse other member profiles, chat and view photos • Search for love and chat to singles to date near you • Send winks to other singles • Update your dating profile and upload photos to meet other members • Read and reply to your emails on the move Registration and browsing single profiles is free. To access additional dating features, including reading and sending messages, you will need a match.com subscription. If you have an existing match.com website subscription, simply download the dating app and log-in to access all the features of match.com. If you do not have an existing website subscription, you can subscribe via the match.com app using a credit or debit card. This will give you access to match.com on any device. Our customer care team are available for help and advice: http://www.uk.match.com/help/contact_ex_faq_v.php match.com is a part of the Match Group, which also owns OKCupid, Meetic and Tinder --------------------------------------- Example subscription prices include: 1 month subscription for £29.99 per month 3 month subscription for £19.99 per month (charged in a single payment of £59.97) 6 month subscription for £12.99 per month (charged in a single payment of £77.94) You can also choose our simple instalment plan by following the instructions on the match.com app. Please note that subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. You can switch off the automatic renewal of your match.com subscription no later than 48 hours before your next subscription payment is due by logging into the match.com website with your username and password and following the instructions on your “My Account page”. Note: When using 3G users are advised to disable ‘Content control’ to launch the app and experience the full functionality. Pursuant to The Consumer Contracts (Information, Cancellation and Additional Payments) Regulations 2013, you have the right to cancel your contract for the Services within fourteen days from the date of placing your order. For further information go to our website www.match.com

MIX is the most creative and comprehensive DIY photo editing app, created by the PC Award Winning developer of Camera360 and HelloCamera. “MIX is the app for you if you often feel like Goldilocks when confronted with the filters in other photo-editing apps.” - TechCrunch “Seamless to learn and use. Performance was flawless.” - The Next Web Also featured on Guardian, Tech in Asia… FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS: # Design and save your own photo formulas # dSLR-like Depth of Field experience # State of the art bokeh blurring # Advanced selective color adjustment # Non-linear & non-destructive workflow # 115 Handpicked filters # 40+ Original textures, including flare, stage, and light leaks # 10+ Professional adjustment tools # Fast multi-layer processing # Easy sharing to Instagram MIX by Camera360 enables you to transform your photos in almost every way imaginable on-the-go. Packed with close to 200 filters, dSLR-like blurring effects, textures, light leaks and other professional adjustment tools, MIX is like photo editing in Manual Mode, it gives you unprecedented control over every aspect in your composition. Are you a Vintage, Foodie, or Lomo fanatic? What does your photo editing say about you? MIX by Camera360 enables you to design your own signature effects. Not only can you customize your photos, you can save your creative photo editing experience for future use. With MIX, you can now design that perfect vintage film look you couldn’t find anywhere else! MIX’s non-linear editing architecture and non-destructive workflow empowers but also simplifies the creative process of designing complex photo filters. MIX by Camera360 will be populated with adjustable formulas created by photographers and digital artists from around the world. No longer will you be limited to choosing photo presets produced by others, you can now design your own signature filters and get featured in MIX and Camera360. With its intuitive UI and streamlined workflow, MIX by Camera360 is user friendly for any skill level. Whether you’re a photo enthusiast, designer, or a professional photographer, MIX gives you complete control over every aspect in your composition. Make your photos stand out with unique filters designed in MIX! Download now! Your photo editing is all mixable, all adjustable, all savable, and all FREE! To learn more, check out our website http://mix.camera360.com . Have questions or suggestions? Please contact us at support@mix4ins.com . You can also contact us via Facebook and Instagram by searching MIX(mix4ins)

description: Learn Norwegian! - "Norwegian 50 languages" (www.50languages.com) contains 100 lessons that provide you with a basic vocabulary. This free app has 30 lessons. With no prior knowledge, you will learn to fluently speak short sentences in real-world situations in no time. The 50languages method successfully combines audio and text for effective language learning. 50languages corresponds to the Common European Framework levels A1 and A2 and is therefore suitable for all types of schools and students. The audio files can also be effectively used as a supplement in language schools and language courses. Adults who have learned a language in school can refresh their knowledge using 50languages. 50languages is available in over 40 languages and in approximately 1600 language combinations, e.g. German to English, English to Spanish, Spanish to Chinese etc. The 100 lessons help you to quickly learn and use a foreign language in various situations (e.g. in a hotel or restaurant, on a vacation, small talk, getting to know people, shopping, at the doctor, at the bank etc.). You can download the audio files from www.50languages.com to your mp3-player and listen to them anywhere - at a bus stop or a train station, in the car, and during a lunch break! To get the most out of 50languages, learn one lesson a day and regularly repeat what you have already learned in previous lessons.
release_text: New language Tigrinya added. Bugs fixed.

**ATTENTION** Installation problems? Please read below. What is a doo-dad? A doo-dad is a widget that sole purpose is to add a little bling to your screen without having to change your background or theme. Do you have the perfect wallpaper or theme but it is missing some little something to set it off? That's where doo-dads come in. Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery. To Install: 1. Purchase, download and install 2. Go to blank area on home screen and long hold (press and hold) 3. When menu comes up select Widgets 4. Look for the doo-dad you installed and select it Your doo-dad should appear on the screen. If you would like to move it around just press and long hold until you see the doo-dad increase in size then move it to where you want it. Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad! Enjoy! keywords: tribal, heart

description: The earliest known references to the Knight's Tour problem date back to the 9th century. The Knight's Tour is a mathematical problem involving a knight on a chessboard. The knight is placed on the empty board and, moving according to the rules of chess, must visit each square exactly once.

Only few wise men of the past fully understood what is the barrier between the "now" and "then", how to break it in the dream realm and - - how to do it safely. Take this spiritual journey to forgotten places and times... and to those that are yet to come. Learn the true nature of space and time. Just don't forget to set your dreamcatcher to protect you from the traps of your own mind! Play the STORY MODE, with 15 original hidden object scenes! Complete all of the hidden object challenges, as finding the items grants you a way to the next scene in the mysterious dreamland. The truth unveils slowly, with each comment from the ancient sage. Play the ARCADE MODE in a difficulty level of your choice: - CASUAL - No time limit and quick hint. All modes available for each unlocked level! - NORMAL - Time limit and slower hint. Each use of hint costs 2 seconds. Only those modes you've played in the previous level are available in the next one. - EXPERT - Bonus mode for those who got all stars on all levels in either CASUAL or NORMAL mode. NEW!!! Each scene can be completed in FOUR search modes: - By PICTURE - By WORD - By SILHOUETTE - By ANAGRAM Each search mode has its own set of items! Complete each of them on the scene to get three stars! Go back to previous levels to get a better score and unlock the next section! Features: - clever fun to solve hidden object scenes - item search by word or by pictures, by anagrams and by silhouette - inspiring artwork in realistic, breathtaking locations - difficulty levels and unlockable content

description: iTooch Anglais 5ème est une application de soutien scolaire ludique, conçue par des enseignants, qui couvre le programme scolaire officiel d'anglais en 5ème. Utilisées par plus de 5.000.000 de personnes dans 146 pays, les applications iTooch sont nées de la rencontre d'enseignants passionnés, de pédagogues et de professionnels du jeu vidéo, eux-mêmes parents. L'union de ces savoir-faire a permis d’offrir aux enfants un merveilleux complément scolaire qui leur donne envie d’apprendre et qui leur permet de s’entrainer sur tout le programme officiel de leur classe. ♖ FONCTIONNALITES ♖ • Une interface simple, claire et ludique • Une gestion multi-joueurs permettant la sauvegarde des scores de plusieurs enfants sur un même smartphone ou tablette • Réglage de la taille des textes • Tableau virtuel et calculatrice intégrés • Mode déconnecté disponible pour profiter de nos applications même sans connexion Internet • Synchronisation automatique des contenus • Des résumés de cours qui reprennent les notions fondamentales à connaître par les élèves • Des power ups spécialement conçus pour motiver et donner petit un coup de pouce ! ★ App sélectionnée dans les tops du guide Les meilleures applications pour enfants 2015 - par la Souris Grise ★ ♫ TEMOIGNAGES DE PARENTS ♫ ‣ "L’application pour réviser ou se remettre à niveau – Enfin une application ludique où mon fils peut apprendre et améliorer ses notes, il y a plein d’exercices, un résumé du cours, un grand bravo pour cette application." ‣ " Mon fils est en 5ème, cela lui permet de faire d’autres exercices (correspondant exactement au programme) que les 3-4 proposés sur son livre. Chacun d’entre eux éprouve le besoin de travailler des points différents. La tablette leur permet de définir leur progression personnelle et de travailler à leur rythme. Ils peuvent me solliciter à la moindre difficulté ou incompréhension, ce qui rend – à mon sens – la séance nettement plus productive." ‣ "En plus des séances individuelles, j’utilise iTooch en classe entière en vidéo-projection et les élèves “accrochent” vraiment. Used by more than 5,000,000 people in 146 countries, iTooch applications were born from the meeting of passionate teachers, educationalists and video game professionals, themselves parents. The union of these skills allowed to offer children a wonderful learning tool that desire to learn and that allows them to train them on all the official program of their class. ♖ FEATURES ♖ • A simple, clear and fun interface • A multiplayer for saving scores of several children in a single smartphone or tablet management • Adjust text size • Virtual Table and integrated calculator • Offline Mode available to enjoy our applications even without an Internet connection • Automatic synchronization of content • Courses summaries that reflect the fundamentals to know by students • The specially designed power ups to motivate and give a little boost! ★ App featured in the tops of the guide The best applications for children 2015 - by Grey Mouse ★ ♫ ♫ PARENTS OF TESTIMONY ‣ "The application for review or to upgrade. - Finally a fun application where my son can learn and improve his grades, there are plenty of exercises, a summary of the course, a big applause for this application" ‣ "My son is in 5th, this allows him to do other exercises (corresponding exactly to the program) than the 3-4 offered on his book. Thank you very much. And it's more fun on tablets than on paper. I recommend" ★ WHAT TEACHERS SAY ★ ‣ "This application meets a great success with my students in upgrading. Each of them feel the need to work different points. The tablet allows them to define their personal progress and work at their own pace. " ‣ "In addition to individual sessions, I use iTooch whole class in video projection and students" hang "really. The playful side of work and the animations of the mascot really like. Students with a shelf at home m 'even asked where to buy the app! " The CONTAINS ☀ APPLICATION: ☀ ✓ 4 themes: Daily Life, Food Tastes and clothing, Travel and Culture ✓ 50 chapters per title, with abstract classes, examples and drawings ✓ 1,519 questions per title with clues, detailed answers ➡ iTooch English 5th brings by far the largest database of exercises for college on Google Play. Also find our applications iTooch French 5th and 5th Mathematics iTooch on Google Play. The iTooch applications provide mobile solution for tutoring classes CP, CE1, CE2, CM1, CM2, 6th, 5th, 4th and 3rd in Mathematics, French, English and Physics and Chemistry. *** At the request of many users who want a free application, we offer a free version incorporating advertising. description: Racer X Illustrated is the defining voice of modern motocross and supercross. No other publication in the sport can match its scope, its access, or its insight—or its peerless design and photography. When it first appeared on newsstands in 1998, Racer X was unlike anything the motocross world had seen. Focusing on personalities instead of gear ratios and story lines instead of results lists, it peeled back the curtain just as the sport was exploding into the mainstream. That tradition continues today. The Racer X staff, comprised of veteran reporters and racers alike, consistently delivers a unique blend of breaking news and analysis. Each month, the best journalists in motorsports dive into the sport’s rich history and its booming present to uncover the the personalities and the stories that make motocross one of the most popular action sports on the planet. Future issues are also available through the following auto-renewing subscription(s): -1 issue (1 Month) at $4.99 / £2.99 -12 issues (1 Year) at $9.99 / £6.99 This application is powered by GTxcel, a leader in digital publishing technology, provider of hundreds of online digital publications and mobile magazine apps.

*** This is an add-on dictionary for OfficeSuite *** The leading single-volume English dictionary, the Oxford Dictionary of English is the foremost authority on current English usage. * Offers the most comprehensive coverage of English from around the world * Completely revised and updated to include the very latest vocabulary, with over 350,000 words, phrases, and meanings * Thousands of words and senses derived from the latest research from the Oxford English Corpus, giving the most complete and accurate picture of the English language today * About 75,000 audio pronunciations of both common and rare words, doubled with both British & American voice versions, including words with controversial pronunciation or with variant pronunciations * This edition includes thousands of brand-new words and senses, as well as up-to-date encyclopedic information. Readership: Ideal for anyone who needs a comprehensive and authoritative dictionary of current English; for professionals, students, academics, and for use at work or at home. App features: * Ability to add bookmarks to favorite words * Hyperlinks between different related words * History to see the last 50 words you have looked up * Filters to help you locate the word you are searching for: * Fuzzy filter- used when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word * Keyword-used to locate the instances of a key word within other compound words * Wild card - "?" and "*" replace a letter and group of letters in words * Convenient two pane design for tablets * Fast article scrolling ***** Please note that the dictionary can be used only from OfficeSuite and will not work as a stand-alone application *****

Poll It! allows you to create polls or short surveys and send them to your friends or contacts (poll participants) via SMS. Anyone who has a mobile phone can participate in your poll. Participants will receive a SMS text message. They will reply to the poll by simply typing one of the option codes provided. • Participants with Poll It! app installed on their phone will receive notifications about the poll. They will be able to reply to you from their application with a nice user interface. • You will receive instant notifications when someone replies to your poll. • Set expiry date and time for the polls. Any replies after the poll has expired, will not be accepted. • Participants can change their option selection by sending a different reply while the poll is still open. • Create a new poll by selecting a previous poll! You won’t have to type the same poll again! Question and poll options will be automatically populated. • Create contact groups for your favorite poll participants and select the group instead of individual contacts while selecting participants for the poll. • Close polls before they have expired. • Re-send polls to those participants who have not responded yet. • Announce results to all poll participants via SMS with optional customization. Important Note: • Poll It! is an SMS based application, number of SMS text messages sent is determined by the length of the message and the number of participants you have selected in the poll. • Carrier charges will apply for the number of SMS text messages sent where applicable. • Participants will be charged one SMS text message for each reply where applicable. Poll It! is developed by Andronauts team and sponsored by TEKsystems®. - Jorge Luna - Rashid Jilani - Li Qun Sun (David) - Varun Sood

description: Klondike solitaire is the best classic solitaire game probably most famous patience game around the world that we all seen played around our house and outside while grew up, it was a major hit on windows computers and still one of the most played game on android phones and tablets the game contains Klondike and Double Klondike games The Rules: Taking a shuffled standard 52-card deck of playing cards (without Jokers), one upturned card is dealt on the left of the playing area, then six downturned cards (from left to right). On top of the downturned cards, an upturned card is dealt on the left-most downturned pile, and downturned cards on the rest until all piles have an upturned card. The piles should look like the figure to the right. The four foundations (light rectangles in the upper right of the figure) are built up by suit from Ace (low in this game) to King, and the tableau piles can be built down by alternate colors, and partial or complete piles can be moved if they are built down by alternate colors also. Any empty piles can be filled with a King or a pile of cards with a King. The aim of the game is to build up a stack of cards starting with 2 and ending with King, all of the same suit. Once this is accomplished, the goal is to move this to a foundation, where the player has previously placed the Ace of that suit. Once the player has done this, they will have "finished" that suit, the goal being, of course, to finish all suits, at which time the player would have won. Classic Klondike Solitaire : - Deal one, three cards - Cards auto move - Customize background - Easy undo button ( unlimited moves ) - Quality graphics
release_text: v2.03 - Australian solitaire added v2.00 - Added Double Klondike - Added Deal Animation - Landscape & Portrait Mode - Beautiful Cards

Using PennDOT cams, this app lets you see the traffic ahead on the "Blue Route" (Route 476) outside Philadelphia, PA, USA. Whether you're traveling north from I-95 to Conshohocken or south from Conshy to I-95, Beat 476 will show you the traffic that is PAST the major exits. This way if you see a jam, you can get off the exit and take back roads! No more waiting for the radio to give you news of the world when all you want is the traffic report! See it for yourself!

King Bat has kidnapped the baby birds for their feathers and it’s up to Rupert the parrot to bring them back, in this brain-teasing classic! ** Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0) fixed! ** Drag a length of rope through a series of gears, and attach it to the cage to release your friends. Pesky enemies, fire, and other rope-wrecking obstacles threaten feathered freedom. Collect butterflies on the way for special bonuses, and try use as little rope as possible for maximum points. - Puzzling levels will keep you wrapped up for hours. - Addictive gameplay with multiple solutions for each level will have you playing for hours. - Avoid flying knives, fire cannons and of course the evil bats. - Collect or purchase butterflies to unlock later levels or provide hints to help you on your adventure. - Visit the bird sanctuary to see the cute baby birds you have rescued. - Unlock brain-twisting extra chapter "Infinity Hall" when all feathers and butterflies are collected!

description: C++ made Easy! Now C++ learning tutorial in your hand, no need to carry textbook for C++ programming language. This application will explore the whole concept of C++ language. It is very simple to use. An application that empowers its users to learn the basics and clear the fundamentals of one of the most popular programming language “The C++ language”. The purpose of this tutorial is to give a good understanding of the programming language C++. Learn C++ right over your Android phone or tablet with this great app. This FREE app was made for the learner's convenience and is a supplement to schools, teachers and students who like to use their Android devices to learn. Chapter wise categorization of contents is given in this app. This app covers all the basic fundamentals of C++ and plays a vital role in mastering C++ language. Detailed elaboration of each topic helps students to understand every aspect of C++ language and gain sound knowledge of programming in C++ language. C++ is regarded as an intermediate-level language, as it comprises a combination of both high-level and low-level language features. It was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup starting in 1979 at Bell Labs as an enhancement to the C language. Originally named C with Classes, the language was renamed C++ in 1983. C++ has greatly influenced many other popular programming languages, most notably C# and Java. The language began as enhancement to C, first adding classes, then virtual functions, operator overloading, multiple inheritance, templates, and exception handling among other features. After years of development, the C++ programming language standard was ratified in 1998 as ISO/IEC 14882:1998. The standard was modified by the 2003, ISO/IEC 14882:2003. The current standard extending C++ with new features was ratified and published by ISO in September 2011 as ISO/IEC 14882:2011 (informally known as C++11). Contents: 1. Introducing to the C++ Language. 2. Classes and Objects. 3. Arrays, Pointers, References and the Dynamic Allocation Operators. 4. Function Overloading, Copy Constructors and Default. 5. Overloading, Operator Overloading. 6. Inheritance 7. Polymorphism and Virtual function 8. Template 9. Exception Handling. This app comes as a blessing for the students of B.E (computers/IT), B.C.A., B.Sc.(computers) and all others for whom learning C++ is a real challenge. Keywords: C, C++, Cpp, C plus plus, C++ language, Cpp language, C plus plus language, C++ basics.

"Pretty cool game..." --- GAME DESCRIPTION --- Winter is coming and Crazy Hamster forgot to store his supplies! His only hope now is to visit different lands and collect foodstuffs before it's too late. Unfortunately, Crazy Hamster is so crazy that his one-track mind sees nothing but the goodies, despite the fact that the lands he must visit are teeming with traps and obstacles! It's up to you to keep Crazy Hamster out of harm's way by building bridges, extinguishing fires and using ladders. Succeed and he'll get through winter with plenty of food in his belly – fail, and we might be witnessing the debut of "Hamsters on Ice". Whoa, there he goes -- Crazy Hamster is off and running! Quick, after him! There's no time to lose! FEATURES - Simple, but addictive game play - Funny and cute animations and sound effects - different worlds, each with several levels - different selectable items Game is optimized for 480x800 and higher resolutions. description: 観賞魚として流通する淡水熱帯魚500種を収録した、便利な図鑑アプリケーションです。 ■本アプリは2009年12月発売の「月刊アクアライフNo.433」の情報に加筆修正の更新を加え、スマートフォン向けとして再構築したものです。 ■掲載している魚は、大きく分けて 「カラシン」「コイ」「メダカ」「シクリッド」「ベタ・グーラミィ・スネークヘッドの仲間」 「ナマズの仲間」「古代魚の仲間」「汽水魚、その他の魚」「シュリンプ」「日本産淡水魚」 の10種類。 ■「索引(50音別/学名)」、「仲間別に探す」、「名前を入力して検索」の中から、ニーズに合わせて魚を検索する事ができます。 ■「初心者でも安心!オススメの30種」では、編集部がセレクトしたビギナー向けの魚を掲載。 ■すべての魚に「主に食べる餌」「飼育難易度」を掲載。初心者の方にもお勧めできる内容となっています。 ■その他、サブコンテンツとして下記の4点を収録しています。 魚の写真を楽しむのに便利な「フォトギャラリー」 水草、病気を紹介する「ミニ水草図鑑12」「病気についての基礎知識」 実際の水槽写真と環境を例にした「飼育環境例」

description: iPaciência has a simple and intuitive interface with a smart gameplay that provides a dynamic game experience even in portable devices Main characteristics: - Larger and optimized cards easier to be seen and clicked - Ability to restart the same game - Card moving Sound - Animations Some features: - Autosave - Deal 1 or 3 letters - Drag and Drop - Auto move (just touch the card and it will go to the available spot) - Infinite undo steps - The interface adapts for left handed (just rotate the device) - Four back cards - Stats - Animations - Score - Time - Shortcuts: --- Double click the screen to undo --- Click with two fingers to finish the game. Descrição em português: O jogo de paciência mais baixado do Brasil! Um clássico agora disponível para Android. A iPaciência possui uma interface simples e intuitiva e uma jogabilidade que permite ao usuário um jogo extremamente dinâmico mesmo em dispositivos móveis. Principais características: - Cartas maiores e com espaço otimizado para sempre serem vistas e clicadas; - A interface se adapta para destros e canhotos (basta girar o dispositivo); - Dica (as cartas "pulam" quando podem ser movimentadas); - Possibilidade de reinício do mesmo jogo; - Sons das cartas se movendo; - Animações. Algumas funcionalidades: - Salvamento automático do jogo; - Virar 1 ou 3 cartas; - Drag and Drop; - Movimentação automática das cartas; - Desfazer com passos infinitos; - Opções de desenho para a carta; - Estatísticas; - Animações; - Pontuação; - Tempo; - Atalhos: --- duplo clique na tela para desfazer --- clicar com dois dedos para enviar as cartas para as fundações. A paciência é um jogo de cartas clássico que estimula o raciocínio e proporciona muita diversão. Com a paciência da Quadrimind você poderá jogar este clássico jogo em seu dispositivo móvel em qualquer lugar. A iPaciência é um jogo de paciência Klondike, que é o tipo mais tradicional e clássico dos jogos de paciência. As cartas são distribuídas no formato clássico com 7 pilhas superiores, uma área de descarte para cada naipe e um estoque de cartas.

app_name: The Inhabitant Lost in the Sea
description: - prologue – A villa with a breathtaking view of the Mediterranean Sea. It's cheap, but nobody seems to want it. Maybe it has some kind of shady background story. The hero of this story went to see the villa in person because he was considering buying it, but he got locked up inside! Can he escape this villa in this completely unknown environment!? Your mission is only to escape from the room by opening the door. However, to do this, you'll need to gather some items and use those items in solving puzzles. The rules are very simple. You can tap various locations, and you can also flick when you need to move about the room. description: If you suffer from migraines, IBS, heartburn, or suspect you have some other food intolerance (celiac disease, lactose intolerance, etc.), most books and doctors will recommend that you start keeping a food diary or food journal. With a food diary, you track the things you eat as well as your symptoms. Over time you can use this data to help determine what your triggers are and what foods to avoid. This application removes the need to carry a separate notebook and pen or pencil and allows you to keep this log directly on your phone or tablet. Features: * Daily log of food and symptoms * Autocompletes entries to quickly enter common meals * Search for something before you eat it to see if it might have caused you trouble in the past * Custom categories so you can track additional things like exercise, medication, stress or anxiety level, etc. * Export in CSV and XLS format for processing, archiving, or printing to bring to a doctor or dietitian
release_text: v2.0.5: * Fixes another export issue. v2.0.4: * Fixes export error. * Makes comment autofill optional. * Fixes the size of the autocomplete box. v2.0.0: * New user interface. * Export/Import also now Google Drive and Dropbox support. * You can now export to a formatted HTML document. * Google Cloud Print is integrated into the HTML export.

description: Fun and highly addictive! Tap your finger on the screen to navigate the bird and avoid the obstacles. Fly through the sky like a bird and beat your own highscore!

All important animals are included, like cows, horses, pig, donkey, dog, cat, frog, chicken, sheep, bee and many many more! The preschool farm animal puzzle collection is suitable for toddlers and childrens. + Always new arrangement of the pieces of the puzzle - the tots puzzle is always exciting and varied for your kid. + For each correctly solved puzzle your child will receive a reward like funny bursting ballons. + Beautifully illustrated puzzle app with high-resolution graphics. + No third-party advertising. + Parental control With this lite farm animal puzzle app learning and playing makes fun! The cute farm animal puzzle promotes hand-eye coordination, logical thinking and your child's memory skills. The perfect preschool learning puzzle game app for your toddler and kid! Girls and boys worldwide love this puzzle. The perfect mix of funny animals on the farm and the choosable difficulty of each puzzle level makes this app such a beloved game. You don´t need to buy a 'real' expensive jigsaw puzzle and you also never need to look for those missing pieces everywhere again. If you have questions about our games for kids and toddlers or are interested in how we develop our apps together with children, send an email to: support@mcpeppergames.com Please note: Rating the app and writing a review will help us create more apps for children. Thank you! Your McPeppergames team

description: Gameplay: - Touch the button when the star (music node) reach it. - The game start with the number of touches equal with to the song's music nodes. - If the number of touches reduce to 0, you cant play anymore, even if the song hasn't finish yet. - Complete >= 90% of song's music nodes to earn 3 stars. - Earn 3 stars of the latest song to unlock the next one. Warning: - The last song is extremely hard. Maybe only 1 person of 10000 can pass it and get 3 stars! Maybe that's you this genius? Let's play!
release_text: - Improve interface. - Make ultimate challenge easier.

description: Bitcoin Alert will save you from having to constantly monitor the value of your coins by alerting you about changes as they happen. Let our servers do the work Instead of having to constantly poll markets (as other similar apps do - thus draining your battery), your device will receive push notifications via Google Cloud Messaging from our cloud based monitoring service. Supported markets • Bitstamp: USD/BTC • BTC-e: USD/BTC • Kraken: EUR/XBT, USD/XBT, LTC/XBT, EUR/LTC, USD/LTC • MtGox: USD/BTC Alert types The basic types of alerts you can define to set up your own custom trigger conditions are: • Price Hit (when the current market price reaches a certain value), and • Price Change (covering market price fluctuations based on parameters such as Amount, Interval and Direction). To distinguish between alerts of different severity, you can customize the type of notification placed in your phone's status bar (silent, regular, insistent - like an alarm) for each alert you define. Purchase options When you first install it, a fully functional initial trial period will let you decide if you find it useful. When the trial period expires, the app will continue to function in restricted mode, limiting the number of active alert rules to 2. There are two purchase options: subscription (annual / monthly) or one-off lifetime license. All of these give you unlimited number of notifications. NOTE: Although our services are based on high availability solutions from Google, we can not guarantee the delivery of alerts with a 100% success rate. Individual exchange's servers, as well as underlying Google services may occasionally experience outages.
release_text: v1.1.2: • fixed a Billing UI bug on devices with ICS v1.1.1: • fixed "Re-enable" button in notification, in some cases it did not activated the alert on server v1.1.0: • new markets (Bitstamp, BTC-e, Kraken) • new currencies (EUR, LTC) • improved notifications • lifetime purchase option (for traders that don't like subscriptions)

description: Lringo+ Messenger is a messaging service aimed at eliminating language barrier. Lringo supports cross Language chating with instant translation. description: TrigoMania brings a new type of logic puzzle action to Android. Like playing Dominoes but with Triangles. Select a Triangle from your supply, and place it on the TrigoMania field. You can place Triangles only next to Triangles of matching color or number. Play against the clock and fill the field in record time, use the arcade mode and fill squares of eight fields to make them explode, or relax and enjoy the endless mode at your own pace and leisure. TrigoMania is optimized for devices with extra-large screens. Play it on your favorite tablet or oversize-smartphone. Vivez l’expérience d’information la plus complète jamais offerte par la plus grande salle de nouvelles au Québec. Mobile, interactive et intuitive, La Presse+ (La Presse Plus) combine le meilleur des médias imprimés, du web et de la vidéo et vous permet d’approfondir l’actualité du bout des doigts. Naviguez facilement dans des contenus riches et étoffés et restez en tout temps à l’affût de l’actualité grâce aux nouvelles en direct. Abonnez-vous gratuitement dès maintenant à La Presse+ (La Presse Plus) et redéfinissez la façon de vous informer. Fonctionnalités - Expérience conviviale, intuitive et non intrusive; - Contenus riches et étoffés à approfondir grâce à des vidéos, des galeries de photos, des images interactives, des extraits audio, des dossiers à onglets, des écrans défilants et plus encore; - Articles, photos, illustrations et vidéos visualisables en mode plein écran; - Nouvelles et prévisions météo en temps réel; - Téléchargement automatique durant la nuit et livraison des éditions avant 5 h 30; - Édition accessible en mode hors connexion une fois téléchargée; - Partage des contenus avec plusieurs applications comme Facebook et Twitter; - Accès à la section Pause, exclusive à La Presse+; - Accès aux liens externes sans quitter l’application; - Défilement automatique des articles et choix de la taille des caractères; - Vitrine qui permet de consulter vos anciennes éditions et des hors-séries; - Trois grilles de mots croisés et horoscope tous les jours; - Possibilité de consulter La Presse+ sur un téléviseur à l’aide d’un câble HDMI. Autorisations de l’application En téléchargeant La Presse+, vous donnez les autorisations suivantes : - Obtenir les données de localisation lors de l’abonnement (position précise grâce au réseau Wi-Fi et position approximative par GPS), seulement si le lecteur l’autorise; - Lire l’espace mémoire de la tablette (contenu du stockage USB) et le modifier/supprimer pour permettre le téléchargement et la suppression des éditions sur la tablette; - Rechercher des comptes sur la tablette pour récupérer le courriel lors de l’abonnement seulement si le lecteur l’autorise; - Afficher les connexions réseau, bénéficier d’un accès complet au réseau et recevoir des données d’internet pour permettre le téléchargement des éditions et la réception de notifications; - S’exécuter au démarrage pour permettre la réception de l’édition du jour et des notifications à l’ouverture de la tablette; - Contrôler le vibreur pour signaler la réception de notifications; - Empêcher la tablette de passer en mode veille lors de l’utilisation de La Presse+ pour permettre la lecture d’un article en mode plein écran ou d’une vidéo. Pour consulter la Politique de confidentialité de La Presse+ pour tablettes Android, rendez-vous sur le site http://plus.lapresse.ca/politiqueandroid . Experience the most comprehensive information ever offered by the largest newsroom in Quebec. Mobile, interactive and intuitive, La Presse + (La Presse Plus) combines the best of print, web and video and allows you to deepen news fingertips. Navigate easily in rich, fleshed out and stay in all times abreast of current events through live news. Subscribe now for free La Presse + (La Presse Plus) and redefine how to advise you. features - Experience friendly, intuitive and non-intrusive; - Rich content and expanded to deepen with videos, photo galleries, interactive images, audio clips, tabbed folders, scrolling screens and more; - Articles, photos, videos and illustrations viewable in full-screen mode; - News and weather forecasts in real time; - Automatic download and overnight delivery of editions before 5: 30 pm; - Edition available offline once downloaded; - Content Sharing with multiple applications like Facebook and Twitter; - Access to the section break, exclusive to La Presse +; - Access to external links without leaving the app; - Automatic scrolling of items and choosing the font size; - Showcase that allows you to view your old editions and special editions; - Three crossword puzzles and horoscope every day; - Ability to view the Press + on a TV using an HDMI cable. Application permissions By downloading the Press +, you grant the following permissions: - Get location data during subscription (precise location through Wi-Fi network and approximate location by GPS), only if the reader permits it; - Read the tablet's memory (USB storage contents) and modify / delete to allow downloading and deleting editions on the shelf; - Search accounts on the tablet to fetch mail at the subscription only if the reader permits it; - View network connections, have full access to the network and receive Internet data to allow downloading of editions and receiving notifications; - If run at startup to allow reception of today's edition and notifications to the opening of the tablet; - Check the buzzer to signal the reception of notifications; - Prevent tablet from going to sleep mode when using the Press + to enable reading an article in full screen mode or video. To review the privacy policy of the Press + for Android tablets, visit the http://plus.lapresse.ca/politiqueandroid site.

release_text: -Added the ability to backup and restore the database -Added a 4-weekly pay period -Moved total hours off of Saturday -Fixed a bug when trying to delete a shift -Fixed a freezing bug while viewing the work week -Fixed a bug when trying to turn the notification icon on and off

description: Sometimes, Microsoft needs to verify your identity to help make sure that you (and only you) have access to your account. The Microsoft account app makes this easy, and you no longer need to enter security codes from text messages or authenticator apps! Instead, you'll get a notification when you need to verify your identity. Just tap to approve, and job done. The Microsoft account app also works even if: • You've turned on two-step verification for your account. You can still verify your identity with a single tap. • Your device is offline. The app also generates security codes that you can use to verify your identity instead. * This app only works with your Microsoft account. For Microsoft Azure Multi-Factor Authentication, use the Multi-Factor Authentication app available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.phonefactor.phonefactor

The Birmingham Mail app has been redesigned from the ground-up. Its slick, clean interface comes with a raft of state of the art features, but is still completely FREE. Get the very latest news from Birmingham, West Midlands & around the globe, celebrity gossip and sport 24/7. Keep up to date with your football matches & transfers and find out what's on in your area. Completely customisable, the Birmingham Mail App allows you to tailor what news you consume and when. You can even follow your Birmingham football team to keep informed of the latest news on your favourite club, whether it be West Brom, Wolves, Aston Villa or Birmingham City. The Birmingham Mail app is the best way to follow breaking Birmingham, West Midlands and world news, including live blogs and live video. Keep up-to-date with the latest in: · Top local news stories from Birmingham and the West Midlands · Breaking UK and world news · Football and Sport news · Birmingham City, West Brom, Wolves and Aston Villa coverage · Celebrity news · Birmingham Event listings and What's On guides · Birmingham restaurant guides and reviews · TV & Film news and reviews
release_text: This update contains bug fixes, to improve the apps performance and reduce crashes. Any questions, contact us on: mobile_app_feedback@trinitymirror.com

description: A melhor coletânea de piadas de papagaio! Muito engraçado! Aplicativo totalmente grátis, baixe agora mesmo. "O cara entrou no restaurante e perguntou o preço da galinha ao molho pardo. - Dez reais - respondeu o garçom. - Dez reais? Ta doido? É muito caro! Então ele vê um papagaio no poleiro atrás do balcão, vira-se pro garçom e diz: - Não dá pra você me preparar um molho pardo mais barato? O garçom olha na mesma direção do freguês, entende a indireta e responde: - É... esse molho pardo eu posso fazer para o senhor a cinco reais... E o papagaio: - Currupaco! Fique com a galinha, freguês! Eu pago a diferença!" The best collection of jokes parrot! Very funny! Totally free application, download now. "The man entered the restaurant and asked the price of chicken in brown sauce. - Ten real - replied the waiter. - Ten real? Ta crazy? It's too expensive! Then he sees a parrot on a perch behind the counter, turns pro waiter and says: - You can not you prepare me a brown sauce cheaper? The waiter looks in the same direction of the customer, understands the hint and answers: - Is this brown sauce ... I can do for you five real ... And the parrot: - Currupaco! Stay with chicken customer! I'll pay the difference! "

description: 호텔, 펜션, 레스토랑 예약 70% 할인 앱 데일리호텔! 호텔은 물론 펜션, 리조트 등을 최대 70%할인 받는 타임커머스 앱! 미슐랭 스타 셰프의 레스토랑을 비롯한 엄선된 맛집도 놀라운 특가에 만나보세요! @이럴 때, 최대 70%의 할인을 받을 수 있어요! -해외 및 국내 여행 시 호텔예약이 필요하다면? -한정된 출장비에 숙박이 고민될 때! -블로그 속 맛집은 못믿겠다! 엄선된 레스토랑만 보고 싶을 때! -커플들을 위한 데이트 필수앱! 여친, 남친을 사로잡을 특별한 데이트를 원한다면? -부부들이 사랑하는 호텔과 맛집이 궁금하다면? -친구야놀자! 매일이 축제같은 설레는 일상을 원한다면? -서울, 부산, 제주 등 핫한 국내여행지의 호텔을 찾을때! -여기어때? 자랑하고 싶게 예쁘고 저렴한 펜션, 모텔만 보고싶다면? -음식정보, 엄선된 맛집사진 가득! 대학생 커플들이 열광한 맛집어플! @이미 전문가들이 엄선했기 때문에 믿고 쓸 수 있어요! -호텔, 펜션, 레스토랑 전문가들이 엄선한 곳들만 데일리호텔에서 만나보세요! -여행사가 필요 없는 탁월한 추천 시스템으로 고민할 필요 없는 필수앱! @데일리호텔의 독보적인 파트너십! 진정한 호텔라이프를 경험하세요.  -웨스틴조선, 힐튼, 메리어트, 쉐라톤, 워커힐, 아코르, 롯데호텔 등 @여행, 맛집여행, 데이트코스의 필수어플, 데일리호텔을 지금 시작하세요! 데일리호텔에서 설치 전 동의를 구하는 ‘앱 사용 권한’의 목적은 아래와 같습니다. - ID/주소록 기기에서 계정 검색 : 회원 가입시에 전화번호 자동 등록에 사용, 계좌이체시 알림 및 푸시 서비스에 사용 - 정확한 위치(GPS 및 네트워크 기반) : 데일리호텔 지도 화면에서 자신의 위치를 요청 할때 사용 - USB 저장소의 콘텐츠 수정/삭제/읽기 : 앱의 이미지 캐쉬 저장 시에 사용 - 실행중인 앱 검색 : 구글플레이서비스 및 카카오톡, 페이스북 로그인시 사용 Hotels, pensions, restaurant bookings 70% discount Daily app hotels! release_text: # 데일리호텔의 새로운 업데이트 기능 - 새로운 정렬, 필터 버튼이 추가되었습니다. 간편한 정렬기능과 원하는 필터를 선택해 나를 위한 최적의 호텔, 레스토랑 리스트를 확인하세요! - 데일리호텔 카테고리 분류 기능으로 호텔, 펜션, 부티크 등 원하는 카테고리만 선택해 확인할 수 있습니다. - 데일리호텔의 간편 결제 기능을 체크카드로도 이용하세요! 체크카드도 간편 결제 등록이 가능해졌습니다. 데일리호텔은 소중한 고객님의 피드백을 바탕으로 더 특별한 하루를 만들어 드리기 위한 서비스 개선을 계속하고 있습니다. 고객 피드백은 help@dailyhotel.com 을 통해 전해주시면 빠르게 확인하여 개선하도록 하겠습니다!

Trivia for Breaking Bad is an awsome quiz game! Find out how much you know about the tv series in an addictive quiz game. Try to answer all the questions. + Guess the answer for many questions in Trivia for Breaking Bad + Unlock challenging game play modes! + Track your scores in a fun, addictive and free quiz game! + Test yourself to see how much you can remember from the movie with Trivia for Breaking Bad game! NOTE - This quiz app is a fan made app for other fans and is used only for the purpose of review, criticism and entertainment. No copyright violations are intended under the fair use clause.

Over 10,000,000 of downloads for Death Worm, 10 Million people addicted to Death Worm can't be wrong! Meet the highly anticipated Android version of the *original* Death Worm game - a Top-50 indie game of all times according to indiegames.com! Control the mind-boggling underground monster with your finger! What is he? An alien? An awakened prehistoric predator? Genetic monster? It is really not important for those unfortunate who have sunk into oblivion in his giant poisonous throat. Nothing personal - it's just the predator's lunch time. NOWHERE TO HIDE: The Monster feeds in 4 different locations! ENDLESS TERROR: Beat 60 challenging levels to complete the Campaign Mode! NEVER GET BORED: Death Worm features 3 bonus Mini-Games! EXPLOSIVE SURVIVAL: 3 different Survival Modes to keep feeding your hungry Monster as long as you can! EVOLUTION: The Worm looks differently in every location that you unlock! OMNIVOROUS: Animals, birds, businessmen, punks, lizards, and even dangerous predators like tiger are now nothing more than snacks for your monster Worm! THE DESTROYER: blow up cars and tanks; bring down planes and helicopters and even the alien UFO’s! Fight enemies of over 40 types! The Game supports HD displays and features smooth graphics and stunning visual effects! Various Achievements get unlocked as the game progresses, and your highest scores get into the Leaderboards! This is the game that perfectly suits if you need to quickly relieve stress or just have fun! Optimized for smartphones and tablets.
release_text: v. 1.51 - Christmas update with new content - new game mode - Christmas Blitz - new enemies including Santa, Snowman and Giant War Robots v.1.40 - new game mode - Blitz. description: If you enjoy crossword puzzles, word finds, and anagram games, you're going to love 7 Little Words! Each bite-size puzzle consists of 7 clues, 7 mystery words, and 20 letter groups. Find the mystery words by deciphering the clues and combining the letter groups. 7 Little Words is FUN, CHALLENGING, and EASY TO LEARN. We guarantee you've never played anything like it before. Give 7 Little Words a try today! ----- 7 Little Words contains 50 puzzles that you can play for free. Additional puzzles are available for purchase inside the app.
release_text: Hello 7 Little Words fans! In this release you'll find these new puzzle packs: - Foothills - 50 Moderate Puzzles Have fun!

* Seleccionada por Google como una de las mejores Apps gratuitas del 2014. ¿En qué consiste la app de vibbo? Es una app de anuncios gratuitos donde puedes comprar y vender artículos de segunda mano de forma fácil, rápida y, sobre todo, segura. ¿Qué cosas interesantes puedes hacer si te descargas esta app? - Vender: publica tu anuncio gratis en cualquier lugar y cuando tú quieras. - Comprar: ¡nunca se sabe cuándo aparecen las grandes oportunidades! Con esta app puedes comprar lo que te interesa cerca de donde estás porque usamos geolocalización. - Recibir alertas relacionadas con aquellos artículos que más te interesan. - Gestionar y editar tus anuncios siempre que lo creas necesario. - Reportar aquellos anuncios que consideres que no son correctos. Y es que en vibbo velamos por la calidad del contenido que se publica. En vibbo tienes más de 2 millones de productos en venta relacionados con el hogar, ocio y deportes, electrónica, moda y belleza, niños y bebés etc… así como otros anuncios clasificados de pisos de segunda mano o coches de ocasión. En vibbo encontrarás todo lo que te interesa relacionado con la compra venta y artículos de segunda mano. ¡Ah! En vibbo también nos importa mucho tu opinión y lo que piensas de nosotros. Trabajamos cada día para mejorar y ofrecerte un buen servicio, así que si tienes alguna sugerencia (o duda), ¡envíanosla a usersupport.clas@scmspain.com ! ¡Gracias! * Selected by Google as one of the best free apps of 2014.   What is the app Vibbo? It's a free app ads where you can buy and sell secondhand goods easily, quickly and, above all, safe.   What interesting things you can do if you download this app?   - Sell: Post Free Ads wherever and whenever you want. - Buy: you never know when great opportunities come! With this app you can buy what you want near where you are because we use geolocation. - Receive alerts related to those items that interest you. - Manage and edit your ads whenever you think necessary. - Report those ads that you feel are incorrect. And in Vibbo we ensure the quality of the content that is published. In Vibbo you have more than 2 million products for sale related to the home, leisure and sports, electronics, fashion and beauty, children and babies etc ... as well as other classified second-hand flats or used car ads. In Vibbo you'll find everything that interests you related to the sale and thrift.   Ah! In Vibbo us too much care about your opinion and what you think of us. We work every day to improve and offer a good service, so if you have any suggestions (or doubt), send it to usersupport.clas@scmspain.com ! Thank you!
release_text: ¡Por fin! al abrir la app, veréis vuestra última búsqueda realizada. Hemos mejorado la subida de fotos en el formulario de publicación de anuncios. Dice Sergio (el developer), que va mejor. :) Ahora, en el perfil público de los usuarios.. se puede ver el número de artículos vendidos. Gestiona las recomendaciones desde tus ajustes. Ante cualquier problema, escribid a: usersupport.clas@scmspain.com

description: “Polyglot” is an easy to use mobile manual of Spanish Grammar. You will learn to make simple sentences in Spanish in a short period of time. All you need is to spend 5-10 minutes a day practicing. In a week you will feel that you know some Spanish. Features: • Simple and intuitive interface • Pronunciation of Spanish words and phrases • Integrated speech recognition for pronunciation exercises • No Internet connection required • No adverts or annoying popups Contents: 1. The Present Tense of –ar verbs. 2. The Present Tense of –er verbs. Interrogative pronouns. 3. The Present Tense of –ir verbs. 4. The Present Tense. Irregular verbs, part 1. 5. The Present Tense. Irregular verbs, part 2. 6. Nouns. Articles. Prepositions of place. 7. The absence of the article 8. The Past Tense of –ar verbs 9. The Past Tense of –er and –ir verbs 10. The Past Tense. Irregular verbs 11. Me gusta... (I like...) 12. Adjectives 13. The Future Tense. Regular verbs 14. The Future Tense. Irregular verbs 15. Imperative mood. Do that! 16. Imperative mood. Don't do that! “Polyglot. Spanish” will help you and your children to learn basic principles of Spanish grammar in a simple form. How it works The program shows you simple sentences in English in one of the three forms (affirmative, negative, interrogative). You have to translate the sentence into Spanish using the words on the screen. If your answer is right, the program will encourage you. If you are wrong, the program will show you the right answer. While you are making the sentence, all the selected words are pronounced. Then the correct answer is read aloud. If you have chosen a wrong word by mistake, push the “Back” button to cancel your choice. The program creates a random sentence from the words in the dictionary. And it continues until you get bored. Each lesson is almost endless. You decide yourself where to finish it. Attention! This program includes the option to make in-app purchases: ★ Voice input (0.99 $) • You can practice your pronunciation. • It helps to eliminate psychological barrier which prevents you from speaking. • It helps to get rid of the accent. ★ Open all lessons (2.99 $) • For those who want to choose the order of lessons themselves. ¡Aprender español!

A great Mind Game to help you practice your visual analysis skills while having fun. Puzzle My Mind is a visual puzzle game where you use puzzle pieces to recreate a sample image using the puzzle pieces. The game contains 135 images of beautiful nature scenes and wildlife that are used for the puzzles. Compete against others on a global top scoreboard. Complete each puzzle as many times as you wish to get a higher score. Playing: Drag the puzzle pieces to the board to recreate the sample image. Scoring: The faster you complete the puzzle the higher the score. You will also lose points for puzzle pieces that are placed incorrectly. Main skills used in this app: visual analysis, attention to detail, and fine motor skills.
release_text: Puzzle your mind with 135 great free puzzles and the option to purchase an additional 160 puzzles.

description: Are you ready to meet blood thirsty tiger's eyes? “Tiger Live Wallpaper” free app for AndroidTM is here to present you high quality tiger images that look fantastic on your phone or tablet. These scary but at the same time beautiful wild animal wallpapers will chill your blood and make you admire these wonderful creatures even more. This is designed to be a useful reference tool for anybody with an interest in the law in England and Wales. It covers the main offences such as theft, burglary etc along with some traffic legislation and police powers. UK Police officers will find the app of most use and there is plenty of useful information in there, including offence definitions. It will be updated regularly so please email if there is anything you would like adding. Categories include: Assault Public Order Harassment Road Traffic legislation Criminal damage Defensive tactics Fraud Sexual offences and more.
release_text: 27 DASH questions and 11 harassment questions added, powers of court to seize property and section for dangerous dogs. Text size reduced slightly Added Traffic Offence Reports, PND Codes, FPN Codes, PPO and some further offences.

Minebuilder is an open “Block World” game which lets you create your own adventure. Inspired by games like Minecraft and Infiniminer. Craft your tools during the day, fend off the monsters at night and when dawn comes again build your own world, alone or with your friends! Minebuilder contains a large number of different blocks and tools with which you can craft your world. From simple blocks of stone to complicated generators and electrical devices. Minebuilder provides you with the tools to create a world. The game supports both single and multiplayer. For multiplayer accounts and the server program (Windows/Mac), go to our website: www.space-walrus.com Features: * Place/Remove blocks * Crafting * Animals * Monsters * Multiplayer * Rail tracks * Bows and arrows * Electrical copper wires * Creative and Survival mode

description: Cоставляйте слова из букв другого слова, представленного вам на уровне. Например на уровне вам попалось слово "СЛОВА", тогда вводите "сало", "сова", "оса" и "овал" и т.д. Вспомните всё, что вы знаете, старайтесь и вы пройдете даже самые сложные уровни. Обратите внимание, что можно составлять слова длинной от 3-х букв. На каждом уровне можно составить десятки слов. На некоторых уровнях это число превышает 150! Значение каждого неизвестного вам ранее слова вы сможете узнать, воспользовавшись подсказкой. Вводите слова и они будут добавляться на экран. Позже вы сможете посмотреть значение любого слова просто нажав на него. Интересная развивающая игра "Слова из Слов" поможет вам провести время с удовольствием. Играйте, развивайтесь, наслаждайтесь Игра создана при поддержке 33-х букв и множества слов из них. Costavlyaet words from the letters of another word, presented to you on the level. For example at the level you came across the word "word", then enter the "fat", "owl", "wasp" and "oval", etc. Think of all that you know, try and you will pass even the most difficult levels. Note that you can make words from a long 3 letters. At each level you can reach tens of words. On some level, this number is greater than 150! The value of each unknown word to you earlier, you can find out by using the hint. Enter the words and they will be added to the screen. Later, you can see the meaning of any word by simply clicking on it. Interesting educational game "Word of the words" will help you spend your time with pleasure. Play, develop, enjoy The game was created with the support of 33-letter words, and many of them.

★Version Update Notice★ We added "User Forume" link on main, it will take you to our facebook page. You can check out game tips and share your tricks! We’ve added 3 more stages to Abandoned school game - Art room - Infirmary - Science room You can update on Google Play market right now! 3 times scarier and 3 times harder than last version The abandoned school’s accumulated downloads just hit 300,000 worldwide. It featured many game review sites around the world. - 2nd placed in iTunes Game/adventure chart in Singapore. - iTunes featured in Spain, Poland, Russia and Singapore. Thank you so much for all your support! ★★The abandoned school facebook open!★★ http://www.facebook.com/abandonedschool Game tips and shares your tricks. Give us your feedback! The Abandoned school is first person survival horror quest game that will chill you to the core. High-end graphic with sound the best survival horror for android! A game will put you in the shoes of boy who try to find truth about his brother and girlfriend’s suspicious death. You must also take part of boy’s troubled memories and go into abandoned school. This is point and click mobile game, made with amazing background sound and creepy black and white photorealistic images. Do you have what it takes to find out terrifying true? Do you have guts to play? Download now and see for yourself. ▶How to play: Use the entire smart phone’s functionality to complete the quest. Try to touch the abject more than once, change the order, move around the room, and shake or tilt phone to avoid obstacles. Plus after the sunset you will see more clues and finally complete the quest. ▶ The abandoned school Tip and walkthrough: Many people said it's too hard so here’s few tips School Gate: Click warning sign 3 times > Click chain 5 times > Click metal gate 6 times Stairway: Get rid of fly’s by clicking > move side by side and see change of picture > click photos on the floor and see the change > when spider shows on top, shake the phone to drop it. ( there’s hidden layer for on this stage, you should figure it out) rest of stages, you can explore with clicking or use smart phone functionalities to clear. Thank you so much! *This is NOT scary prank or surprise game it has story and chilling end to it. You must guess what happened to them and find out truth.

Your home planet is being invaded by aliens and you must stop them! Load up your ship and use your missiles to stop them from attacking! Galactic Invaders is a space invaders clone where enemies are coming to invade your planet. Touch or drag on the screen to move the ship and shoot missiles. If a enemy gets by, don't worry, your allies will get them! There is an unlimited amount of waves and every wave is generated randomly so each time you play it is unique! The background of the game (space) is also randomly generated and constantly changing. Each time you play a full round you get money to purchase upgrades to become stronger. Better yet this game is free and takes very little battery power so you can play it for hours! Updates will be coming out weekly to add in new effects including new shop items, new enemies, and new obstacles to make the game more fun for you! ALSO: My game requires a few odd permissions like GPS, wifi, and a few others. The reason I need these permissions is because Im using an advertisement company's ads in my game and they require those permissions. The company is called LeadBolt: https://www.leadbolt.com/ and it is completely trusted. If you don't believe me you can look into it! Thanks for playing and have fun!
release_text: Change Log: 2.5: -Added a new shop upgrade -Fixed a bugs 2.3: -Added an enemy that shoots back at you. Spawns after level four. -Added a shop item that makes your missiles blow up enemy missiles on collision. -Made a new background to give the impression that there is depth. -Made money a little easier to receive. 2.0: -Redid the whole game framework and code -Added in new explosions -Added in sounds -Added in a shop to upgrade your ship -Added in currency -New Icon -Fixed Minor Bugs

description: Balaklava is a board game for one or two players. Rules of game: Five locust beans are put on game board alternately. Then players put coins on boards, also alternately, under one condition: The coin must be in the neighbourhood of the last put coin (above, under, to left of, to right of it). The player who puts the last coin wins. More features: ★ multiple difficulty levels ★ one or two player mode ★ choose between board sizes of 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 and 7x7 This app does not fetch advertisements from internet, only internal ads of the app creator are presented. Please upgrade to premium version to support this project.

We have worked with some of the world's leading professionals in the hypnotherapy, NLP and self development fields to deliver a portable and cutting-edge product to help you achieve your goals. Instant hypnotherapy. Anywhere you are.  Each track in this app is a combination of words spoken by certified hypnotherapist David Ridgeway D.Hypn., M.N.C.H. and soothing, uplifting "binaural" music.  FEATURES:  - High quality recordings from a qualified clinical hypnotherapist  - "Binaural beat" technology to help you enter a deeper state of relaxation.  - Alternative "wake up" ending or "sleep" ending  - 50 Tips eBook - 4 therapeutic videos  - Play alarm when therapy finishes (optional) - Exit app when therapy finishes (optional) Why pay for an expensive "hourly rate" hypnosis session when you can achieve the same life changing results over and over again in the comfort of your own home for a fraction of the price. SUPPORTS BOTH TTC BUSES AND STREETCARS!! Tired of not knowing when your next TTC Bus or Streetcar will be arriving? If so then Toronto Transit Tracker is the solution for you. Based on REAL-TIME LIVE Bus and Streetcar locations this application will provide users with the ability to find out when their next Bus/Streetcar will be arriving at their desired stop. Users have the ability to save their favourite stops for fast access to times, use GPS to find a nearby stop, and use maps to find their desired stop times as well as see exactly where their closest Bus/Streetcar is. List of Features: (i) Simple easy to use interface (ii) Save your FAVOURITE stops to view arrival times quickly (iii) GPS to find your closest stops (iv) MAPS to find desired stops based on routes and your location (v) View LIVE Bus/Streetcar locations (vi) Quickly Search Through Stops (vii) All Times Auto-Refresh every 20 seconds ** This application is not affiliated or endorsed by the TTC Follow at: http://twitter.com/mytransitracker Have any questions/concerns/suggestions? Feel Free to email me at: my.transit.tracker@gmail.com
release_text: Version 2.1.0 - Added Stops near me feature - Change the colour of your favourites to quickly distinguish them - ICS compatibility - Minor bug fixes with stops that wouldn't show times

description: EXPERIENCING GOD by Henry Blackaby, Richard Blackaby, and Claude King (unabridged) is presented by Oasis Audio. This standalone audiobook app combines a professional audio recording with supplemental features for download-once, grab-and-go anywhere enjoyment. God is at work around you. Will you join Him? Over the years God has used the truths of Experiencing God to awaken believers to a radically God-centered way of life. As a result, millions have come to know God intimately, to recognize His voice, and to understand His will for their lives. God is inviting you to experience Him in an intimate love relationship through which He reveals to you His will, His ways, and His work. Through the biblical principles in this course, God can teach you how to: • know when He is speaking to you • recognize His activity around you • adjust your life to Him and His ways • identify what He wants to do through you • respond to His activity in your life When you recognize where God is working, you can join Him in what He is doing. Then you will experience God doing through you what only He can do. This was professionally recorded at the Oasis Audio studios by professional narrator Wayne Shepherd. DURATION: About 11.0 hours of narration.

Ivideon is a new-generation cloud-based video surveillance service providing access and reliability without complexity. Need video surveillance? Ivideon tracks what matters to you no matter where you are, keeping you updated on important events in real time and storing those events in the cloud for easy access. Ivideon is scalable, simple and reliable. From a webcam to monitor a home to an IP-camera network serving an international business, Ivideon can handle it. Every day, more than 1,000,000 individuals and businesses use Ivideon to: • access high-quality video online (with sound) via any standard connected device including Android • record and store video in the cloud with guaranteed reliability and data security • receive automatic push- and e-mail notifications of suspicious movements or sounds • quickly search and view recorded surveillance video • access quality video over any bandwidth down to 3G • easily expand to any number of cameras • share camera access with PTZ, Archive, and Live options • transfer and store data securely • embed surveillance feeds on websites or blogs • share camera links over social networks Ivideon is safe. Ivideon is simple to install and maintain. And Ivideon is accessible from anywhere. But with all the functionality of more expensive and complex solutions. And if you get stuck, our Helpdesk is on stand-by 24/7. Camera connection Big-name cameras like iLuv, Oco, Philips, Axis, Dahua, Hikvision—and many others—love Ivideon right out of the box. Plug and play – no computer needed. But all cameras—D-Link, Foscam, Trendnet, EasyN, Acti, Edimax, Swann, TP-Link, Logitech, Belkin and many others—can be configured to work with Ivideon quickly and easily. All you need is a computer with an Internet connection and to download our free Ivideon Server app here: http://www.ivideon.com/get/ . In five minutes you’re good to go. See how easy it is for free!
release_text: 2.7.2 • Another timeline setting was added: now you can choose between a static image or a ten-second video preview for each event. It’s a sort of mini archive—and it’s free! • Some bugs were also squashed.

description: WHITEBOARD COLOR PRO For basic drawing needs Android users might remember utilizing MS Paint, MacPaint, or Tux Paint and even the old school blackboard with chalk and eraser, which was replaced by the more recent whiteboard with sharpie markers. This APP will give your Android mobile device the power to draw anything you can imagine or are trying to convey to another person anywhere in the world! Draw art or simple text! Use for business, fun, artistic expression, and more! Easy simple to use GUI allows even kids to use the whiteboard providing endless hours of drawing play fun! WHITEBOARD COLOR PRO FEATURES; - Brush Diameter Selection! - Brush Color Selection! - Background Matte Color Selection! (Touch a color for two seconds to change background matte color.) - Brush Hardness Selection! - Multi-Touch Painting! - Fullscreen Mode! - Load Any Image To Draw On Using Imported Images As Templates Or Base Layer! - Undo Up To 10 Brush Strokes! - Easily Erase Complete Whiteboard! - Zoom and Pan Allow Easy Detailing To Create Awesome Colorful Realistic Artwork! - Simple To Use Graphical User Interface (GUI) - Save Whiteboard Creations! (.PNG) - Share Whiteboard Creations! Plays Well With Other Android Apps! THIS APP IS AD FREE, CONTAINS NO VIRUSES, NO MALWARE, NO SPYWARE, AND NO ADVERTISMENTS OF ANY KIND! Please contact us via our website http://www.androidputing.com with any bugs, questions, or suggestions about this APP, please include the device specifications: Brand, Model, and Android Version. INSTALL NOTES: You must have Android 2.0 API level 5 (Eclair) or higher version level to run this APP. This app requires pressure/size touch support, if your device does not have this feature the APP will not work. It will take two minutes of continuous drawing for the APP to adjust to your device’s touch sensors. The Nexus 7 on rare occasions reports high pressure values briefly, causing very broad “drips” along the drawn stroke. A simple solution to this problem is to use the “Undo Arrow” button and draw the stroke again. Known Issues DO NOT INSTALL if your device is listed as there are known issues with it. Motorola Droid X Samsung Galaxy S III Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 ASUS Transformer Pad TF300T ZTPad C91 Galaxy S4 For more Android Apps please see our website: http://www.androidputing.com This app is Open Source under the Apache License Version 2.0, the license and the source code are available at our website: http://www.androidputing.com

GPS Auto SMS was born with the aim to send your location to a specific recipient , using regular interval of time . for sending text messages . Gps Auto SMS is the only application of localization , which uses text messages , so it can also be used in areas with low coverage of the Internet. So your goal is to let people know your position automatically even in places where the internet signal is almost absent . The use is designed primarily for those who practice all kinds of hiking , trekking, canyoning, mountain biking , etc. . But its use is not limited to hikers , in fact, the ability to send messages automatically, allows an infinite number of usage scenarios , for example , but it is only one, you can also use it to keep up to date on the location of their children or people care . GPS Auto SMS Free is a free but limited , in fact : it has pre-set time intervals , not notifications can be switched off and you can not set a limit of SMS to be sent . The Pro version allows you to customize the time intervals , customize the type of notification , whether sound or silent , and then allows you to set a limit of sending text messages , at which the application will terminate automatically sending messages . ################################# Available languages: Italian and English. #################################
release_text: Available languages: Italian and English. ################################# NEW: optimizing battery use (only PRO) NEW: Adding Mixed mode (beta only PRO) BUG FIX GRAPHICS FIXES UPDATE: http://ggbu.altervista.org/app/gas/#updates Help us improve this application by reporting new functions and malfunctions. http://ggbu.altervista.org/app/gas/#contact

description: This app is a simple home page that links to the Browser based web app Posterini.com. It´s a faster way to access the web app posterini.com from your Android device. The Posterini website is multiplatform. You can access it from windows, mac and other OS Systems, and from iPAD and android phones, by going directly to posterini.com or using this app to access it faster without having to open your browser manually. Posterini is the All in One solution for your Visual Marketing Needs. Create Professional Digital Posters, Flyers, Banners, Cards and other Marketing Assets combining powerful and easy to use templates, effects, montage capabilities, a marketing wall and much more. Posterini can be used for many purposes including: small business promotion and marketing, party events, celebrations and community gatherings, all types of promotion, holiday and travel posters, birthday gifts and surprises, wedding and anniversary cards and posters, restaurant flyers and adverts, educational posters for projects and assignments, course promotion and offers, short film and feature film posters as well as other professional movie poster projects, flyers and cards, magazine covers and fashion posters, personal promotion, news covers and announcements, job adverts, creative brainstorming and much more. Effective visual marketing requires more than just creating a design. Posterini brings it all together including a powerful editor, ideation-brainstorming tools, a marketing wall and remote collaboration, all in the same place. Think of having templates, images, shapes, typography, special effects, montage capabilities, 100% flexibility and control and all of it fast and easy to use. Posterinis can be private or public, you choose! The Posterini Wall helps you increase the visibility of your public marketing assets. (Original, unique and good quality posters and marketing assets can be approved and picked to appear on the wall by Posterini Editors). Traditional design tools like photoshop have steep learning curves. On the opposite end other tools are too simple for what you need. Posterini is in the middle of those two options. It is simple enough and also powerful enough. It takes you there faster!. Connect quickly from Android with this App. And from non-mobile devices connect using your web browser through http://www.posterini.com . You can begin a project on your desktop, continue working on it on your tablet, add more elements from your phone and finish it on your laptop. Basic free accounts give you for free a powerful editor including easy templates, effects and unlimited editing. Professional accounts add on top more quality, features and assets. Our most advanced accounts add as well ideation-brainstorming modules and remote collaboration capabilities. On top of that the Posterini Wall markets the best marketing assets created by users around the world. description: Screen on toggler is basically a replacement tool for the default search button on your android phone when you long press it. It allows you to quickly toggle your screen's timeout from always ON to your screen timeout's setting and vice versa. Once installed, press and hold the search button on your android phone and a dialog will appear. Then select screen on toggler to toggle between always ON and your original screen timeout setting. You may also set it as the default action when you long press your search button, but it is recommended NOT to set as the default action, so that you may use it in conjunction with other search button replacement tools such as Wifi Toggler (also by me). You may clear the default setting for Screen On Toggler by going to the Manage Applications area, select screen on toggler and scroll down and click on the "Clear Defaults" button. This should restore the selection dialog when you long press the search button. To restore the timeout setting to your original setting, you may either touch on the screen on toggler icon on your android's notification bar OR you can long press your search button and select the screen on toggler again, to toggle it. It's that simple. Thanks to all who have given their feedback and bug reports so far, I hope the latest release (v1.43) would have fixed all the issues that you guys out there are facing. If you still encounter issues, do let me know and I'll try my best to solve it ASAP. Cheers. Notice: If you have other similar apps or widgets that performs similar functions (that allows you to change the screen timeout, please temporarily remove them / disable them if you encounter any issues with Screen On Toggler). Features: - Ability to toggle screen timeout easily by long pressing of search button, through the notification bar or through the main application itself - Option to hide or show notification icon - Ability to set custom screen timeout setting from app - Start on bootup feature - Option to only show notification icon when screen timeout is disabled - Compatible with Android 3.x HoneyComb and ICS If you find any bugs or have any suggestions, please email instead of commenting, I don't usually monitor the chatter in the comments. Thanks! Keywords: screen,on,toggler,toggle,toggle screen,leave screen on,timeout,no timeout,screen timeout,toggling,set timeout,change timeout
release_text: - Fixed bug with Screen Timeout not working on Jelly Bean. Timeout is now set to 24 hours screen timeout instead of -1 which caused Jelly Bean to treat as almost instant timeout.

The Brewing Assistant from Brewology101.com is an app for assisting in the brewing of your beer. It helps you build your own recipes by calculating your recipe's IBUs, SRM, OG, FG, and ABV while you build your recipe. Both US customary and metric are supported. The Brewing Assistant will also synchronize your recipes to the Brewology101.com Ale Abacus where you can then edit and delete your recipes or create new recipes. With the ability to sync your recipes to Brewology101.com, you can share your recipes with your friends, family, or the entire internet. It also allows you to backup all your recipes and transfer them to the other Android and iOS devices. To import your recipes into the Brewing Assistant from BeerXML, please import the recipes on Brewology101.com. Then to get the recipes to the Brewing Assistant, all you have to do is perform a sync. No need to manually enter all your recipes into your phone or tablet. Once you're ready to brew, the Brewing Assistant will help you with your mash and your boil. The mash reminder will alert you to stir your mash at the interval you set in the Settings. The boil reminder will alert you to add your ingredients at the times you specified in your recipe. The Brewing Assistant is just the help you need for making your homebrew a success. If you find any errors or have suggestions, please let us know at BrewingAssistant@brewology101.com
