description: Daily Connect allows parents and child care centers to easily communicate. It is the replacement to the information daily sheet and much more. As soon as an event is saved, it is immediately synchronized on each parent and caregiver account. Everybody has access to the information in real time. You can record not only feedings, nursing, naps, diapers, milestones, pumping, but also the baby’s mood, temperature, what kind of game he’s playing, his gps location, and attach pictures. A web interface is also accessible for free at http://www.dailyconnect.com , so parents and and child care centers don't need an Android phone or an iPhone to view and enter information. Daily Connect helps giving a better care for the child thanks to a better knowledge of his rhythm and a better communication between each caregiver. *********** For child care centers: - Parents are less worried leaving their child to you - Easier communication in between caregiver shift change - Improve parent satisfaction by giving them detailed information and peace of mind - Better accuracy of record, better parent retention, better communication with them - Competitive edge on your peers - Easy and rapid entry of information with one touch / one click interface - No more lost or incomplete daily sheets *********** Parents know immediately what their kid is doing during the day. They don't have to wait for the end of the day to find out what happened. They can connect to their account anytime, whether they are at work, at home or away on a trip. It reduces the anxiety of being away from the child not knowing what's happening. Parents will be less stressed and more relaxed leaving their child at the day care. Parents can also enter information when the baby is at home. For instance they can tell when the baby woke up in the morning before going to the day care, or when and how much he ate. The day care staff will also have access to this information. This information trail is also useful for day care shift change, and when the baby is going back home. The information from previous days is easily accessible. Parents and caregivers can easily see what happened the previous day to find out if new patterns are emerging. For instance changes in the nap schedule, or a new feeding habit. They can also see what activity the child has done the previous day to develop a new activity or a new skill the next day. ************ FEATURE HIGHLIGHT: * Easily track feeding (bottle, nursing, solid food), diapers, sleep, activities, mood, milestones * Track pumping and expressed milk * Track doctor visits, medicines, vaccines, sickness, weight, height, head size. * Automatically synchronize data between accounts over the Internet * Display graphical charts of the baby's activities * Display growth charts with percentile comparison. * For Preemies, percentiles are calculated with the birth date or with the due date. * Timer to track naps, activities, feeding session, mood and nursing duration. The last nursing side is indicated as a reminder. * Easy to use! The “TCC Rating” rating also has simple color-coded “Stop” (red), “Caution” (yellow), or “Go” (green) messages along with the numerical score so you can easily understand where we stand at a glance. Lastly, our automotive experts then also collect and show you what other websites say about these different aspects of any vehicle as you read our review. description: Speed a card game also known as Spit or Slam, is very fast-paced game and it could result in damage to the cards -- so play this on your device and don't ruin your actual playing cards. Speed is a game for two players of the shedding family of card games, in which each player tries to get rid of all of his cards. Speed is a game associated with the game Nertz. Controls: Tap or Drag the cards Objective: To play all your cards first. How to Play: -Each player is dealt five cards to form a hand, and each player is dealt 15 cards face down to form a draw pile. If you are playing with jokers, you use them as wild cards and give each draw pile 16 cards. A stack of five cards, placed face down on each side between the players, serves as a replacement pile. Finally, two cards are placed face down in the center between the replacement piles. -You may play a card in your hand by discarding it in the "Play Pile" if the card is 1 number/value higher or lower. (e.g. 5 can be played on a 6 or 4, a Queen can be played on a King or Jack) -A 2 may be played on an Ace and a Ace may be played on a 2. -You may have up to 5 cards in your hand at a single time. When you have less than 5 cards in your hand you may draw from your "Draw Pile" -First player to play all of his/her cards wins!

Klondike is a patience game (solitaire card game). Many people refer to Klondike as patience or solitaire, it being one of the better known of the family of patience games. Features: * OLD classic playing cards!!! * High resolution playing board * Undo * Auto-save * Timer Taking a shuffled standard 52-card deck of playing cards, one upturned card is dealt on the left of the playing area, then six downturned cards. On top of the downturned cards, an upturned card is dealt on the left-most downturned pile, and downturned cards on the rest until all piles have an upturned card. The piles should look like the figure to the right.

description: Click on line between dots (horizontally or vertically) to connect the dots. Playing the game is quite easy,You can connect any two dots together which are next to each other, either horizontally or vertically. Click on line between dots (horizontally or vertically) to put your line that connect the two dots. If you have managed to join two dots together which form the last side of a four-sided box, your color(Blue) will fill the box, indicating that it belongs to you. Similarly, if the phone has created a box in its move, the phone's color(Red) will fill that box. You will only be able to make one connection per move, but if you have created a box, you will get an extra free move before the phone take its turn. If you manage to create another box in any free move, then you can keep going until you are unable to create a further box. Your box color: blue Phone box color:red who ever makes 33 boxes first win the game.

description: Get started with new addictive mind puzzle! Challenge yourself with Kakuro Cross Sums! Not only is this game fun but it challenges and increases in your ability to multitask and use math. It requires focus and logic as well. No other game offers as much neurological stimulation and cognitive training while being so much fun! This puzzle game expounds upon number games like Sudoku and word games like crossword puzzles. It brings you the ultimate mathematic hybrid that is different from all other games on the market. With number combinations that make up each clue you can use logic to find the single solution! There are over 14000 games of different sizes including 5 x 5 and 15 x 15. You can earn more points by playing bigger games. Each puzzle guarantees only one correct answer so you will know it when you find it. This free app will help you along the way as you first learn to play. It will offer encouragement and a multitude of options for increasing your scores such as saving your current score or playing a larger board. As you play each high score gives you a victory text within the game allowing you to save your progress or delete it and challenge yourself again! By playing more boards you can get more points. While playing larger boards you can zoom in and out for better viewing. You can even leave notes for yourself while you are playing the game. If you are particularly challenged you can ask for a hint which will be displayed in the first cell and can help you solve the puzzle faster by pointing you in the right direction. The clue will turn colors to help you as well! Red is for an incorrect answer and green is for a correct answer. The more you play these games the more combinations you will learn and the faster the math will be. Start now and solve them all!

description: Disfruta de este divertido juego de preguntas y respuestas relacionadas con el mundo del fútbol. Pon a prueba tus conocimientos sobre este deporte e intenta batir tus propios récords de puntuación. Si tu sección favorita del trivial es la de deportes y te gustan los juegos de tipo quiz te gustará. Contiene todo tipo de preguntas sobre fútbol, sobre todo de la primera división y de la selección española. Las preguntas de esta versión son del año 2012, si quieres tener las preguntas actualizadas de la temporada 2013/2014 . Bajaté ¿Sabes de Fútbol? 2013/2014. Enjoy this fun game of questions and answers related to the world of football. Test your knowledge of the sport and try to beat your own record score. If your favorite section of the trivial is the sports and you like quiz type games you like. It contains all kinds of questions about football, especially the Premier League and the Spanish national team. The questions in this version are from the year 2012, if you have questions in the updated 2013/2014 season. Download I Know Football? 2013/2014.

Es ist von seinem Thema und seiner wirtschaftlichen Komponente her interessant. Mehr als 1000 Teilnehmer spielen gleichzeitig mit Ihnen online. Das Ziel besteht darin, einen Wolkenkratzer zu bauen. Die Anzahl der Etagen ist unbegrenzt. Hauptsache ist, Sie haben genug Ressourcen zum Errichten jeder Etage. Im Spiel gibt es zwei Hauptwährungen - Münzen und Dollars. Nach dem Bauen jeder nächsten Etage muss der Spieler entscheiden, was er auf jeder Ebene unterbringen möchte. Sie können auf der Etage Wohnungen einrichten oder ein Geschäft aus mehreren Geschäftsrichtungen auswählen. Spieler brauchen nicht ständig im Spiel zu sein. Das Spiel wird auch nach dem Verlassen des Spiels fortgesetzt. Dies ermöglicht Ihnen, Münzen zu verdienen. Allerdings, um Dollars zu verdienen, muss man aktiv am Leben des Wolkenkratzers teilnehmen. Der Wolkenkratzer bietet mehrere Instrumente zum Kontrollieren des Spielgeschäfts und der Laune seiner Bewohner. Auf den ersten Blick wirkt der Wolkenkratzer wie ein langweiliges und monotones Spiel. Nachdem Sie aber die ersten 10 Etagen gebaut haben, das Geschäft in die Wege geleitet haben und den Wolkenkratzer mit Bewohnern belebt haben, werden Sie unterschiedliche Spielaspekte kontrollieren müssen und Ihre Einkommen und Ausgaben verwalten. Da das Spiel kostenlos verbreitet wird, kann hier jeder sein Glück versuchen. Werden Sie zu einem Immobilienmagnaten im mobilen Wolkenkratzer-Wirtschaftsstrategiespiel. Kaufen Sie Etagen, um zu verdienen, bauen Sie neue Häuser... bauen Sie Ihre eigene Stadt. It is interesting by its theme and its economic component manufactures. More than 1,000 participants simultaneously play with you online. The goal is to build a skyscraper. The number of levels is unlimited. The main thing is you have enough resources to building each floor. In the game there are two main currencies - coins and dollars. After building each next level the player must decide what he wants to place on each level. You can set up on the flats or choose a business from several business directions. Players do not need to be constantly in the game. The game continues even after quitting the game. This allows you to earn coins. However, to earn dollars, you have to actively participate in the life of the skyscraper. The skyscraper has a number of instruments to control the game business and the mood of its inhabitants. At first glance, the skyscraper seems like a boring and monotonous game. After you have built but the first 10 floors, have conducted business in the ways and have revived the skyscraper with residents, you will need to control different aspects of the game and manage your income and expenses. Since the game is distributed free of charge, everyone can try his luck. Become a real estate tycoon in the mobile skyscraper-economic strategy game. Buying floors to earn, build new homes ... build your own city.

description: Did you ever wanted to keep your photos safely from snooping friends... If yes then here's a great opportunity for you. The Hide Photos application hides the selected image files safely for you. This application is presented as a Brightness Manager wherein you can change the brightness of the phone. How to get into the application: "Adjust the brightness of the phone between 80 and 100 with the seekbar provided at the bottom. Then long pressing the Sun in the top will take you to the application" where a password screen pops up asking for password.. The password to open the application is 8080. After getting into the application you can view the folders and the images in the application itself. The images does not appear in the gallery nor in the file explorer. Procedure to hide photos: Long press on the image you want to hide in the default 'File Explorer' or 'Gallery' and the click the share option. Select the Brightness Manager application and follow the steps. A default folder is provided to save the images. You can create new ones as per your wish too. Procedure to Unhide: a. Long press on the hidden pic seen inside the application to get the unhide option. b. You can select the "Select to Unhide" button at the bottom to select multiple files to unhide. Once the files are selected , press the Unhide button at the bottom to unhide the pictures. The unhidden pictures are stored in the folder named "Brightness Manager" in the sdcard.... You can hide as many photos you want. There's practically no limit.... So happily stock your personal images inside your smart phone without making others aware of it. In case of any problems you can mail us at contactdeveloper007@gmail.com

La aplicación imágenes de buenas noches trata de una sencilla app que contiene muchas imágenes (actualmente más de 100 imágenes y fotografías) con las que dar las buenas noches a tus amigos o incluso a ti mismo. Su funcionamiento es bastante sencillo. Sólo tienes que abrir la app y te mostrará una imagen con una frase de buenas noches o a lo mejor una fotografía que evoque un feliz sueño. Las imágenes que aparecerán en la app se cargarán de forma aleatoria, así tendrás la gran ventaja de sorprenderte cada vez que entres en la aplicación. De todas formas también cabe la posibilidad de que vayas cambiando entre imagen e imagen de forma aleatoria también pulsando en un botón. Cada una de las imágenes con frases de felices sueños o de buenas noches las puedes compartir por whatsapp con un simple gesto, sólo tienes que pulsar el botón de compartir para desearle muy buenas noches a tu amigo o amiga, o también desearle felices sueños a tu novio, a tu novia e incluso hay bonitos mensajes de buenas noches para enviar a tu familia. Esta opción sólo la podrás utilizar si tienes los programas asociados instalados, como por ejemplo whatsapp, gmail, telegram... Pero eso no es todo. Esta aplicación contiene la opción de utilizarse como widget. Esto es que puedes añadir el widget de la aplicación en tu pantalla y tener una foto diferente de buenas noches cada día para irte a dormir con un bonito mensaje. También cabe la posibilidad de compartir la imagen de buenas noches que te está mostrando el widget directamente pulsando en el botón compartir. Puedes seleccionar por ejemplo el WhatsApp para enviar esa imagen, o sino otro programa como telegram, line, gmail... que permita el envío de imágenes. The images goodnight application is a simple app that contains many images (currently more than 100 images and photographs) with which to say good night to your friends or even yourself. Its operation is quite simple. Just open the app and it will show an image with a goodnight phrase or perhaps a photograph that evokes a happy dream. The images that appear in the app will load randomly, so you have the advantage of surprise each time you enter the application. However it is also possible for you to go changing between images also randomly pressing a button. Each of the images with sentences or sweet dreams good night's can share by whatsapp with a simple gesture, just press the share button to wish good night to your friend, or even wish sweet dreams to your boyfriend, your girlfriend and there are beautiful goodnight messages to send to your family. This option can only be used if you have installed associated programs such as whatsapp, gmail, telegram ... But that's not all. This application has the option to be used as widget. This is where you can add the widget of the application on your screen and have a different photo goodnight every day to go to bed with a nice message. It's also possible to share the image you goodnight widget is showing directly by clicking on the share button. You can choose for example WhatsApp to send that image, but another program or as telegram, line, gmail ... to allow sending pictures.

description: "Pokédex pour Android" est le pokedex français le plus complet disponible sur Android ! Idéal pour les gens qui veulent tout apprendre sur les Pokémon, de Bulbizarre à Diancie en passant par Pikachu, Méga-Dracaufeu ou encore Genesect, et qui veulent avancer facilement dans les jeux vidéo. Quelques caractéristiques de l'application : - Liste des Pokémon avec leurs caractéristiques (types, lieux de rencontre, descriptions, évolutions, stats de base, attaques apprises, etc); - Liste des attaques avec leurs caractéristiques (portée, puissance, précision, type, effets, etc); - Liste des groupes d'oeufs; - Liste des talents et leurs effets; - Liste des natures et leurs effets; - Recherche avancée de Pokemon. Et toutes ces informations sont dans votre poche ! Pas besoin de connexion Internet (sauf pour l'affichage de la petite pub en bas de l'écran, mais ce n'est pas indispensable pour utiliser l'application) ! N'hésitez pas à me contacter par e-mail (mon adresse est écrite sur cette page) pour me proposer des modifications et améliorations ;-) --- QUELQUES NOUVEAUTES PREVUES - Team builder; - Outils de stratégie; - Prise en compte des données des générations précédentes; - Et plein d'autres choses encore. --- PERMISSIONS DEMANDEES L'application demande plusieurs autorisations et voici pourquoi : • Les autorisations "ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" et "INTERNET" sont uniquement requises pour permettre l'affichage de la petite publicité en bas de l'écran. --- COPYRIGHT © 2014 Pokémon. © 1995–2014 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK Inc. Pokémon, les noms des personnages Pokémon, Nintendo DS, Wii et WiiWare sont des marques commerciales de Nintendo. Les autres marques commerciales appartiennent à leurs propriétaires respectifs. L'application et son logo ont été créés par Kévin Carnal. "Pokédex for Android" is French pokedex most complete available on Android! Ideal for people who want to learn about all Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Diancie through Pikachu, Charizard or Mega-Genesect, and would easily advance in video games. Some features of the application: - List of Pokémon with their characteristics (types, meeting places, descriptions, developments, base stats, learned attacks, etc.); - List of attacks and their characteristics (scope, power, accuracy, type, effects, etc.); - List of egg groups; - List talents and their effects; - List of natures and their effects; - Advanced Search Pokemon. And all this information is in your pocket! No need for Internet connection (except for the display of the small pub at the bottom of the screen, but it is not essential to use the application)! Feel free to contact me by email (my address is written on this page) to offer me changes and improvements ;-) --- SOME NEW SET - Team builder; - Strategy Tools; - Taking into account the data of previous generations; - And many more. --- PERMISSIONS REQUESTED The application requires several permits and here's why: • Authorizations "ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" and "INTERNET" are only required to enable the display of the small advertising at the bottom of the screen. --- COPYRIGHT © 2014 Pokémon. © 1995-2014 Nintendo / Creatures Inc. / GAME FREAK Inc. Pokémon, Pokémon character names, Nintendo DS, Wii and WiiWare are trademarks of Nintendo. Other trademarks belong to their respective owners. The application and its logo were created by Kevin Carnal.
release_text: - Pokémon: premières infos sur Hoopa - Forme Déchaîné; - Design: pour une meilleure lisibilité, les fiches des Pokémon sont divisées en onglets et les barres de recherche se trouvent dans la barre de titre. Les stats sont affichées avec des barres de progression. - Le Pokédex vous parle: sur la fiche d'un Pokémon, un bouton vous permet d'écouter l'application vous lire une brève description du Pokémon ! - Correction d'un bug avec la copie de la base de données;

description: Machining, Milling, Turning, and operating the Lathe is no kids play. Although common in today’s computerized world, most CNC machines are pre-programmed or are operated by a select few “intelligentsia” and specialists. Work with wood, you need a specialist. Work with metal, you need a specialist. Work with ice, you need a specialist. Work with Innovation, you need a specialist. Cutting, Drilling, Milling, despite being easy have stayed the forte of specialists. And yes, some of the best hobbyists in machining are specialists. So how does one become a specialist? Fundamentals, and only Fundamentals are elementary, my dear, to becoming a specialist. Without fundamentals, it’s not only difficult, it’s next to impossible not just to become a specialist, but a hobbyist too. Without fundamentals, one cannot touch the controls of a machine, any machine, a car, a rocket, and even a CNC machine. Without fundamentals, one doesn’t even know what the controls are, leave aside controlling and manipulating these controls. In this first app in the world (both the Android world and Iphone world) which details all CNC Codes with diagrams, with equations, with explanations, we bring you simplicity. Simplicity by simplifying the fundamentals of CNC machining. The G codes and the X codes, the H codes and the M codes. You heard of it. We bring it to you. All from A through Z. And all of them with pictures and diagrams and drawings – beyond the typical run-of-the-mill definitions. So whatever arcs you choose, whichever axis you choose, whatever you want to drill into, whatever you plan to bore into, download the app, and keep pecking. Level: Introductory / Basic This course has passed through Subject Matter Experts and has their approval. However, as with any technology, theories and logic changes with time and difference of opinion may arise. We do appreciate such conflict of opinion. If you wish that your conflict of opinion should be incorporated in a future edition of this app, please write to us (alongwith the relevant proof for the conflicting opinion) and we would be glad to do due diligence to it. As an example, despite the presence of ISO standards, most people still use FANUC standards which is manufacturer specific. Note: This app can be used offline. This app is FREE. This app is AD free.

description: NonoCube is a challenging 3D puzzle game where players use logic to chisel away at puzzle cubes and uncover the secret objects hidden inside. Expanding on concepts from Sudoku and the "Japanese Crossword", NonoCube takes the classic nonogram puzzle into the third dimension to stretch your brain and challenge your wits! With NonoCube’s unique puzzle-creation technology, players will never have to guess to solve each of the game’s growing library of puzzles. If you love puzzle games like Sudoku, download NonoCube today! - No guessing ever! In NonoCube there are paths to solving every object. - Challenging puzzles, backed by a special algorithm that makes them difficult but also guarantees a logical move is always available. - In-game tutorials will guide you on your way to becoming a NonoCube master. - Over 10 hours of puzzles to solve, with more on the way! - First Platinum Pack (10 more hours of puzzles) is now available! We are currently hard at work bringing you even more puzzles; follow @nonocubegame on Twitter for release information and game updates. We also want to hear your thoughts! Send questions or suggestions for improvement either in-game or via email ( support@graycode.com ).

description: "Necessary and educational." - Anna Grace, Appszoom . . In this unique educational game you play as ►The Guardian◄ and are assigned three young people who need your help to recognize abusive dating behavior. The Guardian accomplishes this through three unique types of gameplay. . . ☺☺☺☺☺ GAMEPLAY ☺☺☺☺☺ . Stage ONE: Tap -n- Fly . First you will need to fly over, under, and around obstacles to get to your young charge when you recognize abusive behavior! . Will you be flying at night or during the day? Will it be in clear weather or through the rain? Guess what ... ? It depends on the time of day and the weather where YOU are because The Guardian dynamically updates based on your location, time of day, and current weather! . Will a rainy day game be different than playing with clear skies at night??? . Stage TWO: Answer the Quiz . Once you get to your young charge you need to alert them to the abuse - but you can only do this if you are able to accurately identify the type of abuse involved! How much do you know about controlling behavior? Or about alcohol abuse? Digital abuse? Sexting? To help your teen you will need to be able to identify all of these warning signs of an abusive relationship - and many more! . Stage THREE: Rotate to Gain Confidence and Support . After successfully addressing three types of abuse for your teen it is time to encourage them to seek help - using your smartphone or tablet you will be tilt-ing them in the right direction! . When you have successfully helped one of your teens you aren't finished - you have a total of three teens that need your help so there's no time to rest on your wings! Can you help all three of your young people and earn your golden wings? . "The Guardian" is the award-winning video game from the 2014 Life.Love. Game Design Challenge. The Guardian, playable in both English and Spanish, is designed and developed to help teens, parents, and teachers understand teen dating violence. . ♪♫♪♫♪ PRAISE AND AWARDS ♫♪♫♪♫ . "A recommended app in high schools ... necessary and educational." - Appszoom . "I loved that you used three age groups and that both genders were represented; great job!" - Dr. Elizabeth L. Richeson, Psychologist . "Outstanding! Amazing effort." - Simon Carless, Chairman Emeritus of the Independent Games Festival . "Excellent style and graphics." Professor Jon A. Preston, Program Coordinator, Computer Game Design and Development at SPSU . 1st Place, 2014 Life.Love. Game Design Challenge . ♂♀ ♂♂ ♀♀ TEEN DATING VIOLENCE ♂♀ ♂♂ ♀♀ . The Guardian: TDV Missions is a fantastic casual educational game created to protect teens, tweens, and young adults from teen dating violence, a problem which affects 44% of all students by the time they graduate from college. Teen dating violence is more than just physical or sexual abuse, it also includes emotional, psychological, and verbal abuse too . . . and it can happen to anybody regardless of gender, ethnicity, socioeconomic status . . . it is an equal opportunity problem and awareness is critical to prevention. . . ♥♥♥♥♥ JENNIFER ANN'S GROUP ♥♥♥♥♥ . This game is brought to you by Jennifer Ann's Group, a nonprofit charity which has been producing video games to protect teens from dating violence since 2008. Jennifer Ann's Group is named in memory of Jennifer Ann Crecente, a high school senior killed by her ex-boyfriend. In her name we are protecting teens from dating abuse through awareness, education, and advocacy. . ► ► ► Together we will #stopTDV ◄ ◄ ◄ .

description: ☆ Game Rules ☆ Paigow is a comparing card game played between the player and the dealer. The goal of the game is to divide a seven-card hand into a left hand with five cards and a right hand with two cards. The pattern of the left hand must be greater than that of the right hand. If each hand of the player is higher than that of the dealer respectively, the player wins. If each hand of the player is lower than that of the dealer respectively, the player loses. In other cases it is a tie between the player and the dealer, and the player's bets are returned. Paigow is dealt from a shoe containing one deck of cards inclusive of 52 cards plus one joker. The joker is a wild card which can be used only as an ace, or to complete a straight, a flush or a straight flush. For each round, seven cards are dealt face up to each hand, starting from the player and alternating between the hands. After the player divides his hand cards, the comparing rules are applied to determine who is the winner. The round is then finished, the outcome is announced and winning bets are paid out. ☆ Comparing Rules ☆ ・Pattern Order: Royal Flush > Straight Flush > Four Of A Kind > Full House > Flush > Straight > Three Of A Kind > Two Pair > One Pair > High Card ・Rank Order: A > K > Q > J > 10 > 9 > 8 > 7 > 6 > 5 > 4 > 3 > 2 ☆ Payout ☆ If the player defeats the dealer, the winning bets are paid out according to the player's card pattern. ・Royal Flush pays 5 to 1. ・Straight Flush pays 3 to 1. ・Four Of A Kind pays 3 to 1. ・Full House pays 2 to 1. ・Flush pays 2 to 1. ・Straight pays 2 to 1. ・Three Of A Kind pays 1 to 1. ・Two Pair pays 1 to 1. ・One Pair pays 1 to 1. ・High Card pays 1 to 1.

description: Practice division sums with the Everlasting Maths Worksheet. Choose from 3 levels of division sums from basic to three figure problems but does not deal with decimal long division. It does however include problems where there is a remainder. Each sum is randomly produced one at a time on a blackboard style interface. Audio and visual encouragement let's you know when you are right and when you need to try again. Personalised certificates encourage improvement. Can be played landscape on a phone but best played on a tablet. This App is intended as an encouraging alternative to the rather mundane printed worksheets that students often have to complete to practise division sums. Suitable for UK Key Stage 2, 3, 4 & 5 - USA 2nd to 12th Grade (Age 7 - adult) Grey Olltwit Educational Programs: - Simple design makes them suitable for all, including Special Needs students e.g. ADHD, Autism, ASD etc. - Suitable for all ages. No furry animals or pre-school graphics - Certificates and/or High Score Tables reward good effort - Made in England by an Englishman No adverts. No in-app purchases.

Shuffle 'n Slide is a great puzzle game that starts with an image that is sliced into 9 pieces. The pieces are shuffled, and your job is to reconstruct the original images by sliding the pieces. Features: Slide tiles to recreate the original image. 135 beautiful nature images and wildlife. Compete against others on a global top scores list. Based on the classic 15-puzzle.

Volume Control is an amazing app that lets you take control of your device’s volume – instead of being controlled by it! HOW IT WORKS Volume Control is extremely easy to use. Simply tweak existing or create new pre-defined volume profiles, and toggle between them with just a single touch. Individual profiles are comprised of: Alarm, Media, Ringer, Notification, Voice (in-call), Bluetooth and overall system volume. AUTOMATED CONVENIENCE Volume Control also detects when you insert headphones or activate Bluetooth, and automatically toggles to your preferred volume profile. You can even create automatic scheduled presets based on time of day, physical location, or a calendar event. For example, if you plan heading into a business meeting, simply tell the app to turn off your ringer at precisely that time. Of if you're heading for a workout, tell the app to pump up the volume when you arrive at the fitness club. The list of possibilities is virtually limitless! ADDITIONAL SPECIAL FEATURES Here are some of the other special features you can look forward to: - Custom volume settings and ringtones for VIP contacts - The option of separating or linking ringer volume and notification volume - The ability to change ringtones for alarm, ringer and notifications - Notification shortcuts for quick and easy access to controls and presets - Integration with Tasker and Locale via the built-in preset plugin INTERACTIVE WIDGETS You can also access a fantastic suite of fully interactive Home Screen widgets, including: - Preset (apply a set of audio settings); - Preset List (apply any preset) - Volume Locker (change/lock volume levels) - Vibrate (toggle vibrate settings for ringer and notification) - Ringer (toggle the ringer mode between silent, vibrate, and normal) - Dashboard (various interactive volume controls) Please note: to access the widgets, the app should not be installed to your SD card. Some Android versions may require a reboot for widgets to appear on your widget drawer. AVOID ACCIDENTAL CHANGES You’ll also love the cool “Pocket Locker” feature, which automatically prevents accidental volume changes by locking volume settings when your device screen turns off. MULTIPLE LANGUAGE SUPPORT Arabic, Czech, Danish, German, Spanish, Finnish, French, Hindi, Hungarian, Italian, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean, Malaysian, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Slovak, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese. PERMISSIONS Please note that the following permissions are required to use the app (the function/reasons are provided in brackets): - Full network access/view network connections (bug reporting, Google maps, usage). - Read calendar (schedule presets based on calendar events) - Modify system settings (change advanced volume settings) - Coarse and fine location (detect location changes for scheduled presets - Control vibration (notifications) - Read/Write external storage (access custom icons and ringtones) - Run at startup (restore settings after startup) - Read phone state (required to separate the ringer and notification volume on all Android versions)

Have you experienced any difficulty reading menu while you are traveling? Now you have a Solution! Menu Translator shows you a translation of menus by just placing a Smartphone camera on top of the actual text that you want to translate. Here is How it works: 1. Download the Menu Translator 2. Download the language dictionary you want to translate 3. Start the application and simply place a Smartphone camera in front of the text you would like to translate. AR translator with word recognition camera will do the rest. It is that Easy! Let’s try and experience on-the-go translation application. And order right menu at the right time！ Tip: 1) The accuracy will be affected if the font on the menu is uncommon, or too large or too small. It may not read properly if the menu names are too unique. 2) In the environment where it is too bright or too dark will reduce the accuracy of the Menu Translator. 3) Use of Menu Translator will NOT incur any data transmission fee for your phone, because this translation process does not require network connectivity. 4) Menu Translator can be used on any Smartphone or Tablet equipped with camera and running Android 2.3 or above. *Hutchison 3 hk shall be the only mobile operator in Hong Kong which provides Menu Translator.

description: Stronger enemies, powerful weapons, mission style instructions, amazing power -ups... all this and more awaits you in Skyblock Island Survival Games. ★☆★☆Play for Keeps★☆★☆ Number 221 had been stealing medicine. Not a lot, just a little bit, every day, hidden away in a vent. This was no easy feat in a totalitarian world where everything and every person was accounted for every minute of the day. A genius scientist, Number 221 was under orders to mass produce chemical missiles and viruses that would be strategically spread to deal with population control. He was under contract. Under orders. Under control. Number 221 was planning mutiny. But how do you destroy monsters without becoming one of them? There was no guarantee he'd survive. The medicine dissolved easily in the coffee, leaving no trace of evidence behind. He poured a cup for himself, and his guard. He sipped the poison, the antidote tucked safely in his lab coat. His guard did not have the same benefit. As his insides began to write in result, he waited for evidence the poison too was effecting his companion. As the man fell to the ground, Number 221 flipped the lid of the vial and tossed back the contents. The guard was a fool to trust a scientist, especially one willing to drink his own poison to ensure his success. Number 221 stepped over the body, drew a vial of the odious man's blood to pass security, and slipped from the lab he knew all too well. He wasn't anywhere close to being free. The safe house was a far way off and they would notice his absence soon. They would not risk losing him. He was too valuable. To survive, he was going to need to be careful. He was going to need to fight. ★☆★☆Battle for Supremacy ★☆★☆ Are you skilled enough, fast enough, powerful enough, and capable enough to eliminate all targets and complete the map in a designated time? If you are, you'll be rewarded with the advantage of a permanent weapon. What if you could earn a perk from the get-go that would assist you in your quest? Would you accept the help? If you want to start off with a amazing power-up, you'll be offered the opportunity to watch a short video clip to earn it. You'll need to be quick. Collect ammo and weapons as you navigate beautiful 3D pixel worlds in first person fighting style. Run, sprint, crouch and jump to take the upper hand in defeating your enemy. A new, user-friendly interface boasts a new menu screen with map-style level select, but be aware, you'll need to unlock these levels by defeating the level before. Your enemies are stronger and more intelligent than ever, and with their higher health and damage, the fight you face will be no easy task. Fight hand-to-hand or wield an epic selection of melee and firearm weapons and take aim. Precision aiming will help you target your enemy and gain the advantage. Be ruthless in your approach. Your survival depends on it. Top Game Features: *Accept your mission *Take aim with precision shooting *Entity map with aerial views *Stronger enemies boast a tough challenge *Loading screen game tips *Hand-to-hand combat *Weapon pickup *Power-ups *Map-style game select *Beat the clock
release_text: New User Interface and Controls Beat the Mission Time to Unlock Unique Permanent Weapons Earn Permanent Power-Ups such as Double Damage and Body Armour Disable Ads Option Improved Ammo Pick-up Quick Reload Universal Ammo Crates Mission Selection Map Difficulty Settings Sensitivity Settings Fixed various bugs

description: Meltdown on Mars is a stunning action base-defence title. The player is the last survivor of the human colonists on Mars. Remembering to use the base and terrain to their advantage, they can guide the aliens down a narrow passage or into corners making them easy to ambush and destroy. Or just go on a rampage! Love travelling with friends but hate doing the math afterwards? Figuring out who paid for what and how to split the expenses has now been made easy for you by Receipt Ninja. It is extremely simple to track and split group expenses and you can conveniently share the financials with your buddies using Email, SMS, Google Drive or Dropbox. Let Receipt Ninja manage your expenses and you just go get on the road! Key features include: -Sync with other members (no pictures). -Track receipts with pictures. -Split group expenses anyway you want (evenly or unevenly). -Share the report details and receipts using Email, SMS, Google Drive or Dropbox. -Each member has a coefficient which can represent a sub-group such as a couple or a family. -Avoid circular debts (A owes B, B owes C, C owes A). -Export to Excel (csv file). -Support SD card backup and cloud backup using Google Drive or Dropbox. -Support multiple events, multiple users, and multiple currencies. Permissions: Contacts, Accounts - Suggesting contact names/phone numbers/emails, backup to Google Drive, Sync Internet, Phone state - Sending reports using SMS/Email, backup using Google Drive/Dropbox, Sync SD Card - Storing of receipts, backup App is Ads-supported. Buy "Receipt Ninja: No Ads" to remove Ads and support the developer. Free users can create one synced event. To sync unlimited events, please install "Receipt Ninja：No Ads". Please note that the sync feature does not sync pictures, if you want to save pictures to the cloud, please use backup to Dropbox or Google Drive. Please report crashes when they happen. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any comments or suggestions. We keep on adding new features requested by our users. Tags: share expenses, split the bill, bill splitter, split money, finance, budget, management, currency, spending, saving, trip expense, trip expense tracker, travel money, travel expense, travel expense tracker, group expense, settle debts, expense manager, expense tracker, receipt tracker, receipt organizer, receipt scanner, IOU, Mint, CWMoney, Expensify, Moneywise, Tricount, Billmonk, Billpin, Settle Up

Whether you are learning math, want to brush up your knowledge, help your kids or just enjoy math quizzes, this fun application is right for you. Learning and practising math is always more fun when it's part of a game. This application uses game play to challenge both kids and adults alike. Questions range from basic to advanced to improve your math skills. Different game play modes can be used test your speed and knowledge. So, whether you want to play under the pressure of a timer or see how far you can get with multiple choice questions, this quiz will inspire and build your confidence. The Ultimate Math Skills Quiz will give any math novice the confidence to tackle school math, explore more advanced concepts and most importantly build a solid foundation for future math. The topics covered are: Algebra Geometry Data Handling & Charts Fractions, Decimals & Percentages Multiplication and Division Order of Operation Ratios Powers & Roots Approximation Unleash your math genius with your mobile today!

description: Carte d’Or Dessert Creator - simple yet fun game with dynamic gameplay and stunning graphics! Catch delicious ice cream and juicy fruits to reveal inspiring dessert recipes. Make sure that you have enough Carte d’Or ice creams scoops and necessary ingredients in your dessert cups to unlock each recipe. Collect the ingredients as fast as you can before the time is out and ice creams melt down. Remember that not all the ingredients should be in the dessert. Some of them are simply destroying the taste! Avoid garlic, onions and pickles! Perform combos and challenge your friends to get more points and have the best score among players from all over the world! Discover 25 unique Carte d’Or ice cream desserts in “Your Dessert” mode. After passing each level you will see a list of required ingredients and detailed instruction on how to prepare extraordinary ice cream desserts in real life. Thanks to Facebook integration you can easily share recipes with your friends. Everything with a single tap! Switch from “Your Dessert” mode to “Pure Pleasure”. Score as much points as possible by collecting Carte d’Or ice cream scoops and delicious ingredients in a given time. Catch bonuses and add extra time to a ticking clock. Who knows you may even get on the top of the leader boards? Whichever mode you choose earn achievements and get rewards such as new music themes, backgrounds and ice cream spoons. Bring even more fun to your game! Game features: - two exciting game modes - 25 unique desserts to discover - lots of delicious ingredients to catch - amazing combos - fun and addicting gameplay - rewards and bonuses - online leader boards

With this world athletics updates app, you will have all the latest information on athletics. You will get latest news on and build-up to the most famous sporting events such as Olympic Games, IAAF World Championships, Common Wealth Games, World Indoor Championship, IPC Athletics World Championships, Paralympics, Boston/New York/London marathon events and many more. Athletics is split into the following: TRACK AND FIELD; includes running (sprints, middle, long-distance events, hurdling) jumping (long jump, triple jump, high jump and pole vault) and throwing (shot put, javelin, discus and hammer). The Chivery app has been updated, so it’s time to update that stale wardrobe. Naturally, we’ve got the newest, freshest, raddest, and most official CHIVE gear on the entire Internet. Come to think of it — we’re the *only* place to get CHIVE gear on the Internet. We’ve also got tons of funny t-shirts, service gear, hoodies, drinkware/barware and a bunch of other cool stuff. So if want to come to the party, you really have no other choice. Plus, The Chivery’s shopping app has some special features you can’t get online: • Quicker access. Our gear goes Ostrich-fast. If you want to beat others to that new hoodie or Bill Murray tee, trust us, you’re gonna want a jump on the competition. • Push Notifications. We’ll alert you when we drop those amazing new designs. It’s like smoke-signals only faster … and easier on your eyes and lungs. • Photo check-in. Wanna show off your new gear? Wanna see if there are other Chivers in your area showing off theirs (their clothing, we mean)? Simple. We’ve got a global map that you can interact with, post photos and see Chivers and Chivettes from around the world.

description: HotSchedules’ Android application 2.0 includes a completely revamped interface and delivers an incredible user experience. It is compatible for use on both smartphone and tablet devices. The HotSchedules mobile application is a powerful, fast and intuitive tool that gives current HotSchedules users the ability to manage their work schedules right from a smartphone or tablet. True to our passion to serve those who serve others, HotSchedules is benefitting over a 1 million users that depend on our products to view their schedule, communicate with their peers, and manage their labor. Managers, do you want to be a superhero to your employees? With HotSchedules mobile now you can! Use this app to see who’s working, approve employee requests, and record your daily operations. With over 18,000 companies using HotSchedules, chances are you’re just a click away from releasing the shackles of paper schedules. Make sure to ask if your company uses HotSchedules. description: Fine Chromatic Tuner is a chromatic instrument tuner that allows you to quickly and accurately tune your instrument using the built-in mic in your Android device. Features nice and clean interface allowing you to quickly find your pitch. The Fine Chromatic Tuner was adjusted and tested with acoustic guitars, soprano ukulele, tenor uke and electric guitars. I believe that it will work with any mid to mid-high range instrument as it was fine adjusted for the 70 Hz - 500 Hz. So this one is not suitable for bass guitars for example. I will make a different app for the low range instruments soon. This is automatic chromatic tuner that supports every screen size. Fine Chromatic Tuner works well with devices supporting 44100 16 bit audio input (almost every phone and tablet in mid - high price range) and 22050 16 bit audio input. It still works with the other possible settings but not so accurate. Features: - Automatic note selection - Ultra responsive -50 to +50 cent range fine tuning display - Precise to ±1/100 semitone (±1 cent) - Analog like needle - Exact frequency display. - Clean and simple analog like UI - Keep screen on while working. - Works in noisy surroundings THIS IS VERSION 1.20 (BETA) so if you find any problem please write me an email and I will fix it as soon as possible! This is a Fine chromatic tuner free app - for no ads version check the PRO.
release_text: 1.75 More stable high notes Improved brass instruments support 1.71 As some of you have requested these features I have updated the tuner. I hope you will find it to be a bit better now * Reaction time is decreased by 20 milliseconds * Release time is adjusted to some better values

This is no Wimbledon, this is Tennis in the Face! Get ready for some hilarious ragdoll-smashing ball-bouncing action! Help Pete Pagassi to save the city from an evil energy drink corporation Explodz. Knock out creepy clowns, evil riot police and other Explodz-addicted maniacs with a tennis ball in the face. Bounce the ball off walls to reach targets lurking in cover and watch them tumble hilariously. Trigger masterful chain reactions and watch the chaos unfold. Finally enjoy the level finale in slow motion! REVIEWS "10tons knows how to create a hilariously good time, complete with excellent level design, ridiculous characters, and an almost believable fake energy drink." - GameZebo ★★★★ "The entire game is bursting with polish with great art design, and finely tuned physics engine." - Apple'N'Apps ★★★★ "It’s fun, interesting and never stopping to question if it’s crazy or not." - Bunch of Gamers ★★★★ DESCRIPTION Tennis in the Face is a hilarious bouncer-game where you save the city from the evil Explodz Inc. with your extraordinary tennis skills. Simply move your finger on the screen, observe the aiming line, and lift your finger to serve a furious tennis smash. The ball bounces off walls and platforms and triggers Explodz-crates, ball tubes, and countless other objects. Your actions will set off chain reactions and you'll watch the events unfold while knocking out the enemies. The more enemies you knock out with a single serve, the higher your score! Win levels to move to the next district and towards your ultimate goal: The destruction of Explodz mega-factory. Try to earn a crown from each level! Join ex-tennis-pro star Pete Pagassi in his quest to save the city from the grasp of Explodz! FEATURES - Easy to pick-up bouncer gameplay - Hilarious ragdoll characters - Slow motion level finales - More than 100 levels plus bonus game modes - A dozen challenging achievements LINKS Learn about the game: tennisintheface.com Learn about Explodz: explodz.com

Main features: - Intelligent Search Smart phones automatically search all video and music files , fast and convenient - Support all popular video and audio file formats Video formats include the following : 3G2, 3GP, 3GP2, 3GPP, AMV, ASF, AVI, DIVX, DV, F4V, FLV, GVI, GXF, ISO, M1V, M2V, M2T, M2TS, M3U8, MKV, MOV, MP2, mp2v, MP4, MP4V, MPE, MPEG, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG4, MPG, MPV2, MTS, MTV, MXF, MXG, NSV, NUV, OGM, OGX, PS, REC, RM, RMVB, TOD, TS, TTS, VOB, VRO, WEBM, WM, WMV, WTV, xesc, Audio formats include the following: 3GA, A52, AAC, AC3, ADT, ADTS, AIF, AIFC, AIFF, AMR, AOB, APE, AWB, CAF, DTS, FLAC, IT, M4A, M4P, MID, MKA, MLP, MOD, MPA, MP1, MP2, MP3, MPC, MPGA, OGA, OGG, OMA, OPUS, RA, RAM, RMI, S3M, SPX, TTA, VOC, VQF, W64, WAV, WMA, WV, XA, XM - Subtitle support Supports multiple subtitle formats , automatic synchronization , and you can add subtitle files manually - Use hardware decoding , the advantages of using hardware acceleration - Takes up little memory , simple operation , quick start, smooth playback support - Support for Flash video format , FLV, ASF video - Simple list view video and audio Support video thumbnail display , more intuitive - HD video playback depth memory optimization - Support gesture control Supports gesture control brightness, volume , and progress during playback ; - Playback History List - Support online video Just enter the correct network video address ( such as http, mms, rtsp , etc. ) , you can watch online video - Playback speed control - Sleep Time setting You can set your sleep time to turn off the player ------------------ Disclaimer： This app is based on VLC for Android Beta, and licensed under the GNU General Public License ver3 or later. GNU General Public License: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/

description: แนะนำเกม "3K Legend"เป็นผลงานเกมมือถือครั้งยิ่งใหญ่ที่อิงมาจากศึกประวัติศาสตร์สามก๊กสุดอมตะ ในโลกแห่งเกมที่สรรสร้างขึ้นจากเอกลักษณ์ที่โดดเด่นของแม่ทัพแต่ละคน ด้วยประสิทธิภาพของระบบQTEใหม่เอี่ยม ทำให้ปล่อยสกิลฉูดฉาดบาดตา แตกค่ายทลายศัตรูได้ง่ายๆแม้ในยามวิกฤติ！ "ผู้เล่นสามารถรับสมัครและดูแลวีรบุรุษสามก๊กที่หาตัวจับยาก, เปิดศึกกับกองกำลังมอนสเตอร์,BOSSดันเจี้ยนหรือแม้กระทั่งกับผู้เล่นด้วยกันเอง, ฝังอัญมณีอันแยบคาย, คุมสถานการณ์ในสนามรบเพื่อพิชิตชัยชนะ,ตั้งค่ายทัพให้สมบูรณ์ แสดงศักยภาพของแม่ทัพเต็มขั้น จงสร้างวีรบุรุษนักรบที่เป็นของตัวคุณเองเพื่อเป็นหนึ่งในใต้หล้า! " เนื้อเรื่อง ยุคปลายราชวงศ์ฮั่นตะวันออก จักรพรรดิทรงอ่อนแอ ขันทีมีอำนาจเป็นใหญ่ในแผ่นดิน ข้าราชการทุจริตฉ้อราษฎร์บังหลวง ก่อความเดือดร้อนแก่ชาวบ้านทุกครัวเรือน ขุนศึกหัวเมืองต่าง ๆ พากันกระด้างกระเดื่องและตั้งกองกำลังส่วนตัวขึ้น กลุ่มอิทธิพลต่าง ๆ ทำสงครามแย่งชิงอำนาจกันโดยไม่สนใจรัฐบาลกลาง 　ตั๋งโต๊ะบุตรชายข้าหลวงเมืองหลงซี รับการแต่งตั้งเป็นเจ้าครองนครและเข้าแทรกแซงการทำงานของขุนนาง ใช้วิธีการโหดร้ายไร้ความปราณี ราษฎรต่างประสบความทุกข์เข็ญพร่ำวอนให้แคว้นต่างๆรวมกันเป็นหนึ่งเดียวเพื่อชีวิตที่สงบสุข ด้วยเหตุนี้เหล่าผู้กล้าผู้มีปณิธานมุ่งมั่นจึงรวมกลุ่มกันกำจัดตั๋งโต๊ะ 　　เรื่องราวของ"3K LEGEND"เริ่มต้น ณ จุดนี้ ผู้เล่นทั้งหลายจงให้แม่ทัพฝึกยุทธ จัดวางตำแหน่งให้ดี ขจัดตั๋งโต๊ะ สู้ลิโป้ ปราบโจโฉ คืนสันติภาพสู่ใต้หล้า สำเร็จเป็นหนึ่งได้ดั่งใจหวัง ลักษณะพิเศษของเกม 2Dเสมือนจริงสุดปราณีต：ฉากสู้รบตระการตา，เอฟเฟคสกิลสุดเท่ห์，ฉากสามก๊กแท้ๆบวกขุนพลที่มีสไตล์ของตัวเองกว่าพันชีวิต ออกแบบขุนพลให้มีบุคลิกเฉพาะตัว：สกิลขุนพลหลากหลายสะท้อนให้เห็นเอกลักษณ์ที่แตกต่าง อีกทั้งอาวุธเฉพาะตัว เหล่านี้ทำให้ขุนพลของคุณโดดเด่นไม่ซ้ำใคร ในสถานการณ์ต่างๆที่ปล่อยสกิลคุณจะได้เห็นลูกไม้แพรวพราวที่เปลี่ยนไปเรื่อยๆของจอมยุทธแต่ละคน！ ออกแบบการต่อสู้เป็นเอกลักษณ์：ลงมือง่ายดาย ตีแรงสะใจ โจมตีต่อเนื่องหลายสกิล โชว์เอฟเฟคพิเศษขั้นเทพ การต่อสู้ของคุณจะไม่น่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป เชิญเพื่อนรักมาร่วมศึกสามก๊ก：บอกลาความโดดเดี่ยวในโลกแห่งสามก๊ก เชิญเพื่อนมารับรางวัลด้วยกัน ฝึกฝนเร็วจี๋เพื่อส่งคุณขึ้นแท่นอันดับหนึ่ง！ นอกจากนี้เรายังมีจุดเด่นอีก5ข้อ： กิจกรรมมากมาย: เข้าเกมแล้วรับของขวัญใหญ่ทันที เติมเงินครั้งแรกรับรางวัล2เท่าไปเลย Side- scrolling turn-based: ปล่อยท่าไม้ตายได้เพียงปลายนิ้วสัมผัส ปะทะมอนสเตอร์กับBOSSแต่ละตัว PKให้มันส์กันไปเลย เรื่องราวสะเทือนใจ: รักสามเส้าระหว่างเตียวเสี้ยน,ตั๋งโต๊ะ,ลิโป้ เป็นต้นเหตุของเรื่องราวทั้งหมด รีบไปช่วยศิษย์น้องหญิงกันเถอะ ขุนพลดังเข้าสนามรบ: รับขุนพลสามก๊กกว่าพันคน รวมพลต่อสู้ด้วยค่ายกลที่แยบคาย พากันไปKoในลานประลอง ชิงบัลลังค์ฮ่องเต้: ผู้ชนะสูงสุดย่อมเป็นราชันย์ ขุนนางบู๊บุ๋นคุกเข่ากราบหน้าท้องพระโรง สาวงามมากมายรอท่านที่วังหลัง description: Clumsy Mr. Bunny tripped over the wrong switch in the carrot factory with his big feet. Help him collect as many carrots as possible to fix the mess he made. Directions: Tap the left or right side of the screen to direct Mr. Bunny to the falling carrots. You have one minute to collect as many carrots as possible! Lives: Watch out! Every time a brick hits Mr. Bunny's head he loses a life. Collect shiny bunny heads for extra lives. Speed: Collect an energy drink for a speed boost! Jump: Gather enough carrots in a short period of time and a flashing red jump button will appear on screen. Tap the button to collect all on-screen carrots and safely clear falling bricks!

Smart Repeat is designed for your foreign language study. It enables you to select and repeatedly listen to only a designated section of a tune or an audio book. Have you ever wanted to repeatedly listen to only a particular section of a language program? Or ever wanted to listen to all the new word sections? Using Smart Repeat, you can make your own 'audio program'. No need to edit the original file. All you need is to tap where you want to start and tap where you want to stop. Then Smart Repeat will repeat only the selected section of music or audio file as many times as you want. Want to rewind only 5 seconds? Want to fast-forward exactly 30 seconds? You can customize the skip search buttons to the number of seconds you want to skip. Smart Repeat can also 'bookmark' a particular spot of a file. Bookmarks can be accessed with a tap on the skip button. Set the number of times you want to repeat, and Smart Repeat will repeat the file as many times as you want and automatically moves to the next file. Or you can choose to endlessly repeat the same section over and over again. Big PLAY, PAUSE button is easy to tap! You can select the colors of buttons from a wide variety! If earphone is disconnected or when receiving an incoming phone call, Smart Repeat will automatically pause. Want to learn French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Russian, Mandarin, Cantonese, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, Nepali, Hindi, Thai, Cambodian, Philipino, Indonesian or Swahili? "Repetition is the mother of learning"! Use Smart Repeat to help you master a language! Differences between free edition and paid edition 1. Free edition displays advertisements. Paid edition does not. 2. Free edition can mount only up to five files on the play list. Paid edition has no restriction on the number of files.

description: If you have a preschooler just starting to learn shapes and colors, this is the perfect app for you! 12 clever and colorful puzzles will delight, entertain and educate your young boys and girls as they learn to identify basic shapes and colors. Circles, rectangles, octagons, triangles and stars- this app has it all! Whimsical drawings transform these basic learning concepts into fun characters that come to life when a puzzle is completed. See a square businessman do a little dance with his square puppy, check out aliens hovering in their hexagonal spaceships and an oval fish and a rectangular whale under the sea! Garden bugs and snails crawl around while a trio of stars dance and fly through the sky, and series of circular cats bounce and twirl, and a trio of square, circle and triangular friends wave to say hello. If your child is in preschool or kindergarten they will love this fun educational game! Kids will love these puzzles for the bright colors, funny characters and appealing animation, parents will love the app for its safe, kid-friendly environment. Features: * Rich, colorful graphics by children's book illustrator Laura Tallardy. * 12 different cute shape puzzles to choose from! * Positive encouragement. * Fun shapes to pop at the end of each puzzle! * Increasing difficulty. * Easy for kids to use and control. For more information on our privacy policy, please visit: http://scottadelman.com/privacy-policy/
release_text: New App Release by Scott Adelman Apps Inc and Laura Tallardy!

description: Take to the skies on the back of your dragon and challenge dangerous ninja fighters, mighty dragons and flying firepots. Choose one of the four Dragon Warriors who master the elements Rock, Fire, Ice and Storm. Demonstrate your skills, improve your equipment and collect extra powers during the game, to fulfill your missions even more successfully… Notice for Parents: NO IN-APP-PURCHASES requiring extra costs included in this app. With the activation codes from the four "PLAYMOBIL Dragons" bags (available in stores), additional game contents can be unlocked. - choose one of four experienced Dragon Warriors who have different skills - make your way through an overwhelming crowd of opponents - you can use the codes from the "PLAYMOBIL Dragons" bags to unlock additional equipment for the elements Rock, Fire, Ice and Storm - win coins and use them to equip your Warriors with even more powerful swords, shields and banners - fend off the dangerous Black Dragon's fire attacks - rotate between the different game figures as often as you like

해외여행 가격비교 어플은, 해외여행을 준비하시는 분들이 보다 편리하게 여행상품을 비교 선택 할 수 있도록 지원해 주는 어플리케이션입니다. 해외여행은 크게 패키지여행과 자유여행으로 두가지로 나눌 수 있으며, 본 어플에서도 2가지 여행별로 상품을 비교 하실 수 있도록 구현하였습니다. * 패키지 여행 - 단체여행 개념으로 여러사람(보통 12명~15명)이 그룹을 이루어서, 가이드의 안내에 따라 동일한 여행지를 둘어보는 여행입니다. * 자유여행 - 통상, 항공권과 호텔만을 사전에 구매하고, 현지에서는 각자의 취향에 맞게 자유롭게 여행하는 방식을 말합니다. ======================================== 해외여행 가격비교 어플에 등록된 여행사들은, 여행업계 상위에 있는 인지도와 안정성을 갖춘 여행사들로 이루어져 있으며, 여행사별로 다양한 지역에 다양한 여행상품을 제공하고 있습니다. ** 참여 여행사 목록 - 세중투어몰 - 투어2000 - 온라인투어 - 모두투어 - 노랑풍선 여행사 - 롯데관광 - 하나투어 - 웹투어 입니다. ======================================== 어플내에서 바로 상담, 예약 등이 가능하며 특히, 예약한 부분에 대해 마이페이를 통해 실시간으로 진행상황을 보실 수 있도록 하였습니다. 이제, 해외 여행은 "해외여행 가격비교" 어플 하나로 충분히 알뜰하게 다녀오실 수 있습니다.~ ======================================== "해외여행 가격비교" 어플에 등록된 모든 내용은, 모바일 여행 포털서비스인 "투어자키"에서도 동일하게 보실 수 있습니다. ======================================== 다음은, 모바일 여행 포탈서비스인 "투어자키" 어플 소개입니다. ★★ 코리아 모바일 어워드 베스트앱 공모전 우수앱 선정, 한국무선인터넷산업연합회장상 수상 ★★ 여행관련 어플리케이션 중에 유일하게 선정되어, 명실상부한 여행 필수 어플로 자리매김하게 해 주신 많은 사용자분들에 진심으로 감사드립니다. ======================================== 본 모바일 서비스는 AppDream에서 개발,관리,운영하고 있습니다. ======================================== Overseas Travel Price Comparison This application is an application that assists those who prepare to travel abroad to choose more easily compare travel deals. International travel can be divided into two large package travel and freedom to travel, so you can compare the products has been implemented by two kinds of travel in this application. * Packages - Groups of people to travel concept (usually 12-15 people) yirueoseo this group, a trip to see duleo the same destination by following the instructions in this guide. * Free travel - Usually, buying tickets and hotel only in advance, and refers to the way in which local travel freely to suit your own taste. ======================================== Travel Agency registered in the international travel price comparison apps are, and consists of the travel agency with a reputation and stability in the travel industry, top, offers a variety of tours to various regions by travel agencies. ** Participation travel list - Triplicate Mall Tour - Tour 2000 - Online Tour - All tour - Yellow Balloon Travel - Lotte Tour - One Tour - Web tour. ======================================== In my application right down to business, booking is possible and in particular, we have to help you view your progress in real time through a part of my pay for the reservation. Now, foreign travel can be affordable enough to go into town one "international travel price comparison" app. ~ ======================================== All contents registered in the "international travel price comparison" app, a mobile travel portal service "Tour Jockey" can be found in the same. ======================================== Next, a mobile travel portal service "Tour Jockey" The introduction of applications. ★★ Korea Mobile App Award Excellence Awards Best app selection, Korea Wireless Internet Industry Association Award ★★ Superiors Is the only selection in the travel-related applications, and sincerely thank the many people who gave it to establish itself as a truly essential travel apps. ======================================== The mobile services are developed in AppDream, management, and operations. ========================================
