description: The Loan Calculator helps you to calculate the EMI (Equated monthly Instalment) or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate of home Loan, Car Loan. It also shows loan repayment schedule with total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. Main Features - Loan EMI Calculation - Loan Compare tool to compare 2 different loans - Calculate the affordable loan amount based on the affordable EMI. - Loan Refinance - Loan Repayment Schedule - Calculate EMI or Tenure or Loan Amount or Interest Rate by entering other three values. - Total interest paid and total principal amount paid at the end of every financial year. - Send SMS - Send Email Message - Send Repayment schedule as email attachment. - Total Amount Paid added - Currency Symbol. - Change start month of Financial Year. - Settings for Default Values - Tenure & Interest Rate, Currency Symbol, Reload Last Values - Customized start month of financial year. description: Can you cheat death? Save the residents of a remote town where you ended up chance before the ancient evil takes up your soul in this creepy hidden object game. TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE VIA IN-APP PURCHASE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! Features: ● 30 hand-drawn hidden object scenes ● 19 mini-games and puzzles ● Thrilling adventure with unpredictable ending ● Unlockable bonus chapter Being at the death's door, a mystery novelist Adora Graves was obsessed of finishing her last detective story, The Rite of Resurrection. Based on some ancient folio she had found, it promised to become a bestseller. However no one could have predicted the outcome. Now the town of Beacon is enveloped in ominous fog driving the townsfolk out of senses. An unlucky passerby, you find yourself trapped in the cursed city. Explore the maze of the deserted streets, follow the clues and pick up the trail of a mysterious book that inspired Adora to write that deadly novel. Scour tricky hidden object locations and solve unique puzzles on your way to the truth. Confront the revengeful wraith and unlock exclusive bonus chapter from within the game. Can you cast away the darkness and defeat the sinister spirit released by the dying writer? Find it out in Revenge of the Spirit: Rite of Resurrection, an eerie Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!
release_text: Version 5.2.14 We have fixed a number of minor bugs and added other minor polish. Play and have fun!!! Thank you for your great feedback and support!

description: Space Invaders - shoot waves of aliens earning as much points as possible. Back in 1978 it swept the world and became a first "killer app" for video game consoles. The game was so successful that in Japan it was attributed to the shortage of 100 yen coins and in 1982 it grossed 3 times more than newly released Start Wars movie. It has been ported to numerous platforms. So why should you give our version a try? We tried to recreate all the fun of the game in a tiny download of a little more than 100Kb. Waves of colorful, funky-looking aliens are descending on Earth, and your mission is shoot them down before they can land. Tilt the phone to move from side to side, shielding your ship behind the brick-wall defenses. The longer you take to eliminate the aliens, the closer they get to the ground. Shoot down the extraterrestrial spaceship at the top of the screen for extra points. Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...
release_text: Completely redone to improve performance. Fixed screen sizing problem for Android 4.4. Improved sound latency.

description: If you are a fan of games like Sudoku but you are sick of numbers, Elemental is your game! Use your brain to create elements by mixing earth, air, fire and water to solve puzzles. Complete puzzles as fast as you can and win the high score. You can use tips that teach you how to mix the elements. Each tip contains a famous quote that you can tweet and share with your friends. If you’re still stuck, you can also place a spell that magically puts a piece on the board right where it belongs! Sounds easy, right? Not so fast...the more tips and spells you use, the less points you will earn! You can also connect to OpenFeint and check your scores and ranking against players from all around the world. You can also unlock clever achievements as your skills improve. Elemental is a free app for smartphones and tablets. The game is perfect for mobile phones like Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Europa, Samsung Galaxy S, Samsung Galaxy Ace, HTC Desire, HTC Evo, Motorola Defy, LG Optimus One and many others. Available in English, Spanish and Portuguese. Visit our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/vostuelemental *** UNDERSTAND THE PERMISSIONS REQUESTED BY THE GAME *** COARSE (NETWORK-BASED) LOCATION – We use this information to feed our analytics tools and determine which areas have more players. So we can improve the game for different audiences. FULL INTERNET ACCESS – Used for sending analytics data, error reports and also to access OpenFeint. But is not required be connected to the internet to play. READ SENSITIVE LOG DATA – We use this permission to read the log of the device and determine which was the link used to download the game. So we can identify the most efficient distribution channels. MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS – This allows you to store Elemental on your SD card!

Favorite local rock quarry closed due to rain? Waiting for the local shop to finish your axle swap? Crawl 4x4 can help you wait. For the wheelers on the go, this intense combination of 2D physics and rock crawling inspired game play will satisfy even the most hardcore off-road appetites. description: NOTE: We advise all users to upgrade to version 2.1 as soon as possible. This update resolves a lot of known bugs and stability issues. ------------------------------ Do you enjoy reading stories? Do you enjoy writing stories? If so then Pocket Writers is for you. Pocket Writers offers something for everyone who enjoys reading. From classic stories to your friends stories Pocket Writers is a great way to read: whether in bed, on the tube or in the middle of a field; Pocket Writers provides a simple, uncluttered reading interface, and remembers your position within a story with it’s automatic bookmarking system. Come back to the same chapter, in the same place - even on a different device. Pocket Writers offers something for everyone who enjoys writing. Got a great idea for a story? Then why not write it. Pocket Writers has a simple three-step publishing system. Give us a title, write your story, publish. It really is that easy. You can save your stories as drafts and come back to work on them later - even on a different device. Want to take a story in a different direction? With Pocket Writers you can. You can write the next chapter of any story, or even write a different version of the current chapter. The only limit for a story is now YOUR imagination. Like what you’ve read? Why not review the chapter to let other people know what you think. Share the chapter via your social networks. Follow the author so you can find other stories that they have written. Reading and writing has just become a whole lot more social….

The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers, and they are divided into two groups by age, the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. description: Use this free app to learn from the Pros and compare your swing to the very best. Enhance your training experience by pairing the free app with the Zepp multi-sport sensor.. Zepp Baseball-Softball is a revolutionary training system that helps you improve your swing through instant analysis in 3D and Video. With our new free video analysis tools you can compare your swing side-by-side with MLB All-Stars like Mike Trout, Giancarlo Stanton and David Ortiz and softball legend Jennie Finch. The app is also designed to work with the Zepp multi-sport sensor. Just attach the sensor to the handle knob of any baseball or softball bat and swing away to get data and instant feedback and see your swing in 3D from any angle. Stop guessing at how to improve and let Zepp show you how. Get the FREE app today and start improving your game with Zepp! VIDEO ANALYSIS TOOLS — Free • Record HD video of your swing • Compare your swing side-by-side with MLB All-Stars like Mike Trout, Giancarlo Stanton and David Ortiz and softball legend Jennie Finch • Replay swings from multiple angles and go frame-by-frame • Use drawing tools analyze your swing mechanics • Watch pros swing analysis videos 3D SWING ANALYSIS — Zepp Sensor required • Capture and analyze your swing in 3D from any angle • Track bat speed at impact, bat speed max, hand speed, time to impact, attack angle, vertical bat angle and more • Overlay and compare your swing in 3D to MLB players • Get personalized tips, drills and coaching • Set goals and track your improvement
release_text: 1. Introducing three time all-star Paul Goldschmidt to the roster of Zepp Pros. 2. New subtitles added in Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Chinese (Traditional). 3. Optimized loading speed between players when managing multiple accounts.

Polizei FL ist die kostenlose App der Landespolizei des Fürstentums Liechtenstein. Sie informiert über aktuelle, polizeirelevante Ereignisse in Liechtenstein und unterstützt in Notlagen. News - Durch die neuesten Pressemitteilungen, Neuigkeiten und Fahndungen inkl. Fotos ist man über aktuelle, polizeirelevante Ereignisse sofort informiert. - Grössere Ereignisse können als Push-Mitteilung automatisch empfangen werden. (Kann deaktiviert werden.) Notrufe - Notrufnummern und weitere Informationen verschiedener Rettungsorganisationen können direkt aus der App angewählt werden. - Mittels der angezeigten Koordinaten kann (bei aktiviertem Ortungsdienst) die eigene Position einfach abgelesen und am Telefon durchgegeben werden. Radar - Ein besonderes Highlight ist die genaue Kartendarstellung des Standortes der semistationären Geschwindigkeitsmessanlage. - Standortwechsel der Geschwindigkeitsmessanlage können als Push-Mitteilung automatisch empfangen werden. (Kann deaktiviert werden.) Police FL is the free app of the National Police of the Principality of Liechtenstein. Informs about the latest, police-related events in Liechtenstein and support in emergencies.   News - Thanks to the latest press releases, news and manhunts including photos you are informed about current, police incidents immediately. - Major events can be automatically received a push message. (Can be disabled.) Useful - Emergency telephone numbers and other information from various rescue organizations can be selected directly from the app. - By means of the displayed coordinates can simply read your own position (if enabled location service) and be given over the phone. Radar - A special highlight is the exact map display the location of the semi-stationary speed measuring system. - Relocation of the speed measuring system can be automatically received a push message. (Can be disabled.)
release_text: - Neueste Google Maps Technologie. - Berechtigung "User Accounts" wird bei der Installation nicht mehr benötigt. - Push-Mitteilungen für "News" können auch auf Android empfangen werden. - Bei Geräten ohne Hardware-Menu-Button wird unter News ein Software-Button eingeblendet, um die Push-Einstellungen aufzurufen. - Verschiedene Verbesserungen und Optimierungen.

Bible Battle is a collection of trivia that challenge your knowledge of the stories in the Bible. How well do you know some of these stories? Why did David choose to fight Goliath? Why was Joseph sold into slavery? What lead to Jesus’s execution after being found innocent of crimes? The Bible encompasses numerous stories of Love and Faith as well as Murder, Deceit and illustrates the strength and might of God. Disasters like flood and fire destroys cities and culture, people escape from slavery and persecution, peasants unite and emperors fall. These are stories that repeat in our history and show the fallacy of people. Through our Love and Faith, humanity re-establishes what is good and continues to battle against the evil in the world. This game is great for everyone who wants to know more about the events and people in the bible that shape the history of our world today.

Welcome to the last unit converter that you will ever need. This is the easiest and fastest way to convert units. This high precision unit converter allows all conversions to be seen and solved in real-time. No Internet needed for conversions! There is no pressing on an Enter or Next key. There is no scrolling through long lists trying to find the units. This intuitive app is designed in such a way that speed is your friend here. It has mainly the common units so that the unused excess doesn't get in the way. "All the units are just one click away." - No other unit converter can say that! Features:  - GUARANTEED simplest and quickest interface (if not, email me)  - Hide units (and unit categories) that you will never use  - Sort units that you do want by size or name - Different rounding modes  - Great native/pure Android themed app that fits your device theme - Android Lollipop supported! Version 10 converts the following units: - Angles (Mil, Degree, Radian, Circle) - Area (Centimeter², Inch², Feet², Yard², Meter², Square, Perch, Acre, Hectare, Kilometer², Mile²) - Currency: 34 of the most common monetary units (Pro) - Data (Bit, Nibble, Byte, Kilobyte, Megabyte, Gigabyte, Terabyte, Petabyte, Exabyte, and more) (Pro) - Fractions (Decimal to Fraction and Fraction to Decimal and a reference sheet) (Pro) - Fuel consumption / Mileage (Kilometer/Litre, Mile/Gallon(US), Mile/Gallon(UK), Gallons(US)/Mile, Gallons(UK)/Mile, Litre/100km, Litre/km) - Length (Millimeter, Centimeter, Inch, Decimeter, Feet, Yard, Fathom, Meter, Kilometer, Mile, Nautical Miles) - Metric Prefixes (Pico, Nano, Micro, Milli, Centi, Deka, Hecto, Kilo, Mega, Tera, Peta) - Power (Erg/hr, joule/hr, ft*lb-force/hr, milliwatt, calorie/hr, btu(IT)/hr, joule/sec, newton*m/s, volt*ampere, watt, kilocalorie/hr, horsepower, kilowatt, megawatt) - Pressure (Pascal, KiloPascal, HectoPascal, Torr, mmHg, inHg, PSI, Bar, Atm, cmH2O, ftH2O) - Speed (Kph, Feet/Second, Mph, Knot, Meters/Second, Speed of Light, Speed of Sound) - Temperature (Fahrenheit, Celsius, Kelvin, Reaumur) - Time (Second, Minute, Hour, Day, Week, Month, Year, Decade, Century) - Torque (Dyne*Meter, Gram-force*meter, Pound-force*foot, Newton*meter, and more ) - Volume / Liquids (Drop, Milliliter, Teaspoon, Tablespoon, Fluid Ounce(US/UK), Cup, Pint(US/UK), Quart, Liter, Gallon(US/UK), cubic foot, cubic meter, Olympic pool reference) - Weight / Mass (Grain, Gram, Ounce, Troy ounce, Troy pound, Pound, Kilogram, Stone, Short Ton(US), Metric Tonne, Long Ton(UK)) - More including: Energy, Dynamic (Absolute) Viscosity, Kinematic Viscosity Note: Some of the lesser used units and categories are hidden by default to keep the interface more manageable. This can easily be change from the "Edit" menu option. Convert your units now with this friendly, easy interface. It's the best unit converter that just works, no problem. My Contacts Backup is the easiest way to backup and restore your contacts all from your phone without needing a computer or synchronization. You can backup all your contacts with a single touch and send yourself as a .vcf attachment via email. All contacts can then easily be restored any time by simply opening .vcf file in your mailbox. Key Features: * Offline Backup. No need to sync to any server. Just email the backup file to yourself. * Your adress book is secure and safe. We don't access or store your contacts. * Easy restore. No need to any app to restore backup file. Just tap on the *.vcf backup file in the Android or iPhone mail client. * Easily transfer contacts between Android or iPhone devices using just email client. * Copy backup file to your computer via USB cable feature. * Set REMINDER to backup regularly (weekly or monthly) * Backup Contacts as VCF (VCard) ---------- IMPORTANT NOTE: After sending backup file (*.vcf) to yourself, please check your inbox if message arrived and contains attachment (backup file). Sometimes email providers block attachments if attachment size is too large. Try with another mail account if possible, to send your backup file. Or copy backup file (on SD card) to your computer via USB cable. ----------

My Effectiveness Habits - Full Control of My Productivity: My Roles, My Goals, Tasks, To-do, Lists, Projects, Plans, GTD ®, Achievements, and more. Thank you - we've got >6555 reviews now (and growing), with average 4.5! + more than 5000 5-star ratings + ~ 1450 4-star + only ~150 lowest ratings! Just some recent feedback from users in reviews: + "This is something!!" + "Love it" (many times) + "Good app" + "Brilliant" + "Amazing" (many times) + "Wow" + "Awesome" (many times) + "Wow. Just wow" + "Impressive!!" + "Life changing", + and many others. We sincerely hope you'll have similar reaction after you use the app and it does help you! We are not perfect, yet, but we do evolve with you and your support! Thank you! To have a clear vision of what to do, you have to clear your mind of the concerns and worries, generate a higher overview with goals and roles, plan your weekly actions and projects. This is what My Effectiveness Habits is for - to give You full control over you plans, goals, actions, todo-s - over your productivity. Uniquely configured, with feedback and motivation, the Habits are much more powerful and elaborate than any of the hundreds of simple To-do and task lists, GTD apps out there. The only app that helps you understand " Why to do? ", plan " What to do? ", and then " Do It "! My Effectiveness Habits is FREE and with NO Ads ! The app is not for those who need a simple, thoughtless list to write down there todos. If you want control over your vision, plans, goals and actions - then you should use My Effectiveness Habits. If you want to really increase your productivity, not just check off the items, what you'd easily do without any app - then the Habits is the right app for you! 'The Habits' help you increase your Productivity: + Define your principles (Mission) + Remove distractions (Influences/Concerns) + Set your Priorities + Describe you Life Roles + Identify your Goals + Create a comprehensive Action plan + Put the steps into Projects/Actions/Checklists + Use unique Weekly Plan view for week actions and week goals! + Concentrate on the Next action using Pomodoro technique + Google Drive™ integration A productivity framework, The Habits have what other GTD and productivity applications are all missing: it helps you define your priorities and vision of your goals, overview and motivation of your deeds, plans, actions. Using it, you create a hierarchy of actions to reach your goals, where Actions of one Goal are totally separated from Actions of Another Goal, thus helping you concentrate much better on the current Goal and Action. If you have just any issue, feedback or a simple thought about the application that you want to share with us, we are very happy to get that. Please, send them to ksasdk@gmail.com , or, write them anywhere in the http://andtek.blogspot.com , or within the review comments. The feedback from you is very welcome! The principle is: 1. Write what is your mission in life. 2. Write down what concerns you have and which ones you can influence - visualize them in the circles. 3. Define your roles. Look at your life from different points. 4. Set the goals you want to reach for each role. You can set long-term or short-term goals. 5. Define concrete steps - actions. You can have a single step actions, or you can define complex, multi-level project, or simple checklists. 6. Proritize your actions using 2x2 matrix (a.k.a. Eisenhower matrix). 7. Assign tasks to week days (use weekly planning). The app is written inspired by the Great book by Dr. Stephen R. Covey "The 7 Habits of highly effective people". Account persmissions are required for Google Tasks API access. Notification sound used: https://freesound.org/people/Lalks/sounds/316848/

description: HIGH definition. The widget has been tested on the most Android devices with different operating systems, and the result was excellent. A great HD WIDGET to monitor the level and condition of the battery. Graphic simple but exceptional. The widget is designed to achieve excellent performance while saving as much as possible battery, memory and resources. The colors of the widget vary from state to state and battery level. The default colors are: * Green - Battery charging (0% - 100%) * Blue - Battery not charging (21% - 100%) * Yellow - Low battery (11% - 20%) * Red - Very low battery (0% - 10%) There are also: - advanced battery status * big widget * name of status * temperature of the device * battery technology * battery voltage * battery health - history level, temperature and voltage Displays a diagram showing the battery level in the last period for up 24 hours. - Battery Usage ( only if supported ) - Install widget instructions - Custom colors task ( color, light, halo of light, round corner ) - Statistics task ( Max temperature [°C],Max voltage,Max charging time,Max charging delta level,Max not-charging time,Max not-charging delta level,Last charging time,Average charge per hour,Average discharge per hour,Remaining charging time,Remaining discharging time ) - 3 different size for widgets. - on/off airplane mode. - Ability to choose two colors at once Not all statistics will begin to work immediately because they need data to work with. A step of charging / discharging is considered such if it varies at least 5% of the battery. Note: Not all devices support effective monitoring of the temperature and battery voltage. The screenshots have been triggered by an emulator so the values of some sensors are zeroed, and the precision of the graph is low because i manually insert values. The widget has been tested on most Android devices and works perfectly. Required Permission: - Execute at startup. The application uses this option to autoavviarsi to extract when you need information on the battery. Without this option, the user each time the device would have to open it or have the widget installed. - Write settings This permission allows to turn on/off airplane mode However it is possible to disable the auto start (only works if the widget is not installed).
release_text: 11.0 GUI improved. Statistics bug fixes. Added different size for widgets 12.0 GUI improved. Compacted database by 20% Added 2 parameters in the color task. Ability to disable the auto start of the service (only works if the widget is not installed). Bug fixes. Existing data will be removed to compact the database. I apologize for the inconvenience. 13.0 Bug fixes. Added airplane mode. 14.0 Ability to choose two colors at once Charts improved Bug fixes

Timetable is the most beautiful and intuitive app on Google Play for managing your school or university life. Save your timetable and all tasks from homework to exams. You only need to enter them once, because Timetable syncs across all your Android devices. Often forget to turn down your phones volume? No problem the app automatically mutes your phone during lessons. Quick overview - synchronise data between all your devices - optimised for phones and tablets - light and dark theme available - easily save your lessons, tasks and holidays - view your timetable as list and as grid - search in your timetable and tasks - optional two,three or four week cycle - one 4x1 widget for each lessons and tasks - one resizable widget (2x2 minimum) for each - lock screen widgets for each (Android 4.2) - notifications for lessons and tomorrows tasks - automute phone during lesson - dashclock extension Permissions - Full network access: needed for synchronisation - Receive data from Internet: needed for synchronisation - Find accounts: needed for synchronisation - Read sync settings: needed for synchronisation - Write sync settings: needed for synchronisation - Start at boot: needed for automute and notifications

description: Discover your perfect home or rental in Texas using HAR.com’s award-winning real estate search and top-rated real estate app which offers a wide range of search filters, the most up-to-date listings (updated every 15 minutes) from Texas MLSs, and powerful search options such as save searches, favorite homes, search history and more. Now, agents and consumers (home buyers, sellers and renters) can connect with each other on the same platform to share real estate information. Some of the features of the HAR.com app include: • Search – It’s easy to find a home or rental, save favorite listings and view property search histories. • Refine Search – A wide range of search filters such as proximity, price, square footage and more. • Search by Drive Time - Locate homes available for sale or rent within a designated commute time. • Listing Details - Most comprehensive listing details include room dimensions, interior and exterior features, open house schedules and more. • Photos - Easily slide through a photo gallery for each listing (up to 32 photos). • Favorites - Find the home of your dreams, save your favorites and organize them! • Save Searches - Save your searches and receive email alerts for price or status changes. • Browse Nearby - Schools, parks, places and more. • Print-Friendly - Print any listing or document right from your device. Anytime. Anywhere. • Contact Agent - Easily contact the listing agent or broker for a specific property. • Home Values - Search more than 8 million single-family homes, condos, townhomes, country acreage properties and residential lots in Texas, even those not currently listed for sale or rent. • Find A Pro - Look up any one of thousands of Texas real estate professionals or their offices! You can also view agents in your area based on prior sales and current listings. Texas real estate professionals (HARMLS subscribers) have real-time access to agent-only MLS information. Some of the features of the HAR.com app include: • Archives - Direct access to MLS, view archive and agent full report. • Tax - Access to tax information (including values and tax rates). • Showing - Access showing information and have the ability to make appointments online. • CMA - Instantly create a CMA for your clients. • Forms - Real estate legal forms at your fingertips. • Calculators - Powerful financial calculators. • IDX - Agent branded information is now included when you share listings! • Document-Sharing - Sharing documents is now amazingly simple. Just click the link to view, share and more! • Tools – Check your leads and listings as well as the company’s listing inventory. • The ultimate app for Houston real estate agents and brokers.

description: Mahjong Oriental is a free mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.(also known as Shanghai Mahjong, Taipei Mahjong, Kyodai, Mahjong Trails, or Shanghai mahjongg) The goal is to remove all tiles from the board. You may remove only paired free tiles. The tile is free when there are no tiles either to the left or to the right from it. If you cannot find any pairs you may shuffle the tiles at any times, but you will get a time penalty. Features - 100 board layouts. - 6 backgrounds. - 3 tile art. - Shuffle - Hint - Undo - Auto save - Block shadow - Auto zoom in Enjoy!

!!IMPORTANT!! DON'T install or update this unless other apps let you install it. This is a library which won't work by itself. This APK is for ARMv7 devices, such as Tegra 2 devices. What's Vitamio Vitamio is a multimedia framework for all Android devices. Vitamio works like the Android's default MediaPlayer except that it includes much more powerful features. And it's absolutely free ! Network Protocols The following network protocols are supported for audio and video playback: MMS RTSP (RTP, SDP) HTTP progressive streaming HTTP live streaming (M3U8), for Android 2.1+ Media formats Many audio and video codecs are packed into Vitamio beside the default media format built in Android platform, some of them are listed below. divx/xvid wmv flv ts rmvb mkv mov m4v avi mp4 3gp Subtitles Vitamio support the display of many external and embedded subtitle formats. SubRip(.srt) Sub Station Alpha(.ssa) / Advanced Sub Station Alpha(.ass) SAMI(.smi/.sami) MicroDVD(.sub/.txt) SubViewer2.0(.sub) MPL2(.mpl/.txt) Matroska (.mkv) Subtitle Track More features There are more wonderful features available in Vitamio. Background playback Multiple audio tracks support Mutitiple subtitles support, including external and embedded ones Processor optimization for many platforms Buffering when streaming Adjustable aspect ratio Automatically text encoding detection And many other features are waiting for you ! How to use Vitamio Please refer our website at http://vitamio.org Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any problems. Privacy We must notify you that Vitamio will collect those information to improve itself when you using it. UniqueID generated from Device identifier Vitamio reads your device identifier to generate an unique ID and collect the generated one instead of your device identifier. Most important, this generation can't be reversed. So don't worry about this, as it's not harmful. Device's CPU features and screen size. Vitamio will work on many different Android devices, different CPU architectures, different screen sizes and so on, so it needs to know the environment. The app's package name which is using Vitamio There're many apps which may use Vitamio, so Vitamio should know which process is using it to allocate proper resources. Licenses Vitamio uses sevral opensource projects, thanks to them. FFmpeg, universalchardet

Tired of confusing, poorly built flashcard applications with features that you never use? Pocket Cards is a clean and modern take on flashcards. With an emphasis on simplicity, Pocket Cards allows you to quickly create cards and study them efficiently. Use the interactive UI to quickly go through a set of cards while waiting on the bus or during a break. Create sets on Quizlet on your computer or create a list of favorite Quizlet sets and use them directly in Pocket Cards. • Access your sets and favorites from Quizlet • Sort your cards using sets • Differentiate sets using accent colors • Sleek and modern dark/light themes • Interact with cards using gestures • Test your knowledge of a set by choosing the Test mode • Cards that are marked wrong will repeat more frequently • Flip front and back of card for more thorough studying
release_text: Changes for 1.1.5 • Fixed a crash when closing the application Changes for 1.1.4 • Access your sets and favorites on Quizlet Changes for 1.1.3 • Fixed bug when deleting cards • Targeting Android 4.3 Changes for 1.1.2 • Added the light theme and made it default (change to dark in settings) • Layout fixes for higher density devices Changes for 1.1.1: • Default sorting of cards changed to 'Front' text • Enable swiping of card from screen edges

description: 9/10 – “It’s brilliant to see such a celebrated series treated respectfully on Android. Worms 2: Armageddon is the real deal”, AppStorm 8/10 - Silver Award - "If the franchise has burrowed its way into your affections at all over the past decade, this is the mobile version for you", Pocket Gamer 4.8/5 – “Amazing” – “Some of the best franchises don’t last more than two or three titles, let alone eighteen years. There’s a definite reason for that. Download the game and see for yourself”, AndroidShock 4.5/5 – “You should not miss this game”, RealDroidGaming Grab your grenades and prepare for battle, as the worms are back, bigger and better than ever in Worms™ 2: Armageddon! The best-selling turn-based-strategy blast-a-thon is now available on Android, with new weapons, brand new customisation options and of course, more explosions! Worms™ 2: Armageddon features: • Authentic Worms™ gameplay with cartoon-style visuals, comical audio and a refined control system using the innovative touch screen user interface • New to Worms? Make sure to check out the Practice mode, where you can try out weapons against A.I. dummy worms • 30 Single Player missions across 5 new themes including Manhattan, Medieval, Sports, Construction and Cheese • Body Count Mode, take on endless waves of increasingly tough enemy worms • Take on players from around the world with online Wi-Fi multiplayer action for 2 players • Pass-and-Play with hotseat local multiplayer action for 2-4 players • New weapons and utilities, including the Sentry Gun, Electromagnet, Napalm Strike, Super Sheep, Petrol Bomb, Armageddon, Pneumatic Drill, Earthquake and Poison Strike • Classic Worms™ weaponry, including the return of the Sheep, Holy Hand Grenade, Concrete Donkey, Parachute, Baseball Bat and Ninja Rope • Personalise the look of your team by changing your worms names, hat, skin, speech bank, gravestone, fort and victory dance! • 12 different Game Styles including new modes Fort Mode and Crazy Crates and the return existing modes Easy, Normal, Pro, ‘Bazooka and Grenade’, Melee, Gun Show, Heads Up, Lightside, Darkside and Sudden Death. You can even create your own Custom Game Style! • Leaderboards • Achievements NOTE: Team17 offers no support for third party or edited ROMs. Any performance or critical issues experienced on a non-standard factory ROM for any device will not be supported. If you would like to request support for any ROMs which are not standard, please contact the developer of the ROM directly.
release_text: · Added compatibility for Android devices using x86 Intel architecture. · Fixed a crash that occurred on certain devices when using the Sentry Gun. · Fixed an audio issue with devices running Android version KitKat 4.4. Thanks for being a loyal fan and playing Worms 2: Armageddon. We’re always listening so please feel free to send any issues to support@team17.com or tweet us your comments to @Team17Ltd. If you like Worms 2: Armageddon please consider leaving a review. Thanks!

description: Telugu News - is a quickest way to access Telugu news headlines from varied sources through Google News Feed. The service covers news articles appearing within the past 30 days on various news websites. Its front page provides roughly the first 200 characters of the article and a link to its larger content. All news from various Telugu News website in single place sorted by relevance. Key Features: * Detailed News from Source - Clicking on the individual news headlines item will take you to the actual source of the news providing detailed version of the news. [Choose browser of your favorite choice to view the news properly. Recommended Opera, Chrome browsers for better font visibility against default stock browser] * Social Sharing of News - Long press on the news headlines item will allow the user to social share the news link. Share the news through Facebook, Google+, SMS, Email etc * Easy Navigation - Swipe to change the news section or category from news page. [Left or right swipe movement with page title display] * Quick Access - Choose news section or category from home page. * User Preferences - Modify default user preferences or settings * Fetch Size - Set the number of news item to fetch per news page * Font Preference - Choose a Telugu font of your preference from a list of available fonts * Font Size - Set the Telugu font size (small, normal, large, extra-large) * Recommendation - Recommend the app to your friends and family through share icon available in news page * Additional Manual Refresh option for improper news fetch because of slow network connection Google News in Telugu, like other news editions, gathers news stories from the various Telugu news sources on the web and presents an automatically generated summary with links to the most important stories in each section. The Google News model is aimed at sending readers the best sources of news. Every link to a news story takes the reader to the news site where they can read the story in its entirety. We hope this edition will help Telugu readers reach their online news destinations faster and help Telugu news publishers to connect more easily to their readers. Disclaimer: Google News is a free news aggregator provided and operated by Google Inc, selecting most up-to-date information from thousands of publications by an automatic aggregation algorithm. The Google News Telugu edition indexes news from a large number of Telugu sources and automatically arranges these stories in different sections. Telugu News - Google is just an organized way to bring those news aggregation in a presentable manner to Android devices and news content is not owned or governed by Telugu News - Google in any respect. Telugu News - Google uses Google Services to display content that may not be Google's but is sole responsibility of the entity or publisher that makes it available through Google RSS feed. All content will be linked to its actual source as permitted by the entity or by Google.

description: Jumping Stones is a puzzle game that is inspired by the board game Solitaire. The player moves fun little stones across the board. With each move one or more adjacent stones can be jumped over. This causes the stones to disappear. The aim of the game is to have only one stone left on your board. Each stone has its own skills of jumping across the board and only with the right combination you will reach your goal. During the game, stars are collected with which new worlds can be opened. Hidden animations and cool graphics complete the gaming experience! Jumping Stones is a modern game with ancient roots: the traditional board game version, which some of you surely know from the past, has been played since 1687! Jumping Stones raises it to a whole new level! A puzzle game suited for all ages - whether you play it on the family tablet or on your own smartphone. Error messages and suggestions can be sent to our support address: support[at]mobfish.net.

Please try the demo version before you buy *** THERE IS NO MALWARE IN WEAR MESSENGER. IF YOUR ANTIVIRUS SAYS THERE IS, IT'S A FALSE POSITIVE (please, get a better antivirus!) *** Wear Messenger is an app which greatly expands your ways to send SMS messages with your fingers. Quick access to your conversations. With Wear Messenger, you have all your conversations one touch away. You can see what your buddy said or reply to him while leaving your phone in your pocket. Multiple input methods. Wear Messenger can accept voice input, quick replies (that you can freely set up), has an emoji list (accessible long-pressing the quick replies button), includes four different keyboards and supports third party IMEs, such as Minuum and iBeezi (let's type chinese fast!). Dictionaries. The phone keypad keyboard features dictionaries and gestures which will greatly speed up your typing. Gestures includes: • Left->Right: Space/Enter • Right->Left: Back • Top->Bottom: Reset • Bottom->Top: Change language Includes FlickKey technology. A new way to type has landed on your watch. The reason we choose to have FlickKey on board is because we truly believe gestures are the way to go on Android Wear. To "flick" a letter, you simply touch the square it is within and move your finger in its direction, then release. It's easy, fast and accurate. The same principle was applied to Flick Calc and to the FlickKey IME with awesome results. For more informations about FlickKey and their feature-rich IME, visit flickkey.com or email support@flickkey.com . Notifications. Your SMS app does not support android wear, or you are not comfortable with voice input? No problem! Wear Messenger can provide notifications effectively replacing your standard SMS app. Its notification features include High resolution profile pictures, stacked notifications, conversation history, mark as read (Android 4.3 or Xposed only) and all the input methods listed above. Last but not least, you can link your client's notifications with Wear Messenger's, so whenever you swipe them away on your watch or your phone, they get dismissed on the other part too. Remember to blacklist your SMS client into the Android Wear management app, or you will get double notifications. (Works best on 4.4+, might not be compatible with all clients) Customizability. You can customize pretty much everything this app does. From vibration patterns, to which buttons should the keyboards have (or not). You can also use the legacy UI if you don't like our Material inspired one. Address book access. Wear Messenger now can bring your address book to your watch. You can start a new conversation or launch a call directly from your watch. And if the number you want is not in your address book, you can type it on the dial pad. Random facts. Please check the web site page to get all the answers you may need. If you still have questions, feel free to contact us. Liking the keyboards? Would you like them on other apps, like WhatsApp? Have a look at Quick for Wear! Want to see this app in your language? Participate to the User Help Translation Initiative and get a free key! http://dc8.eu/4
release_text: Come join us on G+! http://dc8.eu/2 - Background on emojis - Round interface enhancements - Touchone support - Other minor changes *** THERE IS NO MALWARE IN WEAR MESSENGER. IF YOUR ANTIVIRUS SAYS THERE IS, IT'S A FALSE POSITIVE (please, get a better antivirus!) ***

description: AnTuTu Video Test is a professional tool for testing video playback capability of Android Smart TV, set-top boxes and other devices. It integrates a few featured videos and testing algorithms that can help users judge the playback performance of the devices clearly. AnTuTu video test can not only detect the video playback formats devices support, but also can test the playback quality of devices. Features: 1. Comprehensively detecting which video formats are supported and testing video playback quality, give a detailed report of the results. 2. Support the screen LCD test, grayscale test , and gamma test.

Pointless hurrying belongs into the past! Is it worthy hurrying for the Tube? Running and hoping there's a train going? Isn't it better to know than to guess? Of course it's always better to know. And just for this case there's a new app for Android! Your smart phone will be a lot smarter now! With just one look you can find out what time the nearest train is and you can easily change the pace and style of your walk. You can see on the first look "what time is the next train" Especially outside rush hours when the train goes sporadically there's always useful to have the information about departures. Furthermore, the Metro app works in the stations and of course you can use it to watch the time in transition points! Got 7 minut, I'm ok! Main features: -specialized application just for Prague metro -works offline, no expensive connection needed -works also without GPS -very smart and easy usable -with widget for faster usage Last data update released (accessible via app's menu): 04-7-2015

The Novell® ZENworks® Mobile Management user application ensures you have the Android applications, files and security settings you need, all the time. By connecting to your IT department’s own ZENworks Mobile Management server, it allows your IT department to keep your device optimized for your productivity, including: Automated security settings Access to Play Store applications and Enterprise applications from a single location Easily share common files with your iOS devices Regulate access to corporate resources based on specific network and software conditions Get the most from your Android device in the corporate world! This application requires a ZENworks Mobile Management server (check with your IT department for more information). To download the public beta of ZENworks Mobile Management visit www.novell.com/zmmbeta Once your IT department has a ZENworks Mobile Management server, enroll your device: 1. Download and install the ZENworks Mobile Management user application. 2. Enroll the device by specifying your username, password, ActiveSync domain and ZENworks server address (contact your IT department if you don’t have this information). 3. Security policies defined by your IT administrator will be implemented. 4. If you are using TouchDown as your ActiveSync client, your ActiveSync inbox will be created in TouchDown. If not manually create the account in your ActiveSync client using the ZENworks Mobile Management server’s address as the server address. 5. You can access administrator-defined applications and files from the Files and Apps page of the applications.

description: You are stranded on an island after a terrible shipwreck in which you are the sole survivor. You discover a thriving civilization once lived here and delve deeper to uncover the mystery of their disappearance. During your adventure you will pick up items, encounter characters, and solve puzzles that will bring you one step closer to uncovering the lost past of the island. It was the caverns that held the key. The caverns were there before the incident that caused the collapse of the city. Since the shipwreck, you’ve heard legends of an ancient civilization that once lived far below the surface. The island has changed since the incident and you intend to find out why. Features: * High definition graphics! * Point and click style gameplay * In-depth story driven adventure * Memorable and interesting characters * Fun and engaging puzzles * Beautifully detailed environments * Over 35 unique items to discover and use * In-game hints * In-game map * Auto save position * Solve the mystery that surrounds the island!

** No Ads ** The best and the original remote Android mouse and keyboard out there. AndroMouse converts your phone into wireless mouse, keyboard, and more. Connection with your computer is made either using your existing wi-fi or using Bluetooth. AndroMouse also features speech-to-type which uses Google speech recognition to make your work easier. ** Great for presentations. * Loads of new features are added in AndroMouse 4.0 Relax in your bed and search YouTube with your voice. You need to run AndroMouse Desktop Server in your computer to use AndroMouse. Please visit http://andromouse.com to download free desktop server, to watch an intro video and for a quick tutorial. description: KFSN-TV Fresno. With ABC30 StormWarn, when threatening weather is nearby your phone can be set to alert you! Weather alerts are read aloud for you so you don’t have to stop to read the screen. It’s the power of a NOAA Weather Radio combined with the accuracy of AccuWeather and ABC30 Fresno all in one convenient app! There’s no other app like it. With the FOLLOW ME feature you’ll stay safe when you’re on the go. ABC30 StormWarn can alert you to severe weather wherever you are -- whether you’re on your daily commute in the Fresno area, or travelling anywhere across the U.S. ABC30 StormWarn is fully interactive; Zoom down to get a street level view of live conditions. And of course, get current conditions, hourly and long-term forecasts right at your fingertips. FEATURES: * Follow Me – Activate this feature so that you get weather alerts wherever you are, anywhere in the U.S. No matter where you travel, the app will help keep you safe. * Set a static location – In addition to the Follow Me feature, you can set three (3) additional locations to receive alerts on. So if you’re on the road, you could still get alerts for what’s threatening your home, or where a loved one lives. * Audio alerts – Listen to weather alerts just like a NOAA Weather Radio, so you can be informed and keep moving. * Current Conditions, Hourly Forecasts and 7 Day Forecasts. * Video forecasts and live weather video (when available). It's the ultimate storm warn app you've been looking for!

Enter your location or acquire your coordinates with GPS and enjoy a precisely simulated starry sky in all its glory, including twinkling stars and the band of the Milky Way. SmartStellar also supports phone sensors which center the simulated sky on the position at which the phone is pointed to the real sky (augmented reality). Alongside numerous celestial objects, SmartStellar provides realistic views of the planets, constellation figures, solar and lunar eclipses, etc. Please note Display of comets is set to OFF by default. To display comets, do the followings: 1. Tap on the star icon on the lower right of the screen. 2. Tap comets. 3. Set Images ON. 4. Also set Codes and Names as you desire. Display Functions * 16,226 stars down to magnitude 7 visual. - Star colors, magnitudes - Name labels for 254 named stars - Mimics star twinkling * Sun, planets, and the Moon - Waning and waxing Moon (phases) - Magnified views of the Sun and the Moon * Names, lines, boundaries and pictures of 88 constellations * Popular names, marks and catalog numbers of nebulae, clusters and all Messier objects * Milky Way plus Large- and Small Magellanic Clouds * Names and marks of meteor shower radiants * Simulates the effect of daylight and twilight * Simulation of total, annular and partial solar eclipses * Horizontal and equatorial coordinate grids Selections & Settings * Opaque, transparent, or semi-transparent below horizon area * Effect of light pollution and moonlight * Date and time from 1900 to 2099 in intervals of seconds * Location setting by manual input, GPS or picked on a Earth globe * Time Zone & Daylight Saving Time Operating Environment Proper operation has been confirmed with the following devices: NTT docomo - XPERIA arc SO-01C (Android 2.3.2) - MEDIAS N-04C (Android 2.2.1) - REGZA T-01C (Android 2.2.2) - Optimus PAD L-06C (Android 3.0.1) au KDDI - ISW11NT htc EVO WiMAX - IS03 (Android 2.2.1) NOTE: Android 2.1 and lower are NOT supported. Known issues with the following devices (future support pending): - Japan Communications Milky Way and constellation pictures distorted. NTT docomo - GALAXY Tab SC-01C (Android 2.3) Earth globe not displayed in location settings. Locked objects in the center of the star chart. Milky Way illustration distorted.

description: Diese Übung ist eine der grundlegenden Übungen für ein effektives Gedächtnistraining. Du lernst Assoziationen, also Eselsbrücken zu bilden. Damit trainierst Du die effektive Zusammenarbeit Deiner zwei Gehirnbereiche. Du verbindest Deine logisch, analytischen Fähigkeiten mit Deiner phantasievollen Kreativität. Die Übung baut auf der App "Gehirntraining Bilder merken" auf, die ebenfalls im Play-Store erhältlich ist. "Gehirntraining Worte merken PE" ist die kostenpflichtige Premium-Edition mit 3 Trainingsleveln. This exercise is one of the basic exercises for memory training. You learn associations, so as to form mnemonics. So you train the effective cooperation of your two brain areas. You connect your logical, analytical skills with your imaginative creativity. The exercise builds on the app "Train your Brain to tag pictures", which is also available in the Channel Store. "Brain Challenge words remember PE" is the paid Premium Edition with 3 training levels.

Pocoyo wants to play with you! And with this new application you can become his best friend. With Talking Pocoyo, you can talk to Pocoyo and he will repeat everything you say in a funny voice. You can also tickle him, make him dance, play lots of instruments and even try to guess which animal Pocoyo is imitating! And if you want to share with your family or friends, you can save it and have fun watching Pocoyo's antics with everyone. All the fun you can imagine for your kids and for you, too! Talking Pocoyo is an interactive game in which you can do all these things: Play with Pocoyo: Pocoyo reacts when you touch any part of his body. Try to discover all his reactions! In addition, you can talk to Pocoyo and he will repeat your voice in a funny way. Musical Pocoyo: Play lots of instruments with Pocoyo and show everyone what a great composer you are. Guess the Animal: Can you guess which animal Pocoyo is imitating? Pocoyo Dances: Enjoy watching Pocoyo’s incomparable, distinctive dances. Imitate his steps and have a great time! Save and Share: Record everything that little Pocoyo does. You can watch it over and over again and enjoy all of your creations, limit-free! And if you want to share it with your family and friends, you can show it to them directly on Facebook or YouTube. With Talking Pocoyo, your kids will always have their favorite character nearby! Try it, and you will never forget the look on your kids' faces!

It’s time to channel your inner-MOGUL and conquer Capital City! Invite up to five friends, choose from one of 11 over-the-top vehicles, hone your strategy, and get ready to make some fast deals! Everything – every coffee shop and car wash, every fourplex and fixer-upper – has the potential to be a great opportunity! But just like in real life, not every deal is a good one. The key is to acquire the RIGHT houses, apartments and businesses before your opponents do. Your ability to implement your strategy with quick, decisive action and to finance deals will mark the difference between BANKRUPTCY and TYCOON STATUS! Capital City: The Finance & Strategy game is officially licensed from Robert Kiyosaki’s The Rich Dad Company and its core gameplay is based on the lessons from his original tabletop game CASHFLOW.

nuVue is a companion app for Plex and Emby users that displays rich notifications when new items are added. There is nothing additional to install on your servers. Just sign in with your Plex or Emby credentials and nuVue does the rest. Features: • Rich notifications for newly added media • See recently added media • See TV series and movies that are in-progress • See what is currently playing • Perfect for cord-cutters and automated downloads • Send messages to shared library users and owners • Forward notifications via email (premium feature) • Quick and easy playback on connected clients Plex Features: • Supports multiple Plex servers • Supports shared libraries from other users • Advanced filtering for servers, libraries, and TV series • Automatically handles both local and remote connections • Easy setup--just sign in to Plex.tv and go Emby Features: • Automatic server discovery • Emby Connect sign in for shared libraries support • Advanced filtering for servers, libraries, and TV series • Automatically handles both local and remote connections • Easy setup--just sign into your server or Emby Connect and go
release_text: Notifications" in the app settings, we can look into this behavior. Send to immersiondesignstudio@gmail.com. Thanks. Steve Bedwell 29 September 2015 Great media server companion app I use this with emby and although I can get various notifications straight from the server I like the interface and rich notifications that this provides. Very user friendly for the family - beautifully implemented - great work Full Review Jeff Nielson 16 November 2015 Works as intended with Plex I use this app to monitor usage activity on my Plex server. Works great! Only thing I can think of that would make it better is to have the ability to log activity as well. Either way, it was with the money! Thanks developers! Keep up the good work! Full Review Keith Daley 23 March 2016 Excellent app Would like to see Chromecast playback added please. Full Review Mahmoud Hafez 13 January 2016 Excellent Couldn't be easier to achieve what I was looking for long time ago! Thanks! Full Review Lucas Espinosa 18 February 2016 Didn't care for plexpy or whatever. I looked for an app alternative and this was perfect. Thanks. Full Review Shane Menshik 18 October 2015 Works Great! Developer cares about his software and works with people to resolve any issues if they come up. Full Review Immersion Design Studio 29 September 2015 An update is rolling out (v2.4.1) which should address your issues. Please update and let us know if it does not. And, if it does, please consider revising your review to reflect this. Thank you. Peter Hodges 13 October 2015 I use this with plex and it does everything it says with no fuss. Full Review Hardik Patel 3 November 2015 Awesome app. Notifications for recently added to Plex is my main reason to purchase this app. It's clean and effective. Best part is notification forwarding! This app is awesome and the developer is very helpful. Full Review Nathan Tavares 18 February 2016 App is great! Love it! I can see who is watching what and I can control how often it updates. One small change that wouldn't change my opinion on the app is to not have it detect when the admin of the plex server was watching a movie. A option to exclude me from the notifications and that would be it. Full Review Immersion Design Studio 19 February 2016 It's already there. Under the What's Playing settings there is an option to select the users to monitor. Just unchecked yourself and you will now only be notified of what others are watching. Phil Jervell 2 February 2016 Must have Best way to stay in touch with your media server Full Review Immersion Design Studio 15 October 2014 I suspect that your issue was due to your Plex server not being exposed outside of your LAN. Please try version 1.4.3 (check that this is the version you are downloading) that was just uploaded too see if nuVue works for you now. And, if so, please consider revising your review. Thank you. Thomas Kendall 5 January 2016 Awesome app, hard to find though Best part is watching the new items from shared Plex servers. The email feature needs more functionality but its good enough. Full Review Immersion Design Studio 14 February 2015 Thanks for the review. If you have ideas for the email functionality, you can join the Google+ community and share them there, or you can always email us directly. Brett Hayward 27 January 2016 Sweet app. Installed this a few days ago and it has worked like a champ ever since. I normally know what I have added but do have some media auto add and this lets me see it quickly. The best feature which I paid for is the pay it forward feature. This allows my users to download mini app to get live updates so I don't have to tell them. Hats off to the dev. Full Review Sascha Picchiantano 11 March 2016 Extremely buggy, keeps crashing, even on plain vanilla pure Android (Nexus 6P). It crashes every 1-2 minutes. Basically unusable. Stay away! Full Review Immersion Design Studio 11 March 2016 While we certainly appreciate bug reports and constructive criticism, you'll notice that 90+% of our reviews are 4 and 5-star, and that you are only the second 1-star review. Perhaps reaching out for some help instead of declaring "stay away" would be more helpful. David Lavalley 25 December 2015 Love it. Makes it so easy for my friends to see what I just added to my video and music libraries Full Review Xochil Guwan 7 December 2015 Excellent Only negative is.......IT'S NOT ON iOS! Ha ha, but I don't blame the developer for that! Full Review Karis Abas 11 March 2016 Great Would be great if u could see what people are watching on cloud sync, I but I can't even do that with plex, so I guess plex has to do that first. But overall this is awesome Full Review Carl Tabb 4 January 2016 Love it This is the best app I've gotten in awhile. It's exactly what I was looking for. Full Review David Torres 26 February 2016 Plex user Love this app Full Review Frank Martynowski 7 October 2015 Great companion app! Full Review Deniz Okten 19 March 2016 Notification/lockscreen playback control Great app! Notification/lockscreen playback control would make it perfect! Full Review Gavin Phoenix 9 November 2015 An excellent app and excellent Customer Service that goes above and beyond! Full Review Jonathan Schmidt 22 March 2016 Awesome Full Review ben stevenson 31 October 2015 Works great Full Review Daniel White 23 September 2015 Really like it Like this app a lot. Works great with Plex to get notifications about new content added. Thanks devs! Full Review Michael Lawrence 25 September 2015 Does a great job of keeping me informed of what's been added to my library and who is watching what. Bug: the back arrow on the Discovered Servers screen doesn't work, I have to press the back button instead. Weird or expected? All the other back arrows seem to work. Typo: in Advanced Filters under Servers, it says "Select TV Shows" instead of "Select Servers". Most likely a copy + paste error. Full Review Jay Zee 26 May 2015 Awesome app! I can tell when friends and family are using my Plex server and they can see when I upload new movies. Full Review Jared Kortje 24 June 2015 The app works great! I really like that I can view currently playing content by user and device - although, the notification doesn't appear to display on Android Wear for some reason. If updated, will change review to 5 stars! Update: It seems to be an issue with ongoing notifications will not display on Android Wear. Simply unchecking this box in the settings resolves the issue. The dev replied within 10 minutes of me sending him an email. Awesome developer! Now 5 stars. Full Review Albert Villacampa 9 July 2015 Just what I was looking for! Not only does it provide push notifications for user activity on my own plex server, but also alerts me to new additions on other servers shared with me. Full Review Eugene C 16 July 2015 Great app Good way to notify family/friends when new items are uploaded to the server. Would like in future builds if we can send to users who do not have a Plex or Emby account...like a introduction to the service Full Review Brant Zurliene 16 September 2015 Very useful app. I love being able to see what everyone is watching. Full Review Tony Brandner 12 June 2015 Does what it says Works great! Full Review Jarod Nash 5 July 2015 Very nice. Full Review John Buyense 19 May 2015 Cool App! Full Review Adam Booth 4 May 2015 Crash, crash,crash It seems like a great app and when it works it is but I get lots of odd notifications such as null something? And repeated crashes almost every time I take a look at. Disappointed Full Review Immersion Design Studio 6 May 2015 We've just pushed an update to the Play Store (v2.3.3) that may fix your crash issues (at least based upon the crash reports we've received). If it does not, please email us at immersiondesignstudio@gmail.com so we can troubleshoot your specific setup. If it does help, please consider updating your review and rating. Thanks. Review deleted What's New 2.4.1 FIX: Fixed error scanning Plex servers FIX: User reported bug fixes 2.4 - NEW: Added playback info on details screen for Now Playing items - NEW: Added support for secure Plex servers - NEW: Added option to turn off What's New notifications - FIX: Fixed refresh indicator not showing if Refresh On Open was set

Questa guida fa parte della collezione "MyCityGuide" ed è stata creata usando le informazioni ed i contenuti del portale di WeAGoo.com Una pratica guida completamente in italiano sia nei contenuti testuali che audio per la città di Venezia. L'arte a Venezia è dappertutto, la ritroviamo infatti nei colori cangianti delle acque e dei palazzi, nei camini sopra i tetti, nei trafori di portici e logge e negli scorci di figure oltre un ponte o una calle. Venezia si gira a piedi, in vaporetto o in gondola. La città del Tiepolo, del Tiziano, del Tintoretto... una città che saprà farvi innamorare e questa guida vi aiuterà a viverla e conoscerla meglio... Questa completa applicazione (dal peso che varia tra 40~60 Mb) può lavorare anche senza doversi collegare ad internet ed è completamente gratuita . I contenuti dopo lo scaricamento sono tutti memorizzati sul telefono e possono essere usufruiti anche durante il volo, in treno o comunque ancor prima di raggiungere questa città unica al mondo. Perchè vi consigliamo di scaricare questa App al posto di altre per la stessa città ? * Perchè è stata realizzata una Guida pratica e utile, le informazioni sono oggettive e non basate su opinioni * Perchè tutti i testi e l’audio riferiti ai punti di interesse, ad esclusione dei testi narrativi, hanno una durata massima di 30 secondi di audio per non annoiare con informazioni troppo lunghe . * Perchè contiene punti geo-localizzati organizzati in categorie e sottocategorie * Perchè contiene anche utili indirizzi e servizi geo-localizzati come polizia, ospedali, parcheggi ecc. (non si sa mai..) * Perchè visualizza immediatamente la distanza in linea d'aria tra voi e i punti vicino * Perchè c’è la possibilità di memorizzare i soli punti realmente da visitare in una occasione * Perchè contiene alcuni indirizzi di ristoranti, pasticcerie, gelaterie per chi soffre di "ciliachia" * Perchè è anche TOTALMENTE audio e non vi costringe a leggere in uno piccolo schermo da 3-4". Per lo scaricamento delle mappe leggere la sezione dedicata nell'App stessa. This guide is part of the collection "MyCityGuide" and was created using the information and content on the portal WeAGoo.com A practical guide completely in Italian in both textual and audio content for the city of Venice. The art in Venice is everywhere, we find it in the changing colors of the water and buildings, in chimneys on the roofs, in the tunnels of arcades and loggias in glimpses of figures over a bridge or a road. Venice turns on foot, by boat or gondola. The City of Tiepolo, Titian, Tintoretto ... a city that will make you fall in love and this guide will help you to live it and know it better ... This complete application (by weight ranging between 40 ~ 60 Mb) can work without having to connect to the internet and is completely free. The contents after downloading are all stored on your phone and can be already provided during the flight, train or other even before they reach this unique city. Why we recommend you download this app instead of others for the same city? * Why was realized a practical guide and useful information is objective and not based on opinions * Why all the texts and audio related to points of interest, with the exception of narrative texts, have a maximum duration of 30 seconds of audio to not bore you with information too long. * Why has geo-located points in categories and subcategories * Why also contains useful addresses and geo-localized services such as police, hospitals, parking etc.. (You never know ..) * Why immediately displays the distance as the crow flies between you and the points near * Why is the ability to store only points to actually visit one occasion * Why has some addresses of restaurants, bakeries, ice cream parlors for those suffering from "ciliachia" * Because it's TOTALLY audio and does not force you to read a small screen 3.4 ". For downloading maps read the section in the APA itself.

description: Being a Good Samaritan, Saving Lives, saving lives of strangers, saving lives of near and dear ones, is a pious deed. In fact, a life saved is a life created. When you save a life, you create a life on Earth. By saving lives, you become the Lord’s messenger on Earth. So what are your chances of playing messenger, so you can save your mother, father, son, daughter, brother, wife, sister, and all your near and dear ones and even the not so near ones? Here are some numbers which suggest you stand a good chance of saving your family, your loved ones and probably yourself. Heart disease is the leading cause of death in the US (every year 225000 people die and 6 out of 1000 are prone to have a heart attack in the US). If that sounds scary, the world’s two most populous nations, India and China, each with a billion plus population, have a far more accelerating growth rate of heart attacks. As a case in point, coronary heart attack in urban India is more than ten percent and growing. Rest of the world does not differ too much either. These growing numbers metaphorically indicate that the hearts are getting smaller and weaker, the arteries which carry blood to the heart are also getting smaller in comparison to the bulging pockets, bulging cholesterol in the arteries, the bulging stressful lives, and the bulging sedentary lifestyle we are leading. But you can play God, e r Messenger. You can save lives. Hundreds of them. All you need is to understand and get trained on CPR (Cardio-Pulmonary Resuscitation). You can save people affected by heart attacks. It’s as easy as 123. CPR ensures flow of blood to the brain, even after the stoppage of a heart due to cardiac arrest, and keeps the person alive. To help you get started on CPR, we have this small little app with the latest CPR guidelines, CPR principles, legal, technical, devices, steps, etc. In the real world, you may skip an internet connection in a trail in the Tundras or the Grand Canyon or in the Amazon rain forest, or in the Canadian Prairies, but the heart may skip a beat anywhere, for any of your loved ones. Keeping this in mind, we’ve ensured that once downloaded, this app works offline, even when there is no internet connection. Follow the steps, saving lives is easier than you thought. Be All. Note: This app can be used offline. This app is FREE. This app is AD free.

In order to expand, develop the Olympic spirit, and advocate a healthy, scientific and friendly Mahjong culture, to improve the communication and development of the Competitive Mahjong Game, and with the participation of Mahjong all over the world, we present "iTW Mahjong 16" android online game.

description: Schedule XD is a beautiful and intuitive application used to organize your classes. From now on every important information like notes or dates of the tests will be reminded by Schedule XD. You no longer need to worry about muting your phone during classes - this application will do it automatically! If you are looking for a simple, quick, and easy to use timetable try Schedule XD! Summary: - No ads (you can turn them on if you want to support us) - Add your classes, notes, events and grades - Supports multiple timetables - The ability to share your timetable via Bluetooth - Automatic calculation of the arithmetic average and the weighted average - Automatic notifications about upcoming classes and events - Automatic mute during classes - Week view - Supports weeks A / B / C / D - 4 widgets (one lock screen for android 4.2+) - The ability to store your database on Google Drive to access it on all your devices - 3 themes (blue, light and dark) Permissions : - Add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owner's knowledge, read calendar events plus confidential information: Adding events to Google Calendar - Modify or delete the contents of your SD card: Allowing backup on your SD card / phone's memory - Add or remove accounts, create accounts and set passwords, find accounts on the device, use accounts on the device, full network access: Allowing backup on Google Drive - Access Bluetooth settings, pair with Bluetooth devices: The ability to share the plan with friends via Bluetooth - Run at startup: Setting up alarms - Control vibration
