★ 簡潔實用的英文單字卡APP，多益測驗，全民英檢，升學考試的好幫手。 ★ 單字卡是背單字最好的方法，本APP的設計即單字卡最佳化應用。 ★ 首創按點選便利貼功能，遮中文背英文，遮英文背中文，用聲音背英文，加強熟悉。 ★ 專利的分類歸類複習匣功能，幫你更有效率地背字。 ★ 內容由專業英文老師撰寫，審核校正及推薦.(具版權,請勿抄襲)。 如果您覺得這個APP不錯,就評分五星喔,因為如果評四分,分數反而拉低了,謝謝. ============================== (初級版APP內含2200餘個單字)， (中級版APP接續初級，有2600餘字) ，(高級版APP接續中級，有3200餘字)，(全集版APP,為初中高級全部單字,8000餘單字) =========================== 建議你用這樣背單字,1.如果您已入社會自學. 2.如果您是學生背學校課本. 3.如果您讀英文書或雜誌. 1.如果您已入社會自學: 建議您把歸類匣變更名稱如下: a.我的生字(首次背) -->開啟WOW後,每背一字後就移到此匣. b.英背中_已過關 -->開啟上匣,選設"從英文背單字",開始背字,背好了的就移到這匣. c.中背英_已過關 -->開啟上匣,選設"從中文背單字",開始背字,背好了的就移到這匣. d.聲音背_已過關 -->開啟上匣,選設"從聲音背單字",開始背字,背好了的就移到這匣. e.全式再複習_已過關 -->開啟上匣,用英文,中文,聲音,用三種背字法複習,背好了的就移到這匣. f.背熟了_我的成績單 -->開啟上匣,用上述e法再複習一次,會的字就是您的成績單囉. g.特難背單字s -->把自己屢次背不好的字放到這匣,來加強複習. h.其他 -->就自定義囉. 2.如果您是學生背學校課本: 建議您把歸類匣變更名稱如下:(最好使用全集版) a.高中二上第1課 -->開啟WOW後,利用蒐尋功能找到書本裡的單字,再把它移到這匣. b.高中二上第2課 -->同上 c.高中二上第3課 -->同上 d.高中二上第4課 -->同上 e.高中二上第5課 -->同上 f.背熟了_我的成績單 g.特難背的字s h.其他 -->就自定義囉. 註:再利用英文,中文,聲音三種方式背字和複習. 3.如果您讀英文書或雜誌:(最好使用全集版) *可以把書的字歸類成上述1,(利用蒐尋功能找到書本裡的單字,再把它移到這匣),再來背字和複習. *也可以把雜誌的每篇文章歸類類似上述2,再來背字和複習. =========================== 一、特色： 1. WoW單字王全集8000字，讓您輕鬆通過多益測驗,全民英檢,升學考試。 2. WoW單字王讓單字變成直覺，反射，不是死背等著忘記。 3. WoW單字王首創「立即複習式」學習方法。讓使用者背誦就是測試，就是複習。 4. WoW單字王背誦版面是以「單字卡」呈現，幫助您很快地又大量地記憶單字。 5. WoW單字王運用「歸類匣」，讓您分類不同程度的陌生字和熟字。 6. WoW單字王有「自註記」功能，以自已熟悉的文字幫助聯想。 7. WoW單字王提供「從英文背單字」、「從中文背單字」、「從聲音背單字」等三種學習方式.讓您達到直覺式，反射式應用。 8. WoW單字王附有例句，輔助您更確切地明白該單字的意義。 9. 在首頁新增了"搜尋"功能，讓您隨時隨地遇到生字都可以快速搜尋到單字，再把它歸類收藏，再來背誦它複習它。您也可以搜尋中文找到英文喔，如同英漢字典,漢英詞典。 二、WoW app使用方法/訣竅： A.進入本app後，您可以先設定您每次要背誦字數，設定您要從英文單字背單字，即主背誦頁面會僅顯示英文。 B.再輕碰便利貼，則可顯示中文意思，並可隨時點選發聲。 C.建議您利用本app具有的功能，在背單字時，先由英文背單字，再複習以從中文背單字，後再複習以從聲音背單字，即可達到即背即測驗的效果，並達到直覺式的應用。 D.在單字區可向下滾動，則可看到例句， 輔助您更確切地明白該單字的意義。 E.您還可以依自己的意思輸入提醒字到自註解區，加強自己的背誦。例如adapter，可以註解『電腦線上黑黑大大的東西』。 F.背誦時，您可以將單字依熟背度不同而分類移到資料匣， 並隨時直接選各資料匣來複習。例如『apple』，這是很熟的字，那麼可以移到『熟透了』匣。 又如『wonderful美妙的』，不熟的字，那麼可移到『第一次背誦失敗』匣等。 G.後續複習時，可直接點選資料匣右側書本符號來複習背誦及移動。 H.若您移字移錯資料匣時，可以按正下方鍵來回復。 I.您會看到在各個資料匣的字數，代表您熟悉的字數，和各須複習的字數。 J.您還可以新增喜好資料匣，並長按資料匣則可以更名，變更顏色和刪除。 K.輕點各資料匣，則可看到資料匣內單字清單。 L.內附搜尋功能，可以搜尋您要找的字。 三、背英文單字方法建議: 建議在背單字時，先看音標，唸個幾次時再看單字字母拼法，並且唸個幾次，接下來看中文意思，口中唸著聲音和拼字母，同時聯想該字的實體長像或情境。有時您可以假想情境對話，以加強單字的熟悉和應用。 強烈地建議，背單字時，要利用本APP的功能「從英文背單字」、「從中文背單字」、「從聲音背單字」，三者都要用到來複習測試你的單字是否背熟，這樣才叫做基本背熟了。 提醒：複習不熟的字，最好是一天三次以上就有很好的效果。不要放太久(一天以上)才複習，否則對該字的感應會疏遠。 =========================== **付費版其他方式下載: 如果不想在Google Play使用信用卡,亦可在中華電信Hami下載: 1. 可以用中華電信話費支付,也可以向中華電信刷信用卡付費. 2. 須先下載中華電信的"Hami Apps",再開Hami Apps後,免費註冊後即可蒐尋及下載. =========================== ❈✻本APP採用Google提供的TTS(EN-US)發音，使用前請開啟"語音"設定，讓系統可以文字轉語音發音，方法： ①您的手機有內建預設TTS(EN-US)語音，則不必載入語言語音，可以直接使用。 ②若您的手機有沒有內建TTS(EN-US)語音，則可以下載Google的免費文字轉語音,連結網址 http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.svox.pico.voice.eng.usa ③其他：若手機還不能發音,請按手機的【設定】> 點選【語音輸入與輸出裝置】(或語言與鍵盤) > 點選【文字轉語音設定】>【預設引擎】項點選【PicoTTS】或【SamsungTTS】等，後開啟APP即可。 (有些手機是點選【GoogleTTS引擎】> 再點選【英文(美國) 】；__有些手機是點選【語言】 > 點選【英文(美國) 】)。 =========================== FB: http://www.facebook.com/WowDanZiWangapp =========================== 有些朋友想買付費版,卻沒有信用卡,怎麼辦呢? 可以去辦一張"VISA金融卡",它是帳戶裡要有錢才能刷卡. 當初我擔心刷卡資料被盜用,所以我就辦了一張,帳戶放了三千元.每次要網購或電視購物時,我就刷這張,那麼就算盜刷我卡最多也是三千元,我心安多了. 網字蒐尋"visa金融卡". ----------------------------------- 目前可使用Visa金融卡網路購物的銀行： 中國信託商業銀行 台北富邦商業銀行 台新國際商業銀行 台灣中小企業銀行 台灣新光商業銀行 合作金庫銀行 香港上海匯豐銀行 第一商業銀行 華南商業銀行 國泰世華銀行 渣打銀行

The dream of being pregnant came into your life and as expected, you want to take the control and get information about each change and progress in your and your baby’s body. Like your doctor does at each control with a Pregnancy Wheel (also called gestational Disc, Obstetric Wheel, or Pregnancy Calculator), today through Gestograma of Facemamá.com, you will be able to access from your device to everything you need to know about the development of your pregnancy. With this useful application you can get, within seconds and by only rotating the wheel until your last menstrual period (LMP), details of: Your baby: - BPD (Bi Parietal Diameter) or diameter of your baby’s head - LF (femur length), it is the longest bone in the body of your baby. - Weight - Size or Height - AFP (Abdominal Fetal Perimeter) or circumference of your baby's abdomen About you, mom: - Number of weeks of pregnancy - Possible Birth Date of your baby - Estimated weight gain, very useful to determine whether you are exceeded in weight - Uterine Height, or how much your uterus has grown in pregnancy - The max number of contractions per hour in the actual pregancy week And as each stage of pregnancy is different, this application will allow you access to details of each week from facemama.com, guiding you with the changes in your body, the necessary care, special situations and all that can generate confusion to you. The contents of “weeks of pregnancy“ also shows you images and videos of 3D ultrasound. (This feature requires internet connection). If you have any questions or suggestions, please write to soporte@isisproductora.cl . We will appreciate it. Good ratings and reviews will encourage us to keep improving this tool for you.
release_text: correcion de error que mostraba los meses en el lugar equivocado en pantallas de alta resolución. corrección de cierre de app cuando se volvía al primer tab. Pantallas pequeñas el numero de semanas quedaba escondido. Si encuentras fallos por favor enviar a soporte@isisproductora.cl indicando el modelo de tu dispositivo, version de android y una captura de pantalla del error. Estamos intentando emular cada fallo para solucionar los problemas para todos los dispositivos.

description: EBS 직업 명품 프리미엄 모바일 서비스를 위한 [EBS 학습 Player] 입니다. 내가 학습 했던 명품 직업 강좌를 모바일( http://m.ebs.co.kr )에서 [EBS 학습 Player]를 통해 학습 하실 수 있습니다. 또한 다운로드 받은 강좌는 [EBS 학습 Player]를 통해 언제 어디서나 이용이 가능합니다. (명품 직업 프리미엄 강좌를 위한 [EBS 학습 Player]는 학습을 위한 여러 편리한 기능이 지원됩니다) [주요특징] - 0.5X ~ 2.0X 배속재생기능 - 가로/세로 재생모드 및 화면회전 잠금기능 - 현재 영상의 반복재생모드 제공 - A/B 구간반복 기능 - EarComfort 기능 - 원본크기, 스크린맞춤, 전체화면 모드기능 - REW/FF 구간 이동시간 설정가능(10초 ~ 60초) - 학습진도정보관리(LMS) 기능 - 이어보기 지원 =================================================== * 5월 18일자 업데이트 이 후 오류가 발생할 경우 다음과 같이 진행 해 주시기 바랍니다. 1) 학습플레이어의 버전 확인 - 학습플레이어 버전이 v 3.11 이하인 경우 기존 학습플레이어 삭제 후 최신버전으로 재 설치 진행 2) 인터넷 캐시 삭제 조치 - 라이센스 오류 시 사용중인 브라우저의 캐시 삭제 후 재 실행 [캐시 삭제 방법] - 구글 브라우저 : 구글 브라우저 실행 > 단말기기 목록 버튼 클릭 > 설정 > 개인정보 보호 > 인터넷 사용정보(캐시,쿠키,사이트 데이터) 삭제 - 기본 브라우저 : 기본 인터넷 실행 > 단말기기 목록 버튼 클릭 > 설정 > 개인정보 보호 > 인터넷 사용정보(캐시,쿠키,사이트 데이터) 삭제 * 기타 앱 브라우저를 사용하시는 경우 해당 앱의 캐시 삭제 후 진행 부탁 드립니다 * 단말기 제조사 및 OS버전에 따라 메뉴 명칭/순서가 다를 수 있습니다. 위와 같은 내용으로 진행하셨음에도 불구하고 오류 또는 실행 불가 시 EBS 고객센터(1588-1580, helpdesk@co.kr ) 로 전화주시면 신속히 처리해 드릴수 있도록 하겠습니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 02-1588-1580 / helpdesk@ebs.co.kr The [EBS study Player] for the profession EBS luxury premium mobile services. You can learn a vocational course I had to learn through the Luxury [EBS study Player] on the mobile ( http://m.ebs.co.kr ). In addition, courses are downloaded [EBS study Player] is available anytime, anywhere through. (For premium luxury vocational courses [EBS study Player] has a number of convenient features is support for learning) [Highlights] - 0.5X ~ 2.0X speed playback function - Vertical / horizontal play mode and screen rotation lock - Providing repeat playback of the current video mode - A / B repeat function - EarComfort features - Original size, screen fit, full screen mode capabilities - REW / FF interval travel time can be set (10-60 seconds) - Learning Progress Information Management (LMS) functionality - Following Assistance ================================================== = * May 18 if an error occurs after the date of this update, please proceed as follows: Check the version of 1) learning player - V 3.11 or lower case study Player version is re-installed with the latest version after deleting the existing players learning progress 2) Delete Internet Cache measures - Re-run after the deletion of the license error when you are using a browser cache [How to Delete Cache] - Google Browser: Google Browser Run> terminal equipment list, click> Settings> Privacy> Internet usage information (cache, cookies, site data) deleted - Default Browser: Internet running, click Default> Terminal Equipment List button> Settings> Privacy> Internet usage information (cache, cookies, site data) deleted * If you use other apps and then proceed to delete the browser cache of the app, thank you * The menu names / order according to handset manufacturers and OS versions may be different. Despite the progress hath the same information as above and invisible errors or execution EBS Us (1588-1580, helpdesk@co.kr ), please call deurilsu will allow prompt action.
release_text: [3.12] - 재생 시 '틱' 사운드 잡음 현상 수정 - muPad 단말 초기화 오류 수정 - 기기조작감지 오류 수정 - 저가형 단말 SDcard 미인식 이슈 조정 - 재생디코더 옵션 앱강제 종료 시 초기화 되는 에러 수정 [3.11] - 기기등록 패스 구분자 추가 - 북마크 터치 오류 수정 - 플레이어 동작 안정화 패치 - SD카드 제거시 설정 UI 동기화 - 이어폰 재생/멈춤 기능 추가 [3.10] - 플레이어 고도화 및 안정화 패치 - Device ID 중복 이슈 수정 [3.08] - 배속 플레이어 성능 개선 및 안정화 - 기존 플레이어 버그 수정 [3.07] - Device ID 틀어짐 현상 수정 - 기본플레이어 롤리팝 동작 안정화 2차 - PD 재생시 one time license 적용 [3.06] - 롤리팝 5.0 대응 - Player sdk 버젼 표기 - 플레이어에서 더블탭으로 화면 크기 변경 불가

description: 웹소설 포유는 네이버 및 여러 사이트에서 제공하는 웹소설 정보와 웹툰, 카툰 사이트 정보를 쉽고 빠르게 볼 수 있도록 링크정보를 모아놓은 웹소설 어플리케이션 및 위젯(이하 앱)입니다. 네이버, 다음, 네이트, 스포츠서울, 아이온, 머니투데이, 코믹뱅, 럭키월드, 포커스, 스투닷컴 웹소설, 웹툰 및 카툰 정보를 포함하고 있습니다. 그리고 웹소설, 웹툰 및 카툰 정보의 이미지와 함께 리스트로 쉽게 확인 할 수 있도록 되어 있으며 검색을 통해 자주보는 웹소설을 마이 웹소설에 추가하여 쉽게 볼 수 있도록 되어 있습니다. 기타 자세한 사항은 앱을 설치하여 메뉴버튼을 클릭하면 웹소설 포유 정보확인을 통해 확인 할 수 있습니다.
release_text: 웹소설 표유 v1.4.4 3월 신규 웹소설 추가 - 가르쳐 주세요 - 나만의 스킨십 능력자들 - 아나운서 S의 비밀일기 - 데빌게이머 파우스트 - 당신의 여자가 되고 싶어요 - 붉은 장미 아가씨 - 교룡의 주인

description: Este es un gran juego de primaria sobre geografía de México, estados, ríos y capitales ! Te sabes las capitales de los las provincias mexicanas?, pon a prueba tu conocimiento con este fantástico test! ¿Conoces los estados de México?, con este juego te pondrás a prueba y aprenderás al mismo tiempo. ¿Conoces los ríos de México?, reconócelos por su ubicación en el mapa y apréndetelos! This is a great game on geography of elementary Mexico, states, rivers and capitals! You know the capitals of the Mexican provinces ?, test your knowledge with this great test! Do you know the states of Mexico ?, with this game you will test and learn at the same time. Do you know the rivers of Mexico ?, recognize them by their location on the map and learn them!
release_text: Vidas infinitas Funciona en teléfonos y tabletas!

description: This keyboard for Myanmar Zawgyi font is based on the hacker's keyboard. I wrote this keyboard hoping that someone will find it useful to enter Zawgyi font. If it does not satisfy your need, please leave a comment. Your comments are much more valuable than the stars in the review. This app is an open source project and not a commercial product. Please help improve the product for those who read and write in Myanmar language. Thank you. So far, * It supports all the characters in the zawgyi font. * There are two keyboard layouts for Zawgyi. One has very similar keyboard format as zawgyi on PC, and the other one is with bigger keys * It also supports auto-completion. Please install auto-completion dictionary for Zawgyi. * Even if the device has no Zawgyi font installed, the keyboard may still be used with apps that support Zawgyi or similar fonts such as "Email 4 MM". Help: http://blog.mmswdev.com/2013/12/how-to-use-myanmar-keyboard-on-android.html http://blog.mmswdev.com/2013/12/where-is-character-i-want-to-type.html http://blog.mmswdev.com/2014/01/new-keyboard-layout-with-bigger-keys.html Support: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Myanmar-Keyboard/232619393582121
release_text: v0.07 * added setting to change size of the font on the keys v0.06 * added a new keyboard with bigger keys and make it default even if no language is selected * removed caplock for Zawgyi fonts * modified punctuations and smileys v0.05 * Add more fixes for " ေ" and "င္" v0.04 * Updated the display font so that even if the device has no Zawgyi font installed, the keyboard may still be used with apps that support Zawgyi or similar fonts such as "Email 4 MM". v0.03 * Fixed some characters

音楽や映画などエンタメ好きな人のためのCD/DVD整理アプリです。 好きな音楽や映画は、CD/DVDでずっと手元に置いておきたい!　でも、整理するのはちょっと苦手と……というエンタメ好きは多いと思います。同じ作品でも一般リリースのほかに、先行予約の特別仕様があったり、ファン限定コレクターズボックスが出たり、今後はブルーレイ版が普及してくるのでもう大変です。 「CD/DVD整理棚」は、そんなエンタメ好きのお悩みを解決します。市販のCD/DVD/ブルーレイの商品データを登録し、スマホで手軽にライブラリー管理ができます。 一括登録機能では、好きなアーティスト名や作品タイトルなどで検索して、お気に入りリストをすぐに作成できます。特定のテーマでコレクションしていても、まだ入手していなかったソフトをチェックできるのでとても便利です。そして、見たり聴いたりしたソフトはレート(星)で評価したり、レビュー(感想)をテキスト入力で記録できます。 見出し(タグ)付け機能を使えば、カテゴリー別やジャンル別にソフトを分類でき、検索機能では探しているディスク情報をすぐに確認できます。 ほかにも、市販のソフトではない自主制作のCD/DVDも整理できます。自分で撮影・編集したホームビデオとか録画したテレビ番組など、自主制作のディスクはラベルや表紙を付けないままで未整理になりがちです。そうしたディスクも「CD/DVD整理棚」に登録していけば、サクサクと管理できます。 表紙にするイメージ画像を撮影したり、端末のギャラリーから読み込んだりして登録すれば、あなただけの個性的なライブラリーが完成します。また、PCソフトやIT機器のインストールCDやマニュアルCDなど、散らばりがちなディスク類の管理にも応用できます。 登録したソフトは、仮想のラック(整理棚)に表紙画像を並べて楽しむこともできます。自分のコレクションを一覧できる快感をぜひお楽しみください。 バックアップ&復元機能も搭載しているので、機種変更しても引き続きデータをご利用いただけます。いつでもどこでもいつまでも、自分の持っている愛盤・名盤を管理できる、エンタメライフをサポートするCD/DVD管理ツールです。 ＜ 主な機能と特徴 ＞ ● 商品情報を入力してリスト作成! 市販のCD/DVD/ブルーレイの商品情報を登録できます。JANコード(日本の共通商品コード)をバーコードスキャナで読み取るか、１３ケタの数字をキーパッドから入力すれば、商品情報(タイトル、アーティスト名、発売元名、価格)を自動取得し登録することもできます。また、アイテムの画像をGoogleイメージ検索から取得し登録もできます。 ● 好きなアーティストや作品を一括登録! 一括登録機能では、アーティスト名や作品タイトルを入力し、CDかDVDを選択して検索をかければ、関連商品を一覧表示します。商品ごとにチェックを入れて選んでいき、一括登録することができます。また、タグ付けも一括して行うこともできます。 ● 作品の評価やレビューが記録できる! 詳細ページでは、ソフトの基本的な商品情報のほかに、購入日、レート(星)による評価、レピュー(感想)の記録ができます。レートが満点(五つ星)になると「名盤」「殿堂入り」と表示できます。 ● 登録データを簡単に分類! すばやく検索! 登録したデータには自由に見出し(タグ)が付けられます。ジャンル、カテゴリー、テーマ、アーティストなどで分類すれば、一覧画面での見出しの切り替えにより、簡単にデータをできます。また、検索窓にアーティスト名や作品タイトルを入力し検索すれば、お目当てのCD/DVDをすばやく確認できます。 ● 優先順位をつけて自由に並び替え! 登録データのリストは自由に並び順を変えることができます。手動で移動できるほか、タイトル(降順/昇順)、評価の高い順、登録順で自動的に並び替えほ行うこともできます。 ● 自分のCD/DVDをラック(整理棚)で一覧! CD/DVDのパッケージ画像を、仮想のディスプレイ式ラック(整理棚)に並べて楽しむことができます。ラックの色調は、ウッディ、ブラウン、ホワイト、ピンク、スチール、ガラスの６種類から選べます。登録数が多くなれば、その分、整理棚も増え、スクロールして一覧すると壮観です。画像をタップすれば、そのままそのCD/DVDの詳細ページに移動します。 ● 好きなソフトの情報はいつまでも! 機種変更の際にもバックアップ機能を使って本体にバックアップを作成できます。 作成したバックアップデータを新しい端末へコピーすれば、復元してデータを引き継ぐことができます。 ● < 使用例 > ◎ウチにあるCD/DVDソフトの整理に ◎所有しているCD/DVDのデータベース作りに ◎ジャンル・カテゴリー・アーティスト別のお気に入りリストづくりに ◎欲しいソフトのリストアップに ◎音楽や映画の鑑賞日記として ◎好きな音楽や映画など、自分の趣味や傾向の確認に ◎CDショップの店頭や外出先で、すでに所有しているCD/DVDの確認に ◎ネットオークションやセドリでの商品管理に ◎自主制作CD/DVDのメディア(ディスク)管理に ◎PCソフトやIT機器のインストールCDの管理に ◎オフィスや事務所にあるメディア(ディスク)の管理に ＜ 対応端末 ＞ Android OSのバージョン2.2以上の搭載の端末(タブレットを除く)でご利用頂けます。 タブレットに関しましては、動作保証外とさせて頂きますのであらかじめご了承ください。 ＜ 動作確認 端末 ＞ MEDIAS N-04C Galaxy Nexus SC-04D GALAXY S SC-02B INFOBAR A01 HTC Desire SoftBank X06HTII ＜ご利用上の注意 ＞ 本アプリでは写真画像を扱うため、多くのメモリを使用します。 メモリ領域が少ない一部の端末などでは、表紙画像作成中にメモリ不足が発生し作業が続行できない場合があります。 また、写真の保存先は端末本体となりますので、十分な空き容量が必要となります。 ＜本アプリの要求する権限について＞ ・カメラの撮影 CD/DVDのパッケージを撮影するため、カメラの利用権限を必要とします。 ・完全なインターネットアクセス CD/DVDの情報や画像をインターネットから取得する機能のためだけにネットワーク通信を使用します。 お客様の個人情報を外部に送信するような事はありませんので、ご安心ください。 ・外部ストレージに対する読み込み/書き込み 本アプリでは、パッケージ画像やバックアップデータを端末本体に保存しますので、この権限が必要になります。 Music and movies is a CD / DVD organize app for entertainment lovers like. Pic Healthy Photo Food Diary makes healthy eating fun and easy with the help of your friends! Take pictures of your food, rate how healthy or unhealthy it is and let your friends be the judge. Being aware of what you eat is the first step towards making smarter food choices, maintaining a healthy diet, and achieving your weight goal. BENEFITS: * Eat better, feel better and have fun while you're doing it! * Being aware of what you eat is the first step towards a healthy diet, eating better food, and improved nutrition * Easiest way to track your food, nutrition, diet -- just take a photo * Access to MedHelp’s Health Forums to post nutrition questions, diet questions, weight loss questions * Get support and motivation from millions of people just like you who are dieting * Share what you eat with friends and others with this photo food journal FEATURES: * Easily track what you eat by taking pictures of your meals * Rate how healthy your meal is and see if your friends agree with you * View a scoreboard to see how you’re doing compared to your friends and to other users of the app * See what others are eating and rate and comment on their food photos * Like someone’s photos? Follow them in your photo feed EARN HEALTHY POINTS: * Healthy Points: Earn points for eating healthy foods. Share a picture of your food and earn points when your friends rate it as healthy. * Rankings: Check the scoreboard to see how you stack up compared to your friends and others. Pic Healthy is a smart and easy way to achieve your weight goal and healthy way for weight loss! If you want to slim down or are slimming down already, do it the healthy way with this photo food journal. Consider this app to be your diet coach! It’s perhaps better than a diet coach because your phone is always with you. Get started for free today. ABOUT US: Developed by MedHelp, the world’s largest health social network.
release_text: Pic Healthy - Photo Food Diary v1.0 for Android!

description: It's the classic theme package for ES File Explorer 3.0, you must install ES File Explorer 3.0 to use this theme. Search "ES File Explorer" for it. The classic theme use old icons of ES 1.6 to provide an old style in ES 3.0. ES, 180 millions global downloads, file manager trend leader on Android! Rated one of best resource management tools on Android market. V3 is coming! Classic Theme can be downloaded on Google Play. ES File Explorer is a free, full-featured file and application manager. It functions as all of these apps in one: file manager, application manager, task killer, cloud storage client (compatible with Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive, Box.net, Sugarsync, Yandex, Amazon S3, and Ubuntu One), FTP client, and LAN Samba client. It provides access to pictures, music, video, documents, and other files on both your Android devices and your computers. ES File Explorer allows Android users, no matter where they are, to manage their resources for free. You can see and access all of your files from your mobile device and share them with others. The app makes it easy to stay connected over 3G, 4G, EDGE, or Wi-Fi to share with friends, upload photos, and watch videos. ES File Explorer 3.0 currently supports 30+ languages This standard version is for Android 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 3.1, 3.2, 4.0,4.1 and 4.2. Android 1.5/1.6/2.0 users, please use ES File Explorer Cupcake version. You can download older versions from our official website. Features List: * File Manager – Manage your files like you do on your desktop or laptop using Multiple Select, Cut/Copy/Paste, Move, Create, Delete, Rename, Search, Share, Send, Hide, Create Shortcut, and Bookmark; operations can be performed on local files (on your Android device) or remotely (on your computer) * Application Manager – categorize, uninstall, backup, and create shortcuts to your apps * Remote File Manager – when enabled, manage files on your phone from your computer * Built-in ZIP and RAR support allows you to compress and decompress ZIP files, unpack RAR files, and create encrypted (AES 256 bit) ZIP files * Built-in viewers and players for various file types, including photos, music, and videos; supports third-party applications, such as Documents To Go, for opening others * Shows thumbnails for APKs and images * Text viewers and editors * Access your home PC via WiFi with SMB * Functions as your FTP and WebDAV client. Manage files on FTP, FTPS, SFTP, and WebDAV servers just like you manage files on your SD card * Supports Dropbox, Box.net, Sugarsync, Google Drive (Google Docs is now a part of Google Drive), SkyDrive, Amazon S3, Yandex and more. ES File Explorer is an enhanced cloud storage client with more functions than the official versions, it can save photos, videos, and other files to your internet drives and share them with others. * Bluetooth file browser You can copy and paste files between Bluetooth ready devices. It supports OBEX FTP for browsing devices and transferring files between Bluetooth devices. * Kill tasks with a single click -- includes a simple widget for automatically killing tasks, with an ignore list to ignore the applications you want to keep running. To use this feature, you must have ES Task Manager module installed. * Root Explorer -- the ultimate set of file management tools for root users. Provides access to the entire file system and all data directories, and allows the user to change permissions. * Developers can visit our website for the developer interface for picking files from your applications, emailing attachments, etc. * More features included, and many more to come We’re working to create the best file manager on Android Market, so please do not hesitate to CONTACT US with your comments, suggestions, or any issues you may have.
release_text: V1.1.4 Updated to fix the Android 5.1 issues V1.1.3 Update icons to match ES File Explorer V3.2.4 V1.1.2 Update icons to match ES File Explorer V3.2.0 V1.0.4: Classic theme apk is released. Install it and choose classic theme from the theme of ES.

description: Sony Xperia™ themes makes your Sony device truly personal. Download exclusive, gorgeous, high quality themes and enjoy a beautifully integrated experience developed uniquely for your Sony Xperia™ smartphone or tablet. Change up to 270 graphical assets in a fully integrated and easy-to-use experience including start- and lock screen wallpapers, Xperia™ Home, platform components, system graphics and colours.

Celebrate over 30 years of Wheel of Fortune - it's a new spin on America's #1 Game show, more fun and easy to play than ever before!  Step up to the wheel and take a spin through a rich Wheel of Fortune experience! With over 1,000 puzzles from show writers and a variety of gameplay modes, you will feel like a real contestant! • Spin Solo: Test your puzzle-solving skills while Pat takes you through an immersive Single Player story mode that travels back through Wheel of Fortune’s iconic 30-year history. Unlock new levels and avatar items by showcasing your Wheel of Fortune skills! • Meet Pat Sajak: Take the stage with Pat Sajak as your host! Watch his style change as you travel back through three decades of Wheel of Fortune. • Spin Together: Challenge your friends and family across social networks and play your games anytime, anywhere with this all-new multiplayer mode. Or, play in person with Pass & Play.  • Show Your Style: Personalize your in-game avatar with tons of clothing and accessory options! Unlock more themed avatar loot to change your look as you progress through Solo Mode. • Add More Themes: Want even more Wheel of Fortune? Head to the in-game shop to purchase and download more puzzles and avatar items! Dress up like a monster or get ready for a night on the town, then challenge your friends to take a spin! • Unlock Achievements: Show off your skills and collect achievements just by playing Wheel of Fortune! Can you collect them all? • Play on Chromecast: Enhance your gameplay experience by casting Wheel of Fortune to your TV and invite the whole family to play along. We want your feedback! If you have issues, questions, or comments please email us at gamesupport@spe.sony.com . We want to hear directly from you! Privacy Policy: http://www.sonypictures.com/corp/privacy.html Terms of Use: http://www.sonypictures.com/corp/tos.html

The app appears to have errors to anyone else that looks at it. Text from selected contacts will be in this app only and will not be put in your “regular” text messages. Text messages in our app are completely separate and secure. When text messages are received, you get a notification in the status bar that says, “Subscription notice,” which goes with the high school or college Study Guide theme of the app having a “subscription error.” Only you will know it’s a notification for a text message. You can switch contacts when needed. Don’t worry - once the contact is removed it will not put prior hidden text messages in your “regular” text messaging box. Does not transfer existing text messages – the two areas are completely separate! Does not support MMS… The hide call log feature allows you to add the contact and all incoming, outgoing and missed calls will be deleted from your regular call logs. You must place the outgoing call from inside the app and you have the choice of saving your call logs inside the app!!! The Block text messaging feature will allow you to block incoming text messages. You can save blocked text messages and read them after you unblock the contact. Or we can delete them as they come in. You can still send text messages to the contact while they are blocked. We have added the “Call Blocker” feature for that contact that is really a pain. You can also save the call logs for these blocked calls or we candelete them for you. It does not remove or change your “regular” text message icon in the app drawer. This is not a real high school or college “Study Guide” application! It is a decoy application that allows you to hide or block text messages with password protection. Aggregated device data, including location, is measured for the purposes of market research by Placed, Inc. Placed, Inc. - Terms of Use: http://www.placed.com/terms-of-service Placed, Inc. - Privacy Policy: http://www.placed.com/privacy-policy Features: *Hide SMS messages/text messages for unlimited contacts *Hide incoming/outgoing phone call logs for unlimited contacts *Select from your contact list or put in other contacts *Choose your own SMS color theme *Three icon options to put on your home screen *Change Status bar notifications and descriptions *Block unwanted text messages from a contact *Block Calls from a contact *Ability to select your notifications *Looks like a high school or college study guide app *Logs failed attempts to get into the app, just in case you were wondering *Displays in your “Applications” list as “Study Guide”

Improved notifications, decoy login button, auto-logoff, notification options, new menu button, faster loading, export to e-mail, custom notifications, "Wipe" feature, send/delivery confirmation, text and call blocking! Please notify us if it doesn’t work before giving us negative feedback: support@secondphoneapps.com

description: Be fluent in chord theory using "chord wheel." The app for all musicians who want to... -Have access to all the chord progressions in any key with a touch of a button. -Transpose songs in any key, Giving you the ability to compose better. -Analyze songs deeper with a better understanding of root progression study -More freedom in improvisation The circle of fifth To learn the Circle of fifth can be an arduous and tedious task which could leave many confused and frustrated. With chord wheel, you can now have a deep insight to the elusive circle of fifth... -Understand the nature of scales -Understand the nature of key signatures Additional features... -Includes seventh and other extensions adding colors to a chord. -Click on any key, The Root Progression (i.e. Roman Numeral) for each chord is included. Get this vital tool for all serious musicians today for the cheapest price! This app was developed with adobe flash. A free download of adobe air is required. Android Requirement for Adobe Air 1. Android™ 2.3 and above 2. ARMv7 processor with vector FPU, minimum 550MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0, H.264 and AAC HW decoders 3. 256MB of RAM
Famous C64 emulator, ported to Android. Sources are available on GitHub, search for FrodoC64.

app_name: Hi Guess the Place: World Quiz
description: Which famous cities and countries have you been to? Start this amazing trivia quiz and try to guess all the places in the picture. Let’s travel the world with beautiful place puzzles. If you are boring with playing the ordinary logo game, why don't you come to try our newly designed guess game - Hi Guess the Place. It is different from those trivia quiz games which only show brand logos or icons in the picture. This is a great quiz game that let you test your knowledge about countries, cities and cultures. And it is full of famous buildings, beautiful scenery, traditional performance, typical food or drinks etc. It contains hundreds of images from all over the world, like Eiffel Tower, Sydney Opera House, Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, Fujiyama, Pyramid & Sphinx, Colosseum etc. Travel the world with these famous historic and cultural sites, imagine the taste of drinks and delicious food, enjoy the amazing performance... What a fabulous experience! Countless funny puzzles from easy to hard are waiting for you! New puzzles will be added continuously for endless fun! It's easy to start and simple to play. See the image and guess the city or the country. Challenge and test if you know all the cities and countries in the pictures! Or you can share this wonderful quiz game to your friends to figure out who knows more places or who can guess them faster. Stuck? Don't worry, you can use hints to solve puzzles that you can't figure out or even reach out to your friends using Facebook to ask for help. Or you also can tap the “Reveal Letter” button to show a random correct letter, the “Remove Letters” function will help you to remove the incorrect letters. And if you want to get the answer and access the next puzzle directly, you can tap the button of “Reveal the Answer”. Besides, if you already run out of the hints, you can get more free ones by rating us. This is not only a geography landmark quiz, but also is a culture test. If you love traveling, you must love this game! Travel the beautiful world immediately and imagine the taste of the delicious food with the game! Come on, download it now! Features: Easy to start, have fun immediately! Free, no registration required. Download and enjoy the endless fun now! Simple to play for everyone. New puzzles will be added continuously for endless fun! We will update the game and add more amazing puzzles continuously! No ending fun is waiting for you! Most addictive trivia quiz! Can you recognize all the places (cities or countries) in the pictures? How many places have you travelled? I believe that you can't help solving the puzzles once you start it! Funny and sophisticated graphics make you feel relax! The perfect color match and well-designed interface offer you an awesome visual experience. Various help & hints options! You can use the free hints (Reveal Letter, Remove Letters and Reveal the Answer) to help you, or you also can share the puzzle you can't solve to friends to ask for help. If you run out of the free hints, you can rate us to get more free ones or buy some.

Having trouble getting past a relationship? Having memories about your ex that continue to bother you? Having trouble moving on or allowing yourself to meet someone new? If you answered yes, this session is for you. This session guides you to go into your unconscious mind and rearrange your memories to allow for new, happy memories to be formed. It directs you "forget" all of those painful memories that keep you from moving on. -Please Note: -You must be connected to a WiFi connection to download and install this app. -Please use headphones for best results. -Please do not operate heavy machinery while listening to this session.

Space Tube is an accelerometer-controlled 3D racing game with fantastic graphics. Delivers a amazing tunnel experience. Test your reflex in an ultimate speed challenge with smooth 3D graphic. -How to Play- Select level and press start. Tilt you device to turn left or right. You have to avoid all the objects except the 'green plus'. Each time you have catch a 'green plus' you earn a life. (you can see it on the top-left side of the screen). If you crash on an object and you have life (pluses), then you lose one (plus). If you crash on an object and you have not any more life, then "game over". You can try again from the start of the Level, or you continue just before the place that you lost.

Field Personnel! Finally there is an app to conduct instant oil and gas rig inspections anytime from anywhere. With the help of Oil & Gas Rig Inspection App you will be able to perform multiple types of inspection including: - blow-out preventers inspection - confined spaces inspection - derrick & substructure inspection - generator area & electrical systems inspection - hoisting tools inspection - hotwork tools inspection - workover rig vehicle inspection Moreover you can: - work in online and offline modes - keep collected data on your own device - sync collecte data across multiple devices - generate custom PDF and Excel reports - eliminate paper If you are not satisfied with our pre-built form solution, you can upload your own PDF form and 100% customize it to meet your specific business needs. Moreover you can: - upload any PDF form or document from local storage or cloud drives - add your own fields to existing forms including datetime, text, numeric, location, signature, picture,radio, checkbox - fill in your PDF forms - print forms - share forms via email and messages - upload forms to cloud drives - save and view generated reports on your device The app is 100% customizable to meet your specific industry needs.

Remember those millions and millions of flapping birds? Ever wonder where they all came from? Well here it is. We've found the source of all those birds and we've sent a sniper to finish them off before they can infest our mobile devices and drive us all insane. It's up to you to stop these flapping birds from escaping and wrecking their havoc on the rest of us! • Use rapid fire shots to obliterate those pesky birds! • Compete in a global high-score table • Shoot the birds in the pipes for bonus points! • How many birds can you hit without missing?
release_text: Made the birds easier to hit. Updated to work with Google Play Added option to remove in-game ads Minor bug fixes.

description: Small General is a turn-based hexagon and counter game designed for quick and easy play on Android mobile phones and tablets. Small General is exactly what it says in the title: a very small wargame. Its small size facilitates smooth game play on mobile devices. Small General is easy enough to complete a game in 5 to 10 minutes, but still complex enough to provide a strategic challenge. The player moves and attacks with his units to conquer all towns on the map. Unit types include: tanks, infantry, anti-tank guns and artillery. Combat is dice based and takes into account different unit statistics, experience, concentric attacks and landscape modifiers. Small General requires units to be kept in supply and has fog of war rules. You can upgrade damaged units and build new units from scratch. This release includes 3 small scenarios, 5 medium-sized scenarios and 4 big scenarios as well as a campaign consisting of 10 levels. Small General is equipped with a solid Artificial Intelligence (AI) that can be played against on three different difficulty levels. Furthermore the game supports hot-seat gaming by keeping a record of all the moves and attacks made in the other player his turn. This is the free demo version. If you like the game and want to see more games like this (for example some historical campaigns) please support the developer and buy the full version. Mininimum System: android 2.1 Advised Sytem: android 2.3.0 or higher, 480x800 (WVGA) resolution or higher, 800Mhz processor or higher
release_text: 1.31: -fixed bug with choosing defender in stack of units 1.3: -optimized graphics look on tablets -fixed issue with android bottom bar on using low res gfx -various improvements and fixes 1.3b: - Fog of war bug fixed, if you click on the detail of a hidden unit you can no longer see what it is. - Some history playback mistakes fixed like not showing upgrades in enemies turn - Replay different combat results bug fixed

description: 'Who Gets the Front Seat?' rapidly settles arguments by completely randomly selecting the person who gets the front seat using our special formula to ensure fairness. Enter the passengers, once that's done either tap, shake or wave the dice to find out who is riding in the front. The apps decision is final and legally binding! ---- car front seat decision maker shotgun

Obesenec(Hang The Pirate) - slovak version Hang the pirate! Or rather do as much as possible to prevent to do it! We've prepared for you a new slovak version of Jogo da forca with awesome graphics! With realistic sounds and funny animations - feel like on a Caribbean island and win before the pirate will be hang. Guess the hidden phrases by selecting letters. Each incorrect letter is one element of the hangman. Do not let the pirate hang! Modes: - One Player Select a category (or all) and guess random phrases. You have one hint for every phrase. Select the level of difficulty. - Two players Play with a friend. Think up a phrase for your opponent. You can draw phrases too, until you find the one that you like. The winner is the one who guesses more phrases. Categories: Geography – check if you know names of the countries and cities. Food – if you love cooking – this category is just for you! Music – for those who like both classic and popular music. Film - movies are your passion? How well do you know the movies, actors and directors? Test yourself! Animals – wild, domestic, small, big – guess all of them! Plants – many names of common and rare species. Sport – check your knowledge about sports disciplines Look – everything connected with clothes and people’s appearance. Art – architecture, painting – for those who have artistic soul! Have a lot of fun with our version of Obesenec (Hang The Pirate)!

description: The sequel to Animal Chess is HERE! Dino Chess - The only Chess where the Dinosaurs really come alive! Control an army of dinosaurs and battle your friend in the Epic Chess Battle! Plan, strategize and choose from an arsenal of lightning, asteroids or even TNT. Watch how your Dinos literally destroy the enemies! Playing Chess has proven to help exercise both sides of the brain, increase one's IQ and helps in increasing problem-solving skills. However, many a times, children and even adults find it challenging to learn as there are many rules and a lack of interactivity and animation. No worries. Dino Chess is designed by educators to help you pick up and learn chess easily. It is infused with dinosaurs, animations, explosions, lightning, asteroids, TNT etc to help learning chess fun and easy. Imagine the fun of watching how your Queen Tyrannosaurus zapping the Stegosaurus Bishop with lightning or the Rook Quetzalcoatlus check mate the King Triceraptor with fiery asteroids! Learning chess can never be so much fun! Start bonding and playing Dino Chess with your kids today! These are some of the reviews of Dino Chess users: "I am impressed ! The dinosaurs come alive and I am actually controlling them! I didn't know chess can be so much fun " - Joshua 10 years old kid "I like the lightning zaps and asteroid explosions when I exterminate my opponent! " - Isaac 7 years old kid "I like to design my dinosaur's color and chess board " - Samuel 6 years old kid "My 7 year-old son son actually stopped playing silly games and he is now enjoying playing Dino chess with me!" June So help your child to improve problem solving skills, increase memory and creativity, planning and foresight . And most importantly, use Dino Chess to bond with your child and teach them useful values.
release_text: 4 Different Gameplay to choose from: #1 : Play the classic Dino Chess Edition #2 : Play the Last Dino Standing Edition #3 : Play the Special Dino Chess Edition - Amazingly Fun and addictive! - You cant find any chess like this ! #4 : Interactive Dino Safari with all your Dino armies

description: My cars is a complete solution to manage your vehicles -> includes UK units -> fuel logger -> record any expense -> maintenance records -> trip management with cost, reimbursement, GPS tracking, etc... -> and much more... My cars is very easy to use! With a few seconds after every fill-up you will quickly build valuable statistics that will tell you how much cost your vehicle. And you will be very surprised! If you have data in Excel or in any other app, you can also contact support to help you import it in My Cars. ******************************************* Main features: ******************************************* - Full fuel management (costs, efficiency, fuel stations, etc..) with advanced options of refuel types (full, partial, ...) - Fully customizable maintenance records - Fully customizable bills/expenses categories - Trip management with customizable categories (trip type, client, tag) that allows to track trips that can be reimbursed - Many statistics/charts/reports - Advanced reminders (like reminder on next maintenance) - Export/import in csv/xml - Support of Bi-fuel,Dual-fuel,Electric vehicles ***************************************************** PRO features: (requires enabling PRO mode) ***************************************************** - Dropbox support for auto-backup and import/export - Multiple currency support with exchange rates - Trip management - Advanced customization (road types, driving style, trip type, clients, tags, etc...) - Print any screen with ease to Google Cloud Print ********************************** How to enable PRO mode? ********************************** -> Buy My Cars Pro Key app -> Enable adds in Go Pro Menu ************************** Detailed features set: ************************** - Refuels can be entered either with trip distance or odometer - Refuels can be used with either fuel price or refuel cost - Diverse types of refuels (full/partial,missed,partial with gauge,etc...) - Support of bi-fuel cars (LPG/CNG) - Support of dual-fuel cars (flexfuel). 2 options: manual blend gasoline + ethanol (for Brazil) and standard E85, Exx, etc... - Support of most worlwide units (full UK support for instance) - Support of a different unit of distance by car. Please enable this option in advanced parameters. That way you can have one car in miles and a second one in kilometers - Charts with filter by car and/or date range. Easy editing of data in the charts. - Maintenance records management with reminders - Bill records (insurance, parking, etc...) with reminders - Distance statistics: total distance, distance/year, distance/month, distance/day - Cost statistics: cost per category (refuel,bill,services). Cost/distance, cost/year, cost/month, cost/day, etc... - Fuel efficiency statistics - Report with best/worst fuel efficiency. Easy to track under which conditions you were good or bad. - Fuel quantity units: US Gallons, Imperial gallons and liters - Many fuel efficiency units - Many currency codes - Export/import in CSV/XML format - Quick refuel widget with the ability to use the picture of your car - My Cars launcher widget with different icons (car, bike, etc....) - Automatic/Manual backup of data (through export) ***************************** Support: ***************************** If you have any question(bug, support, new features), please contact support by email. ********************************* My Cars - Social networks ********************************* https://www.facebook.com/pages/My-Cars/198039030229278 https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/117688382581159052629/ https://twitter.com/davagdroid ********************************* Permissions ********************************* - Location: used for trip tracking of start/end location. Can be disabled in settings - Internet access: used to store backups to Dropbox, to load exchange rates - Access SDCard: used to store local auto-backups

description: This app will help healthcare students and professionals to develop and consolidate their drug calculations skills. The topics covered by the app follow a flexible simple-to-complex sequence of calculations starting with the basic solid and liquid calculations and calculations with different units to the more complex calculations of drug percentages and drip and infusion rates. Within each topic there are worked examples showing you how to perform the calculations, which are followed by interactive exercises to enable you to practice your skill. Each topic finishes with a mini-quiz to enable you to self-assess your ability to perform the calculations. The topics can either be accessed in order from start to finish or on their own if only a refresher is needed.

Evil creatures are threatening the peace of our land, by attacking the king's castles. An unnamed hero is summoned to defend the reign, but will he be able to accomplish this task? Test your skills in this castle defense game. Follow the story of your hero, becoming a legend among his people! A lot of action, featuring: - 2 different game modes, and 4 difficulty levels - A funny and exciting storyline - 20 levels to prove your skills - Earn money to buy castle, weapon and special upgrades - Creatures, mini and final bosses, with different strengths and weaknesses - Thousands of different weapon combinations - Unique sound effects and music - Global leaderboards shared with Windows Phone users - ... and much more! To play just drag anywhere on the screen to fire your weapon. Check enemies information to know their strength or weakness. Get bonus gold by performing longer shots! Feel free to report any problem, bug or suggestion to my e-mail address. This lite edition allows to play the first 8 levels without limitations, buy the game to unlock all the levels and remove ADs! If you like the game, rate it! And have fun!

Family Emergency Medical Information A simple to use medical chart for storing important medical information for the whole family. Do you need a medical information tracker to help you remember all the medical information for your family? Does someone in your family have chronic health conditions? Do you have trouble keeping allergies and medication details apart for all of your family members? FEMI is the perfect solution to easy your mind and help remember health care information for your entire family. FEMI lets you store and quickly identify the following information: • Emergency contact numbers, insurance details, and physician information • Medications and Pharmacy details. • Health conditions • Surgeries allergies and family health history • Enter height and weight • Eye color, hair color and a photo to help identify family members in an emergency • Email health record FEMI Pro will be coming soon. If you like FEMI be sure to check out FEMI Pro. FEMI Pro will have additional tracking capabilities as well as be ad free. This application has been tested on: LG G2x ASUS Transformer Samsung Galaxy S Feedback is appreciated. For support please emai: support@a5software.com Please provide a description of the problem you are having.
release_text: Added Immunizations Added Dental visits Added Secondary Pharmacy Change some images

description: We like to think Plurk as a social network for weirdos - the cool, uncompromising and loving community for misfits we all long to have. Some of the largest communities for cosplayers, knitters, anime lovers, gay and etc found their voice on Plurk. And for that we are proud. We want to build Plurk not only a great community, but also a new kind of social destination that approaches human connection differently. Our users value privacy more than users of other social networks. You don't necessarily have to use real names, reveal your gender, location, or even age to the public. We talk funny. We are easily amused and at times, easily offended. With the first-ever newly released official mobile app, Plurk aims to bring a new kind of conversation and interaction to the social network world. It's not perfect. But please do try to install and use it with anyone you know. Enjoy a pleasant and great conversation experience in the social world without worrying leaking out your privacy. Stay tuned, more to come!

description: LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager App Der LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager ist ab sofort als App verfügbar. Das sehr beliebte Fantasy-Game von Österreichs größtem Sportportal kann ab jetzt auch mobil gespielt werden. Die Zeit der faulen Ausreden, wie z.B. „Vergessen das Team aufzustellen“ ist somit vorbei. Jetzt bist du gefordert! Manage dein Team zum Erfolg und hol dir den Gesamtsieg. Hast du das Zeug zum Bundesliga Manager? Das Ziel beim LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager ist es, durch eine gute Transferpolitik und Transfertaktik aus allen Bundesliga-Spielern eine Mannschaft zusammenzustellen, deren Spieler in den einzelnen Runden möglichst hohe Spielerbewertungen erhält. Es gewinnt der Manager, dessen Mannschaft über die gesamte Saison insgesamt die höchsten Spielernoten erhalten hat. Deine Aufgaben sind daher: • die richtigen Transfers zu tätigen • die richtigen Spieler aufs Feld zu schicken und so • dein Team an die Spitze zu führen Die Daten, welche beim LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager verwendet werden, kommen aus der umfangreichen LAOLA1 Bundesliga Datenbank und gewährleisten somit einen realistischen und spannenden Spielverlauf. Die Performance der Spieler wird anhand von 50 Einzel-Kriterien (wie z.B. Zweikampfverhalten, Fehlpässe, Torschüsse, etc.) errechnet. Der Marktwert der Spieler verändert sich aufgrund dieser Spieler-Bewertung. Dieses Ineinandergreifen von Realität und Fantasy-Sport macht den ganz besonderen Reiz aus und garantiert neben Spaß auch jede Menge Spannung beim Verfolgen seiner „Schützlinge“ im realen Spielerleben. Wichtige Info: Um die LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager App nutzen können, bitten wir dich kurz, dass du in unseren LAOLA1 Club beitrittst. Mit dem neu gestarteten LAOLA1 Club kannst du dann die gesamte LAOLA1-Welt uneingeschränkt und kostenlos nutzen. Eine Registrierung ist verpflichtend, jedoch absolut kostenlos. Bist du einmal auf deinem Endgerät eingeloggt, kannst du die App uneingeschränkt und ohne weiteres Log-In nutzen. Als bestehendes LAOLA1 Club Mitglied kannst du dich in der App mit deinen bereits vorhandenen Daten einloggen. Wir freuen uns auf dein Feedback und garantieren dir schon jetzt, dass wir sämtliche wertvolle Meinungen mit großer Sorgfalt innerhalb unseres Teams bearbeiten. Sportliche Grüße Dein LAOLA1-Team LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager App The LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager is available as an app now. The very popular fantasy game of Austria's biggest sports portal can be played on mobile now. The time of the lame excuses such as "Remember to set up the team" is over thus. Now you are required! Manage your team to success and get the overall victory. Do you have what it takes to Bundesliga Manager? The goal in LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager is to put together a team with a good transfer policy and transfer tactics from all Bundesliga players whose player receives the highest possible player ratings in the individual rounds. The winner is the manager whose team has received a total for the entire season, the highest of marks. Your tasks are therefore: • the right to make transfers • the right to send players to the field and so • to lead your team to the top The data, which are used in LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager, coming from the extensive LAOLA1 Bundesliga database and thus guaranteeing a realistic and exciting game. The performance of the players is calculated based on 50 individual criteria (such as tackles, bad passes, shots on goal, etc.). The market value of the players changed due to that player evaluation. This intertwining of reality and fantasy sports makes the special charm and guaranteed next fun and plenty of excitement in the pursuit of his "proteges" in real life players. Important info: To the LAOLA1 Bundesliga Manager app can use, we ask you briefly, that you join in our LAOLA1 Club. With the newly launched LAOLA1 Club you can then the entire LAOLA1-world use without restriction and free of charge. Registration is mandatory, but absolutely free. Once you are logged in to your terminal, you can use the app without limitation and without additional login. As existing LAOLA1 Club Member you can log into the app with your existing data. We look forward to your feedback and guarantee you now that we process all the valuable opinions with great care within our team. Kind regards LAOLA1 team

Fruit Life - a free game in the genre "" three in a row "" (match3), which will give many hours of pleasant and memorable experiences as an adult and a child. Fruit Life - three in a row in the genre of puzzle games and puzzles suitable for all, regardless of age and gender. This puzzle game will help you to relax or pass the time. It requires you to special care and ingenuity ensures all fans (three in a row) style games match3, good mood. Game is that you are given the job. Need to collect a certain amount of fruit in the allotted time. You have to collect three or more identical fruits, thus, they can clean up, both horizontally and vertically. Moving fruit, you need a finger. For this purpose, the fruit move in different directions as right and left, and, as well as upward and downward. Every time the player collects three or more fruits in a row, he gets points. To add time to collect more than four or more fruits in a row. More than collect a chain of identical fruits, the more time will be added. The game ends when a player ends up being. Compete with friends - earn more points overtake friends, find who is the best! The game is suitable for those who love the game in the genre "" three in a row "" (match3), who just want to relax and unwind, and for those who like to think! Fruit Life - three in a row is absolutely free and is a great puzzle style match3. Play Fruit Life - three in a row "" match3 "" the whole family!

Demolish the castle and topple your enemies! Castle Clout is the original catapult game with over 35 million plays online*! "Gives a unique twist that I think you’ll enjoy" - PadGadget ★★★★ Travel in time to a medieval battlefield and bring order to the lawless lands with your mighty trebuchet. Topple your enemies and destroy their strongholds with boulders, bombs, plagues and more! Smash through 150 epic levels of castle crashing action, then expand your kingdom with the powerful build-and-share level editor. Choose between classic tap controls and precision directional aiming as you adjust your angle and ammo to maximize the damage you inflict. The exciting physics-based play is similar to popular slingshot games but takes expert timing and strategy to master. BUILD AND SHARE LEVELS Build and share your own level designs! Build amazing structures using 3 different wall materials, then fill your creation with 6 kinds of characters. 150 LEVELS PLUS UNLIMITED SHARED MAPS Earn achievements on 150 challenging levels of medieval mayhem. Plus enjoy free access to unlimited community-created shared levels. Features: • Easy-to-use controls—just aim, set and launch • Build and share custom levels with 150 built-in levels • 12 special missiles including bomb, plague, glider and triple missiles • 5 enemy characters (queen, king, jester, knight and archer) and 1 friendly character (monk) • Plus 6 detailed backgrounds, a battle-ready soundtrack and fun enemy-squashing sound effects *To learn more about the Castle Clout story visit our website: www.castleclout.com

The official Android version of the board game designed by Néstor Romeral Andrés. Play with friends or against the AI... or challenge yourself with 250 Heptalion puzzles! The game: Heptalion is a special dominoes game played on a diamond-shaped board of 56 squares depicting 7 different symbols on them. The players struggle to place their domino tiles on the board. The last player placing a tile wins. The puzzles: Each puzzle challenges you to place all the pieces on the board. This app includes: - 4 different boards to play the classic game - Play the classic game on a random board - 250 puzzles -------------------------------------------------- Keywords: board game, abstract game, artificial intelligence, AI, puzzle.

VOA Learning English is a special program of Voice of America to help English learners all over the world to improve their English. This program includes stories, lessons, as well as news reports which are written by simple vocabulary and are spoken at a quite slow speed to help learners to understand them easily. This app is designed to bring you best experience to improve your English. You can read, listen and watch the lessons everywhere with your mobile devices. Even if you are already good at English, you can also learn more about American culture, history as well as latest news in the world. The contents are updated daily. 4500+ stories with audio and transcript, in 14 categories: * As It Is * American Mosaic * In the News * Education * The Making of a Nation * Science in the News * This is America * Words and Their Stories * Health Report * Everyday Grammar * Personal Technology * The Year in Review * What's Trending? * VOA Newscast 2500+ videos, in 9 categories: * Agriculture Report * Economics Report * Education Report * Health Report * Lifestyles * Technology Report * News Words * English in a Minute * Talk2Us Useful features: * Reader settings: customize background, text color, text size * Player settings: adjust audio speed, auto-repeat * Word lookup when reading stories * Save content for learning offline
release_text: - Add more video categories: English @ the Movies, English Grammar TV - Fix bugs

description: Die JagdFreund.at–App ist der ideale Begleiter für Jägerinnen, Jäger und Freunde der Jagd. Sie enthält wesentliche Informationen und vereint nützliche Funktionen rund um das Thema Jagd. Das liebevoll gestaltete Design ist übersichtlich und die Bedienung der App ist sehr einfach. Die App beinhaltet Wetterdaten, Jagdsignale, einen (Mond-)Kalender und ein Tagebuch. Außerdem werden die Jagdzeiten mehrerer europäischer Länder angezeigt. JAGDSIGNALE. Die App bietet neben den Signalen zum Anhören auch Noten und Text. Die Jagdsignale wurden von Markus Bachmann (Jagdhornakademie) eingespielt. Alle Jagdsignale gibt es auch als Musik-Titel im Amazon MP3 Store. Viel Spaß und Weidmannsheil! The JagdFreund.at app is the ideal companion for hunters, hunters and lovers of hunting. It contains essential information and combines useful features on the subject of hunting. The lovingly crafted design is clear and the operation of the app is very simple. The app includes weather information, hunting signals a (lunar) calendar and a diary. In addition, the hunting seasons in several European countries appear. HUNTING SIGNALS. The app offers the signals to listen also notes and text. The hunting signals were recorded by Markus Bachmann (Jagdhorn Academy). All hunting signals is also available as a music title in Amazon MP3 Store. Have fun and good hunting!

M-Thai Handwriting เป็น Application ในกลุ่มของ M-Series ของบริษัท นีสเตอร์ จำกัด เพื่อเปิดให้ใช้บริการฟรี โดยอยู่ในหมวดหมู่ Education พัฒนามาเพื่อส่งเสริมการเรียนรู้ ฝึกฝน การคัดลายมือ การเรียนรู้จักคำอ่าน คำพูด ของอักษร ตัวเลข ต่าง ๆ ประกอบไปด้วย - ก ไก่ ถึง ฮ นกฮูก - เลขไทย - เลขอารบิค - a ถึง z (ตัวพิมพ์เล็ก) - A ถึง Z (ตัวพิมพ์ใหญ่) โดยเด็ก ๆ สามารถที่จะคัดลายมือตามเส้นประที่วางไว้ได้ด้วย นอกจากนี้ คุณพ่อคุณแม่ หรือผู้ใหญ่ สามารถที่จะตั้งค่าตัวอักษรให้ใหญ่ขึ้นหรือเล็กลง ให้เหมาะกับขนาดของอุปกรณ์มือถือ หรือแท็บเล็ตของท่านเองได้อย่างสะดวกสบายในเมนู การตั้งค่า อีกทั้งยังสามารถเพิ่มขนาดเส้นดินสอ และสีของดินสอในการคัดลายมือได้อีกเช่นกัน ทาง Develop+ หวังเป็นอย่างยิ่ง ว่าโปรแกรมนี้จะเป็นประโยชน์ต่อการเรียนรู้ของเด็ก ๆ โดยเฉพาะในระดับอนุบาล หรือระดับที่เพิ่งจะเริ่มศึกษาการคัดลายมือตัวอักษรต่าง ๆ ได้ นอกจากนี้ หากทางคุณพ่อ คุณแม่ หรือผู้ใหญ่ท่านใด มีความต้องการแนะนำ เสนอแนะ ติชม ต้องการปรับปรุงสิ่งใด ๆ บนโปรแกรมนี้ สามารถแจ้งผ่าน http://www.facebook.com/DevelopPlus หรือ admin@developplus.net ได้ทันทีเลยครับ และหากท่านใดต้องการแนะนำ หรืออยากได้โปรแกรมสำหรับส่งเสริมการเรียนรู้ใด ๆ ของเด็ก ๆ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นในระดับใดก็ตาม สามารถแนะนำเราผ่านทาง facebook หรืออีเมล ได้เช่นกันครับ ทางเรายินดีที่จะสนับสนุนเด็กไทย ให้มีความสามารถ หรือเพิ่มการเรียนรู้ให้ดียิ่งขึ้น ตลอดไปครับ

Eureka! An application that lets you personalize your baby album and order it online. By answering the questions about your child’s development and slotting in your best pictures, you will see your baby album take shape on your mobile device. Your baby photos are on your computer? No problem: our app lets you access them directly, no transferring or downloading required. We know your time is valuable, and our app is designed specifically for today’s young parents. The digital version is free; printed albums are available starting at $14.99. Your baby book will be printed and bound by Canada’s leader in photo books, PhotoInPress. Unlike baby albums sold in bookstores, you get: • Your baby’s name and photo on the cover, rather than something generic. • Pages in your image. Only print the pages relating to your own experiences, instead of ending up with blank pages. • Perfectly framed pictures, without having to measure or crop. • No questions left unanswered. Remove the questions you don’t want, rather than leaving empty spaces. • Texts that reflect who you are. Modify the titles and questions as desired, rather than keeping texts that aren’t your style. • Possibility of printing several copies, to give as gifts. The PhotoInPress Baby Album is adapted to the schedule of a new parent. Your album takes shape as the months go by and accompanies you in your daily activities, at home, at the park, or at the pediatrician's. Because baby's world is so vast, this album has been designed to cover all aspects of your baby’s daily life. Dozens of pages are grouped under 7 main headings: • Pregnancy • Birth • Homecoming • Baby's world • Firsts • Celebrations • Retrospective Visit our web site for more details: http://www.photoinpress.ca/baby-album
release_text: You can now move pages and change the page order in your album!

description: Pocketbooth turns your Android device into a vintage photobooth. Meticulously designed to emulate the experience of a 1950s-era Model 11 Photobooth, Pocketbooth is as beautiful to look at as it is fun to use. Pocketbooth perfectly replicates the intimacy, spontaneity, and hilarity of a traditional photobooth. Take it to your next party and watch as your friends strike a pose.

Embark on your own treasure hunt in this beautifully designed classic point and click adventure game. Explore old trails, puzzles, and structures left behind by a castaway crew as you hunt for their lost pirate ship that was blown on to an island centuries ago. Uncle Henry has been hunting lost treasures for as long as you can remember. His stories of adventure excited your imagination as you were a child growing up. Now with your newly acquired archeology skills, he has been reaching out from time to time for your help in tracking down some of these difficult to find treasures. In his latest quest, he has been hunting for the treasure map known to be in the lost pirate ship "Queen Anne's Revenge". Thought to have sunk off the coast of the American shores, Uncle Henry has discovered new information that the ship was really blown on to an island when it was caught in a hurricane while sailing through Caribbean waters. You must hurry and help him on this amazing adventure before anyone else finds the location of the lost ship! This captivating adventure game has: - Custom designed beautiful HD graphics! - Custom composed soundtrack and sound effects! - A built-in hint system for when you get stumped - A dynamic map to show the screens you have visited and current location - A camera that takes photos of clues and symbols as you discover them - Dozens of puzzles, clues, and items - Auto saves your progress - Available for phones and tablets! - Translated to 16 languages! Visit our website to sign up for our newsletter and learn about upcoming games! www.lonewolfgames.net Desperately stuck in the game? Watch the full game walkthrough video: http://youtu.be/H4sVekv6QJU
release_text: - Added Android immersive full-screen layout - The map now loads with current location shown

description: Tired of all the same flappy and floppy games? Well, strap on your diapers and toot your way through the obstacles in Toot Da Baby, a raucous, flappy blast of fun. You’ll have a gas navigating Toot through the crayons in your quest to reach the top of the leaderboards. Just don’t fall, or Toot will have a tantrum! Make your friends whine and cry as you beat their high scores in this endless flappy tapper. This isn’t your typical flappy game - not a single bird was harmed in the making of this app. Toot Da Baby features cool 8-bit graphics, “Flappy” tap controls, challenging gameplay, and mPoints. Fun Facts: Babies are born with 300 bones while adults have 206. These fuse together as the baby ages. A healthy baby will go through approximately 12 diapers a day. An average baby toots between 14-20 times a day.

Apprenez quelles sont les périodes les plus favorables à la pêche selon la théorie solunaire. Gratuit et avec une interface conviviale Pêche - Calendrier Solunaire de Clear Fishing vous aide à: découvrir rapidement quelles sont les meilleures périodes de nutrition des poissons durant un mois apprendre des détails pour chaque jour, chaque lieu, en un seul clic (les meilleures heures de pêche, le lever et le coucher du soleil, les phases de la Lune) apprendre les prévisions météo sur deux semaines, a n’importe quel endroit voulu identifier de nouveaux lieux de pêche par la recherche directe sur la carte ou d’après le nom du lieu de pêche (intégration Google Maps) sauver ses lieux préférées afin de les retrouver plus facilement Vous ne devrez ni interpréter des graphiques compliqués ni comprendre l’astrophysique pour utiliser les résultats de cette application. La présentation est intuitive et claire. Même si vous participez à une partie de pêche stationnaire, à la carpe, au carnassier ou à la mouche, optimisez vos chances pour une partie réussie avec Pêche - Calendrier Solunaire de Clear Fishing . Organisez intelligemment vos parties de pêche ! Clear Fishing est un développeur européen spécialisé dans les applications mobiles dédiées à la pêche sportive en eaux douces. Notre équipe est formée de pêcheurs de compétition, consultants, journalistes spécialisés, graphistes, animateurs, photographes, éditeurs et programmateurs de plus de six pays. Depuis plus de 10 ans nous offrons aux pêcheurs avec passion des magazines, guides, événements, et compétitions, foires et expositions, sites web, applications mobiles, etc. Si vous voulez obtenir plus d 'information sur les techniques de pêche, montages, appâts, fils, nœuds, conseils et trucs, découvrez les autres applications promues au niveau international par la marque Clear Fishing. Nous avons soigneusement conçu et structuré toutes les informations pour que vos futures parties de pêche soient un vrai succès.

Viking Invaders have setup camp in your lands, each Viking Clan must fight for survival. Inspired by the 1984 classic Viking Raiders on ZX Spectrum Up to 4 Clans battle it out to until 1 is left to claim victory! Play against the CPU or other humans in a multiplayer turn-based strategy game. Viking Invaders is a war game for 1 to 4 players . Move your Viking Clan from their castles, fight with swords, fire catapults, board boats and sail down the Fjords, attack enemy castles, seize gold from treasure chests. Choose from Wotan the Wicked, Brunhilda the Bold, Egbert the Excerable or Odin the Odious and fight against your opponents. Features: ★ Up to 4 Players can play ★ Tablet Size Screen Recommended - 7 or 10 inch ★ Unlimited Maps Completely random generated - no 2 maps the same. ★ Boats can be used to transport armies across the Fjord. ★ Catapults may be fired once only each turn, after selecting the direction and distance. ★ Drinking Horns: Beware the evils of drink! If a Viking walks into (and empties) a drinking horn they will become uncontrollable! If the enemy meets one of your drunks they will succeed in getting them to join forces against you. ★Treasure Chests: Each HUMAN player starts the game with a Gold hoard of 50 coins. Depending on your financial situation at the time, you can buy one boat and one catapult each turn, and as many armies as will fit in the space around your castle. You can increase your spending power by carrying treasure from a treasure chest to your castle. INSTRUCTIONS ============ Generally the controls and gameplay is quite straightforward. There are 3 phases. Phase 1: [Buying] - Buy Vikings, Catapults and Boats using the space around your Keep / Castle. Phase 2: [Moving] - Cycle through the units, selecting a Direction and Distance to move. Phase 3: [Fighting / Firing] - If the Viking encounters an enemy they fight. A win will give the viking an XP point (yellow symbol beside Viking) Winning: To win you must use Vikings to attack the bottom half of enemy's castle. Once defeated the enemy's units will all join forces with you, and the enemy castle will be destroyed. To get the most our the game you should play on large screen tablet 7" or larger with other Humans...Like a boardgame. Controls ------------ [Moving / Firing] 8-directional touch selector with distance buttons for movement of units and firing of catapults. [Numbers 1 to 9] Distance of movement squares or firing distance. [Skip] This option allows you move to next viking [MAX] A unit will move as far as possible along a direction until they collide with an object [MAX] (Catapult Firing) When firing a catapult, if MAX is used the catapult will fire between 10 and 20 spaces in distance. (Distance is Random) [End Turn] This will end the current selection and move on to boats and catapults (if present) before ending the turn and moving onto the next player. Unit Types --------------- Vikings - Simply select a direction and distance to move. Jarls - Veteran warriors - a Viking must win 2 fights to become a Jarl (Orange icon next to Viking indicates a Jarl) Catapult - Move the same as Viking plus select direction and distance to fire. Careful though as Catapults can be destroyed by enemy vikings if they attack it. Longboats - You must have a viking sitting in a boat to be able to move it. Boats can transport up to 3 vikings across water. Tip: Lining up boats forms a makeshift bridge. *** UPDATES WILL BE ADDED OVER TIME *** Feel free to offer suggestions to the game while reviewing...

Welcome to the Go Camping BC App! Discover Our Parks! Go Camping BC – This Provincial Parks Visitor’s Guide App is here to help you plan your next camping vacation or recreational adventure in BC Provincial Parks. With over 200 locations featured, the Go Camping BC App provides updated and comprehensive information and continues to be your go-to travel companion when visiting BC Provincial Parks. Features: British Columbia Provincial Park locations Park locations on maps Driving directions to the parks View and search amenities & activities available for each park Reservation information Park service icons definitions Park Facility Operator information Loaded with "Must Knows" to help your camping experience The Go Camping BC App is your “Must Have” app to locate beautiful British Columbia Provincial Parks. Learn valuable information about the parks and what each has to offer. Once you have decided on your destination, utilize the mapping feature to get turn by turn driving directions through Google Maps. If you are not sure where you would like to go, explore the park listings with our app search feature. Select the region(s), the types of amenities, types of activities and see a list of parks that match your search criteria. The Go Camping BC App is loaded with useful information on how to make reservations, renting yurts and cabins and helpful Must Knows to make your camping experience enjoyable and safe! Having questions about a park? Utilize the Park Facility Operators directory for contact information to get your answers. See the handy Park Service Icons directory to learn what the icons represent. Share our app with friends by email, text, Facebook and Twitter so they too can enjoy the wealth of information included in this app. Download the Go Camping BC App now and go camping in BC today! The Go Camping BC App is a production of BP Society of Park Facility Operators developed in cooperation with Accelerate Communications Group Inc. ****Given the remote location of many BC Parks, coordinates to park entrances may not always be completely accurate. When you are in the area please watch for signage****

Use your Microsoft Windows PC as remote dialer for managing incoming and outgoing calls and for writing and receiving SMS messages. Look for missed incoming calls in your call log, read your SMS and use your phone contacts for dialing and creating SMS messages. All from your Windows desktop via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.... Ideal in conjunction with a Bluetooth headset. You can leave your phone in the docking station while managing your calls. The additional Microsoft Office integration allows simple dialing and SMS creation direct from Outlook, Word and Excel. Also look for the 15 day trial version "Remote Phone Call Trial". Simply the remote control for your mobile phone! CallCenter features (app running on your PC): - Shows phone contacts - Shows call log - Allows dialing contacts, call log entries and entered numbers - Writing and reading SMS messages - Contact search - Answer incoming calls - Popup for incoming calls and SMS messages - Manage audio settings - Hotkey for dialing numbers from the clipboard - Hotkey for accepting incoming calls - Handle "tel" and "callto" ULRs - Auto start at windows login CallCenter Microsoft Office integration: - Allows dialing selected numbers using the context menu of the text editor (Outlook, Excel and Word) - Allows calling email sender and recipients with help of contact information (Outlook) RemotePhone features (app running on your phone): - Auto start with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth - Acoustic signal on connect - Show connection status - Send or download client installation package to your Microsoft Windows PC System requirements: - Android 2.0 or higher - a Microsoft Windows PC (XP or newer) - a Wi-Fi (WLAN) environment or a Bluetooth* enabled PC - optional: Microsoft Office 2007 or newer *Supported Bluetooth stacks: default Microsoft stack, WIDCOMM stack The PC application CallCenter offers a programming interface (API), which allows developers the use of the remote control features within arbitrary own applications. The SDK together with a sample can be found in the subdirectory "SDK" within the installation directory on your PC. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@justremotephone.com ! We cannot respond to comments left on Google Play.
release_text: - new: Extended features for rooted phones (see www.justremotephone.com) - new: WiFi network filter for autostart feature - fixed: Answering calls not possible on Android 5.0 - fixed: Some special characters like # cannot be dialed - fixed: Client setup sometimes fails with DLL not found

Q: How do I faso message to appear as a message has been read? A: Very simple you just open the message and it will appear as read message. Q: Can I select the time that the message will be sent? A: Yes appears in the notification area of ​​the original message as an android. Q: In the android has a screen where you can view an entire conversation history with that person Issuer or the sender of the message, I do that with this application? A: Yes you can in the edit screen of the message in the "I am" score "Receiver" to mark if you had to get the message or "Issuer" as if you've been up sending the message to the person without actually being. Q: Is there a charge for "shipping" or receiving the message? A: No because the message is not sent by the network or the operator more so the application manually inserts the message in your inbox or output of your application, very important if you plan to show the message at a specified time not to uninstall or disable application before receiving the message. P: It is very good to stay with the icon of the "Fake SMS Sender" on mobile after sending a message, how can I solve this? description: La Croix-Rouge française vous offre une séance de rattrapage pour vous enseigner les gestes qui sauvent et tester vos connaissances. Téléchargez gratuitement l’APPLI QUI SAUVE de la Croix-Rouge française ! * Bien réagir en cas d’urgence * Vous êtes témoin d’un accident : savez-vous pratiquer les bons gestes en attendant les secours ? Les numéros d’urgence à appeler ? Utiliser un défibrillateur ?... La Croix-Rouge vous guide en situation d’urgence. * Vous former aux gestes qui sauvent* Intervenir en cas de malaise cardiaque, sauver un enfant qui s'étouffe, mettre une victime en PLS… Apprenez en images les réflexes de premiers secours et testez la progression de vos connaissances grâce aux quizz de la Croix-Rouge. * Vous préparer à la catastrophe* Inondations, tempêtes, tremblements de terre, irradiations… Nul n’est à l’abri d’une catastrophe. Avec la Croix-Rouge, mesurez les risques et préparez-vous pour mieux y faire face. * Où vous former* Recherchez les délégations de la Croix-Rouge les plus proches de chez vous par géolocalisation ou code postal pour vous inscrire à une formation officielle au secourisme ou devenir bénévole à la Croix-Rouge. * Soutenir la Croix-Rouge française* Les 10 000 secouristes bénévoles de la Croix-Rouge se mobilisent 24h/24 et secourent 60 000 personnes chaque année. Pour soutenir leurs actions, faites un don sécurisé par CB ou Paypal ! The French Red Cross offers up session to teach you the lifesaving and test your knowledge. Download free APPLI SAVING the French Red Cross! * While react in an emergency * You witness an accident: you know the right thing to practice while waiting for rescue? Emergency numbers to call? Use a defibrillator? ... The Red Cross will guide you in an emergency. * You form the lifesaving * Intervene in cases of heart attack, save a choking child, put a victim in pictures PLS ... Learn first aid reflexes and test your knowledge with up to quiz the Red Cross. * You prepare for disaster * Floods, storms, earthquakes, radiation ... No one is safe from disaster. With the Red Cross, measure risk and get ready to cope better. * Where are you form * Search the delegations of the Red Cross closest to you by geolocation or zip code to register for formal training in first aid or volunteer at the Red Cross. * Support the French Red Cross * The 10,000 rescue volunteers Red Cross mobilized 24h/24 and succor 60,000 people each year. To support their actions, made a secure donation by credit card or Paypal!

Create powerful black holes to guide your spaceship around 50 increasingly fiendish levels, in this addictive space physics game. Use the unique control system to test your skill by collecting stars and avoiding crashing into planets. Simple to pick up, tricky to master. See if you can beat the high score set by the Stone Baked Games resident Ninja. Contact us if you do! ** Congratulations to Bob for being the first to beat the Ninja score, with 530014 ** Runs smoothly even on low power phones. Uses real Hubble Space Telescope images of the Eta Carina nebula, for added authenticity. See how the strong gravity of the black hole distorts the very fabric of space-time with the fancy background distortion graphical effect (for fast phones only, switched off by default for low-res phones). Try out the fun Christmas themed skin if you want to have a bit of festive cheer, any time of the year! Have fun just zooming around the practice levels for a more relaxing experience, or how about trying the supremely therapeutic multi-spaceship demo level. What crazy patterns can you come up with? Should work on everything from small screen, low-res phones up to large screen tablet devices. Please report any bugs so they can be fixed quickly.
