Accordion Solitaire, Patience card game This is a one player card game, simpler then Klondike or traditional solitaire, but still more challenging. Rules are very simple, to start all cards are laid face up in a long line. 1. A card can be moved onto the pile on the left if it is the same suit or the same value. 2. Likewise a card can be moved 3 places to the left if it is the same suit or the same value. To win you need to be left with just 1 pile. Why “Accordion Solitaire” ? Because all the remaining cards are squeezed up to fill any gaps, like an accordion being squeezed to play a song. Its fun just dragging the cards around onto the valid stacks, however to increase your chances of winning its worth planning ahead and considering which moves lead to a more favorable line out. Either way its great fun, like our clock Patience card game we will show you which move to make and it is impossible to put a card in the wrong place. There is also a full auto mode, its great fun to watch the game play itself and also good to help you learn the rules. We include lots of different color schemes, 3 speed settings, full auto mode and a 2nd deck of Swiss style playing cards just for fun. Download it now, its simple, fantastic, just a little addictive and best of all its FREE.

If you have problems with installation, please try to remove Google Play application updates. If this doesn't help, try to install Geo Tracker with SD-card ejected. If you're looking for an excellent gps tracker, if you're a fan of action sports and long distance travel - this app is for you! Record tracks of your trips and share them with your friends! Geotracker can help: - making the reverse journey in an unfamiliar area without getting lost - tell your friends how to repeat your route - use someone else's route that is stored in GPX or KML - mark important or interesting points of your trip. The application is able to record, even when switched off. Very long tracks could be recorded without problems - you are limited by storage memory only. Recorded tracks are saved in GPX or KML format, so they can be used in certain applications such as Ozi Explorer or Google Earth. When showing track on the map, the application keeps device backlight, which simplifies track navigation usage. GeoTracker is based on public API of Yandex.Maps, so in trips over Russia and CIS countries you'll have the most detailed map of the area. Application can calculate track statistics - boldly show off your achievements to your friends :) GeoTracker calculates: - Max & average speed on the track; - Time and average speed moving; - Max & min altitude, altitude difference; - Vertical distance, ascent & speed; - Min, max & average slope; There are also some fine charts of speed & elevation; If you have a proposal how to enchance the application or faced some problem - please feel free to contact me: me@ilyabogdanovich.com . Thanks!

description: It is an evil time, when foul invading monsters lay waste to the lands of humans. Who will save the world from darkness and destruction? Suddenly, a spark of hope flares brightly in the all-encompassing gloom: the Lord of Magic has come! He is the only one who wields the power to stop the madness, defeat the creatures of chaos, and restore the balance! Description: Lord of Magic is a mix between RPG and Tower Defense game genres with a heavy dose of arcade action in a gorgeous fantasy setting. You are one of the last surviving sorcerers: both a keeper of long-forgotten arcane knowledge and a defender of the realm. You must use your magic abilities to crush your monstrous enemies and push them back whence they came. Only you can restore the peace! Lord of Magic boasts awesome innovations in mana presentation and spell-casting. All magic is controlled by gestures, from a simple swipe for a basic spell to the more complex patterns required for the lethal invocations known only to master sorcerers. As you progress through the game, you'll be able to learn new skills and spells in three different schools of magic to protect your lands from the monsters and villains who threaten all life. You are the wielder of the greatest power. You are the Lord of Magic! Features: • Master around two dozen powerful spells • Several passive skills to enhance your magic spells • 19 levels set in 3 fantasy lands • Face over a dozen fierce monsters with power levels and special attacks • Awesome innovation in controls [drag and aim with a chance of reflective damage] ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

Erfahrungsgemäß wächst mit der Vorfreude auf das Neugeborene auch die Anzahl der Fragen: Wann und wo muss ich das Mutterschaftsgeld beantragen? Welche Untersuchungen finden wann und wie oft statt? Wie kann ich mich in der Schwangerschaft fit halten? Diese und viele weitere Fragen beantwortet die kostenlose AOK-App. Darüber hinaus verfügt der Ratgeber über eine Erinnerungsfunktion, mit der Sie an wichtige Termine erinnert werden. Die Bedienung ist ganz einfach. Durch Eingabe des voraussichtlichen Geburtstermins berechnet die App alle weiteren für Sie relevanten Daten. Checklisten und wertvolle Tipps rund um das gesunde Leben in der Schwangerschaft ergänzen das Angebot. Natürlich bietet die App auch zahlreiche Literaturtipps sowie Informationen zu weiteren Serviceleistungen der AOK - Die Gesundheitskasse, wie z.B. der AOK Hebammensuche oder des AOK-Baby-Telefons. Mit der neuen Version werden weitere Funktionen und Inhalte eingefügt. Mit dem Bauch-Tagebuch können Sie jede Woche ein Foto Ihres Bauches aufnehmen und so die Fortschritte dokumentieren. Mit der Geschäftstellensuche wissen Sie immer wo die nächste AOK Geschäftsstelle ist. Auch lassen sich nun die Checklisten mit anderen Nutzern austauschen. Der Bereich Gesund Leben wurde um den Bereich Schwangerschaftsbeschwerden und Medikamente während der Schwangerschaft erweitert. Die hinzugekommenen Berechtigungen werden benötigt um Bilder aufzunehmen, zu speichern und anzuzeigen. Weiterhin funktioniert die Geschäftsstellensuchen und der Checklisten-Austausch unter Benutzung einer bestehenden Internetverbindung. Auch kann für die Geschäftsstellensuche eine automatische Lokalisierung genutzt werden, dafür wird jedoch der Zugriff auf Ihre gegenwärtige Position benötigt. You expecting a baby? Congratulations! AOK will accompany you during the most exciting time of your life. Now also with the mobile guide "AOK Pregnant" for smartphones. Experience has shown that grows with the anticipation of the newborn and the number of questions: When and where do I apply for the maternity benefit? What studies find when and how often held? How can I keep myself fit during pregnancy? These and many other questions are answered, the free AOK App. In addition, the counselor has a memory function that allows you to be reminded of important dates. The operation is quite simple. By entering the expected delivery date, the app calculates all other data relevant to you. Checklists and valuable tips about living healthy in pregnancy complete the offer. Of course, the app also offers numerous literary tips, and information on other services provided by AOK - The Health Fund, such as AOK midwives Search or AOK baby phone. With the new version more features and content to be inserted. With the abdominal Diary, you can take a photo of your abdomen and so document the progress every week. With the search for office locations, you always know where the next AOK's office. Also, it is now possible to exchange checklists with other users. The Healthy Living range was expanded to include pregnancy symptoms and medication during pregnancy. The added permissions are needed to take pictures, store and display. Furthermore, the branch and the Search Checklist exchange works using an existing Internet connection. Also can be used for offices looking for a automatic location, but it is the access needed to your current position.

description: Lire les nouvelles du Journal de Montréal en version électronique sur votre tablette numérique n’a jamais été aussi convivial! Le Journal de Montréal en version électronique sur tablette Android vous permet de lire les mêmes nouvelles que dans l’édition papier, où que vous soyez, quand vous le voulez! Avec la version électronique du Journal de Montréal sur votre tablette numérique, vous pourrez feuilleter le Journal ainsi que ses cahiers spéciaux comme bon vous semble, en plus de pouvoir agrandir certaines images et partager les articles que vous trouvez intéressants avec vos amis sur les réseaux sociaux! De plus, obtenez tous les privilèges VIP du JournaldeMontreal.com avec votre abonnement à l'édition électronique! Veuillez noter que vous devez avoir un compte Journal de Montréal pour pouvoir profiter pleinement de cette application. Pour toutes questions ou commentaires, veuillez communiquer avec notre service à la clientèle : jdm.services@quebecormedia.com Bonne lecture! Read News Journal de Montreal in electronic version on your tablet has never been so easy! Le Journal de Montreal in electronic version on Android Tablet lets you read the same news in the paper edition, wherever you are, whenever you want!   With the electronic version of the Journal de Montreal on your tablet, you can browse the Journal and its special sections as you see fit, in addition to enlarge some images and share articles you find interesting with your friends on social networks ! Plus, get all the VIP privileges JournaldeMontreal.com with your subscription to the electronic edition!   Please note that you must have an account Journal de Montreal to take full advantage of this application. For questions or comments, please contact our customer service: jdm.services @ quebecormedia.com   Happy reading!

description: Droid Info is a hardware information app for Android with detailed information about your smartphone including device, system, memory, camera, battery and sensor details. Hardware information is categorized into: – Device : Model, Manufacturer, Chipset, Build Number and Android OS version. – System : CPU architecture, Board, Number of Cores, Clock Speed, CPU Features, Governor and Kernel information. As well as current CPU Utilization, Total running processes, and clock frequency of each core. – Memory : Total and available RAM, as well as Storage information about your device. – Camera : Detailed information about the primary and secondary camera in your phone. Along with supported resolutions, focus modes and AntiBanding modes. – Battery : Health, current level, power source, temperature, voltage. – Sensors : All the sensors in your device with real-time testing. Permissions: INTERNET - permission is required to display help information which will be updated to show you the latest information about the app. CAMERA - permission is used by the app to display details about the cameras of your smartphone. READ & WRITE EXTERNAL STORAGE - to get information about external storage attached to or inserted in the device.
release_text: v 1.0.3 - Resolved issue with External Storage not detected. - Permissions to read/write External Storage added to resolve issue. v 1.0.2 - Added Baseband Version, RIL Version, Instruction Sets and Build Fingerprint. - Added support fore more devices.

description: Are you traveling to Toronto and you don’t want to miss any of the great places? Toronto Top 30 Sights is a perfect app for you then. It’s a travel guide powered with GPS, which will guide you to all the absolutely best places in this great city. You can browse 30 Toronto sights and places we picked for you, read complete background info about them or Toronto itself, check out photos and links to other places on web. GPS enabled Google Maps provide additional travel experience. You can locate your GPS position, and let the app guide you to the nearest sight, either by walking or driving to. It’s perfect solution if you haven’t planned sightseeing in details, and want to jump to the nearest interesting place. Just tap any sight on its map icon to get more info and GPS navigation to it. ***Version 1.2 - Now it is possible to move installation to SD card - Minor bugs fixed
release_text: ***Version 1.2 - Now it is possible to move installation to SD card - Minor bugs fixed

The essential 17 Day Diet app helping thousands with weight loss resolutions just got even better with a facelift, over 400 delicious 17 Day Diet compatible recipes plus an all new database to check if ANY food item is diet compatible! It's easy to go on a diet. It's hard to stay on one. 17 Day Diet Complete changes that. Just listen to what one successful app user says: “I love the app. Thank you for building it. I have lost 32 pounds so far!” Susan The physician-approved 17 Day Diet was created by Dr. Mike Moreno providing visible results in 7 days and weight loss of up to 12 pounds in the first 17 days. It’s not a fad diet, but a balanced eating plan that adjusts every 17 days so that your metabolism won’t slow down and you won’t get bored. There’s also no counting calories or feeling deprived because you’ll be eating lots of healthy foods. Normally while on the diet you’d have to keep track of the alternating food and exercise requirements yourself. But 17 Day Diet Complete does that for you. It’s a personal assistant that takes care of all the planning, food lists, recipes and workouts while you're doing the 17 Day Diet. Getting started couldn't be simpler and then let the app guide you through every step of the diet. Not only that but there's even amazing direct personal support to answer all your dieting questions and give you the motivation you need. So you can start immediately and confidently stay the course! Features include: •Quick-start diet introduction •Guidance through all four cycles •Direct personal support •Recipes •Shopping list *Diet compatibility food database •Exercise lists •Easy-to-use meal and workout tracker •Easy-to-read dashboard of daily needs and activities •Weight tracking, supporting standard and metric systems •Daily water intake tracker •Resource of 17 Day Diet essential information Plus we’re constantly improving the app and you’ll get free upgrades for life, so rest assured you’ll always have the best and most complete solution to losing weight on this diet. If you’re ready to be thinner and feel better, get 17 Day Diet Complete and start succeeding today! TESTIMONIALS: “I like the layout and how it organizes and explains everything to you. Also like the fact that there’s a shopping list included and the list of foods on hand so that you don’t have to worry about always referring back to the book.” “Thank you SO much. I love this app. Couldn't do this diet without it.” Christy “I’ve contacted the support team and they were always very quick to get back to me. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone looking to start a great diet with awesome results!” “I’ve had zero problems with this app. It has been such a helpful tool! I really love that it takes the guesswork out of what I should be eating everyday. I also love that I can record my water intake because I know by the end of the day I would lose count.” NOTE: 17 Day Diet Complete is in not affiliated or endorsed by Dr. Mike Moreno or Simon & Schuster, Inc., the publishers of The 17 Day Diet.
release_text: * New look * More recipes * Lookup ANY item

description: Blast mysterious creatures in this endless underwater arcade shooter! This app offers in-app purchases.  You may restrict in-app purchasing using your device settings. "Gorgeous and incredibly addictive." –SlideToPlay "The visuals are fantastic and the tranquil music is delightful" –AppAdvice, "It’s hard to describe the seductive power of its visual design." –ArcadeSushi "A game that deserves to stick around for a while to come." –148Apps SHOOT TO SURVIVE Pick your submarine and use weapons and power-ups to tear through relentless creatures like you’ve never seen before and battle against giant bosses! RELIC REVOLUTION Create rare and epic Relics to enhance your submarines stats and give you a fighting edge against the sea’s monsters. AN ENDLESS BEAUTIFUL ABYSS Combining a steampunk art style with neon-like 3D visuals, watch as your attacks fill the screen with color. A chilled-out soundtrack perfectly fits this action/arcade shooter. Game Features: •An endless shooter of beautiful visuals and arcade fun •Unique creatures and bosses •Six playable submarines •Nine power-ups to upgrade •15 ranks, 87 missions complete •Create and equip Relics to boost your stats •Compete with friends on Facebook Important Consumer Information. Патч для Sony Xperia Z/ZL/ZR c версией Android 4.3 (не актуально начиная с Android 4.4). У многих пользователей, в первую очередь абонентов Билайн, при наборе номера, не внесенного в записную книжку, после соединения вместо исходного номера отображается "Неизвестно". После звонка в журнале вызовов так же отображается "Неизвестно". Перезвонить по такому номеру нельзя. Проблема лежит на стыке ответственности операторов и Sony. Данный патч устраняет часть проблемы. После завершения звонка в журнале вызовов будет отображен набранный номер. Во время самого звонка надпись "Неизвестно" не исчезает. Если у вас нет такой проблемы, не устанавливайте данный патч. Root не нужен. После установки патч работает автоматически. Запустив приложение, вы сможете отключить/включить патч (например для проверки, устранила ли Sony проблему в будущем обновлении). А также сможете добровольно поддержать разработчика.) Разрешения: 1) Перенаправление исходящих вызовов: никакие вызовы не перенаправляются, необходимо, чтобы запомнить номер вызова, до того, как система зачем-то его сотрет. 2) Считывать состояние и идентификатор устройства: нужно знать, когда завершится звонок, чтобы после исправить книгу вызовов. 3, 4) Запись/просмотр в журнал вызовов: очевидно. 5) Отключение спящего режима: необходимо, чтобы телефон точно не уснул, пока операция записи в журнал вызовов не завершится. 6) Платежная система Google Play: чтобы дать всем желающим возможность отблагодарить разработчика:) Patch for Sony Xperia Z / ZL / ZR c version of Android 4.3 (not relevant since Android 4.4). Many users, especially subscribers of Beeline, when dialing is not in my notebook, after the connection instead of the original number shows "Unknown." After a call from the call log also shows "Unknown." Call this number to impossible. The problem lies at the junction of the liability of operators and Sony. This patch fixes a problem. After a call, the call log will show the dialed number. During the call of the word "Unknown" does not disappear. If you do not have this problem, do not install this patch. Root is not needed. After installing the patch works automatically. Running the application, you can enable / disable patch (for example to check whether Sony has eliminated the problem in a future update.) And also be able to voluntarily support the developer.) Permissions: 1) Redirect outgoing calls: No calls are forwarded, it is necessary to remember the number of the call to the system for some reason, it will erase. 2) Read the status and device id: need to know when the call is completed to fix after the book calls. 3, 4) Record / viewing the call log: obvious. 5) Disable hibernation: only if the phone is not exactly asleep until the write operation in the call log is completed. 6) Payment System Google Play: to give everyone an opportunity to thank the developer :)

Learn Swahili for free. Free language software to help you learn Swahili words and phrases as and when you need them. Surface languages Swahili has hundreds of essential phrases grouped into topics. An easy, fun and free way to learn Swahili words and phrases quickly and efficiently, and increase your vocabulary fast. Learn for free whenever you have a spare minute. Pick one of the many subjects and listen to the native speech, and use the flashcards or test yourself using the multiple choice screens. All words and phrases are recorded by a native Swahili speaker. Easy to use flashcard system. Multiple choice test to improve listening and reading skills in Swahili.

A detective mystery from Delight Games, the makers of Wizard's Choice and Zombie High! Download it while it's FREE. Your name is Jack Jericho. You’re a detective. But you don’t investigate cheating wives or crooked business partners. You investigate things that go bump in the night. When a beautiful blonde strolls into your office and says someone's trying to kill her, you smell danger. Too bad you need the money. Psycho killers, the mob, and even black magic. Can you solve this mystery and live to collect your fee? Detective's Choice is an RPG text-based adventure that will engross you in a story line while allowing you to make the decisions that will determine your fate. Story written by William Miller. *** Features *** - Super simple to learn with one thumb/finger touch control - Life, Rage, Cool, and Money are tracked - Score and rank at the end. - Accessible to blind users
release_text: Added an important link to the new Delight Games full library!

description: ★ Over 300,000 downloads of Inertia! ★ "Inertia: Escape Velocity is a shining example of what the little guy can accomplish in today's indie-friendly video game market." - Kotaku "quite possibly the most elegant physics-defying platformer I’ve played in a long time." - 148Apps "an entertaining outer space romp with plenty of replay value" - Modojo "As the game goes on and the pace increases, the sheer kineticism of it all is bound to win you over." - Pocket Gamer "The game boasts beautiful 3D graphics, smooth gameplay, and a comprehensive story line that will keep you coming back for more." - AndroidSpin Gravity is Going Down! You are Hermes, a high-tech scavenger who can turn his personal gravity on and off at will. Utilize your power to control Inertia to leap, hover, bounce, float, and zoom through intriguing challenges and deadly obstacles in this beautiful 3D platform game. ➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠ ★ AWARD-WINNING GAMEPLAY ★ Inertia: Escape Velocity builds on the award-winning gameplay that won Best Non-Professional Game, Achievement in Gameplay, Technical Achievement, and Gamers’ Choice Awards at DICE’s Indie Game Challenge 2011. ★ DEFY PHYSICS! ★ Manipulate gravity at will to float through levels, bounce off of walls, and negotiate challenges such as attractors, repulsors, accelerators, launchers, force fields, and more. ★ PLAY FREE! ★ Play through 15 incredible levels to try out your powers amongst an amazing variety of challenges. You can buy the full version from within the game at any time. ★ HD ★ The special HD version features incredible high-resolution graphics that take full advantage of your tablet’s display. ★ XPERIA PLAY Optimized ★ Owners of the XPERIA PLAY handset will enjoy Inertia with the lightning response of the control keypad. ★ EXPLORE ★ Investigate derelict space stations and junkyard planets to collect scrap and gain access to new levels. ★ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY ★ Over 35 levels of gravity-warping fun! ★ REPLAYABILITY ★ Win badges for speed runs and completion, collect scrap to unlock advanced levels. ★ SPACEBUCKS ★ A virtual currency you can use to buy stuff in the game. Yeah that’s cool, but this is cooler: you can get Spacebucks for free! Plus, they are from SPACE. ★ OPENFEINT ★ Integrated with OpenFeint for a great social gaming experience, complete with Achievements and Leaderboards. ➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠➠
release_text: This update includes: √ XPERIA PLAY Optimized √ Play Inertia in 8 different languages! √ Other minor game improvements and fixes. Happy ‘nershin’!

description: Roll balls into the grooved play area. Create groups of 4 or more of the same color. Groups are removed from the game, leaving you more space to work with. There is no need for fast paced action, you can play as fast or as slow as you like! Enjoy three difficulty modes, the 150 ball mode, bonus joker balls, cascading bonus points, multi-ball dropping tricks, and game play that is simple to learn, and polished to perfection. FEATURES: - Very simple to learn - 25 Levels to work through - 14 different balls, and a Joker Ball - Auto-save and auto-continue - Popping, Bouncing, Shiny Balls! - That "one more try" feeling!

The 511 SF Bay Transit Trip Planner makes it a breeze to plan your public transit trips on the go in the nine-county San Francisco Bay Area. This app also allows you to view scheduled departures from transit stops near points you specify, or near your current location. Features: - Interactive trip planner with fares - Filter trips by vehicle type and walk time - Agency announcements/advisories - Displays nearby transit stops - Scheduled departures from nearby stops - Dynamic zoom and scroll mapping - GPS locations - Saves recent trips and points automatically - Save your favorites This application has been developed by Mentz Datenverarbeitung GmbH for MTC's 511 Service. We welcome your feedback. To send us an email, please click the "Help/Info" button on your phone when you are using the app.

Call blocker. Calls blocking is now simple and effective! Blacklist Plus is an easy to use call blocker. You can add to the blacklist not only any contact or number from the calls and messages logs, but also the whole range of any phone numbers that begin with certain digits. Any numbers in any format, can be added to both the black and the white lists. Blacklist Plus is a powerful call blocker. By using the whitelist and the various modes of blocking, you will have the opportunity to define precisely the circle of people who can get access to you. The scheduling option will also let you set the hours you want blocking activated and will prevent unexpected night calls from bothering you. This call blocker also provides a whole range of options for managing the blocking, such as the option to block hidden numbers, as well as the option to turn off notifications and setup password protection (available only in the PRO version). Blacklist Plus is a perfect call blocker that can instantly hang up unwanted calls or simply turn off their sound, depending on what block method you have selected. No matter what your choice is, your phone’s call log will be cleared of all traces of the blocked calls. All the information regarding blocked calls is saved in the app’s log. You will be able to make calls without leaving the program. You can also turn off the calls blocking at any time, by selecting the appropriate block mode. If you don’t want others to know about your blacklist and to be able to view the journal of blocked calls, use the password protection function (available only in the PRO version). There are four block modes of call blocker: - Blacklist - All except the whitelist - All except contacts - All numbers Block method selection: - Hang up - Mute Other capabilities: - Whitelist - Adding a range of numbers into the black and white lists - Options for blocking calls - Blocking hidden numbers - Journal of blocked calls and messages - Setting up a password (available in the PRO version) Advantages: - powerful call blocker - very easy and stable - a user-friendly interface - a variety of settings FAQ: How to hide status bar icon? You can hide status bar icon by unchecking "show status bar icon" option in the "Settings" tab of the application. If you have any questions about the application, please let us know by e-mail: support@vlmob.com ------------------------- App type: Call blocker, Blacklist.
release_text: FAQ: How to hide status bar icon? You can hide status bar icon by unchecking "show status bar icon" option in the "Settings" tab of the application. 1.18: Bugs fixed.

Do you have a little ballerina about that adores dancing shoes and tutu’s? Then twinkle sprinkle some dancing delight into your little ballerina’s life with the Ballet Dancer Games For Girls Activity App! Your little ballerina will have a spectacular time playing with ballet puzzles, ballerina games AND interactive flashcards that have ballet dancers and play beautiful ballet music for your little ones delight in this ballet game app for kids designed for ages 2 & up. When you download the Ballet Toddler Activity App you’ll get a world of ballerina fun with: 8 INTERACTIVE FLASHCARDS W/ BALLERINA DANCER AND MUSIC 8 BALLERINA Puzzles 3 BALLET Match Games NEW Cupcake Fun Game Ballet Flashcards with BALLET DANCER MOVES and MUSIC The Ballet Dancer Games For Girls activity app features 8 awesome interactive ballerina flashcards! When your little one taps a ballet flashcard that shows dancers doing ballet moves including a pirouette, arabesque, attitude, pas de deux, and more the flashcard will take them to another page where the dancer is actually performing the ballet dance move! Then when they tap that dancer they will hear lovely ballet musicbox music and the name of the ballet move in French, as it used in the real dance world. It’s an interactive ballet games delight and age appropriate for everyone, especially first time app users, and playing with the ballet school games interactive dance moves will also encourage: -Early language skills. -Fine motor skills. -Ballet knowledge! Ballerina Puzzles The next layer of fun in the ballerina kids games free activity app are the delightfully adorable ballet puzzles that will keep ages 4 & up happy dappy! Little ballerinas will love the dancing puzzles that include a speacial Christmas Nutcracker puzzle AND a Halloween Ballet puzzle! And playing the ballet kid puzzles will also promote: -Fine motor skills -Reasoning and concept development. -Memory and recognition skills. -Hand eye coordination. -Early math concepts. -Color recognition and vocabulary. *Some other fun ways to let your little ballerinas under the age of 4 play with the puzzles also is: 1. Count the flowers, point shoes, crowns, balloons, and the other cute things in the pictures. Ask what color they are, what’s bigger or smaller, and what’s on the top and bottom of each picture. 2. Let them tap randomize, slide a few pieces and then tap the back button. This is a simple way to introduce them to using the ballerina toddler app, develop fine motor skills, and it’s very entertaining for them to see the puzzles scramble. Ballerina Matching Games The next layers of tutu fun in the girl ballet dancer games that are free activity app is the 2 different toddler ballerina match games! The ballerina match game and the ballet fun shoes & tutu’s match game are truly delightful, entertaining and designed for ages 2 & up, and playing these ballet dancing games will also encourage: -Recognition and memory skills -Fine motor skills Design Team: Nancy, Thomas, Deborah, Angelina, and Sam. Twirl and spin into some delight-filed ballerina fun with the Ballet Dancer Games For Girls Activity App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n’ Learn App! There is an AD FREE Version of this Ballet Dancing Activity App available on Google Play.

description: Test your algebra skills, and train the four basic mathematical operations. You can also choose if you want to separately train the addition, the division, the multiplication or the division. This app is useful for both kids learning the basic operations and adults willing to do some mental gymnastics. There is also a nice feature that will help you learn from your mistakes: if you click the wrong answer, you can be sure that the wrongly answered question will be asked you again soon, so you have the possibility to answer correctly the next time (and learn!).

You’ll be transferred to MANY DIFFERENT WORLDS as you play through SlotMax collection of slot machines. You’ll travel through the forest, meeting all that creeps within. You’ll go on an exciting fishing trip. You’ll experience cabaret with its cheerful girls. More than this! An industrious family of rabbit farmers, a saloon in a small Wild West town, and fruity cocktails at a beach party are also waiting for you inside. Each location has its own graphics and style, and is filled with its own characters. SlotMax team paid special attention to the each world’s BONUS GAME, which were uniquely created to fit the world theme, making the gameplay MORE INTERESTING, diverse, and engaging.
release_text: 4 new slots available! - In the world City of Gangsters you become a member of the mafia; - Wolfpack is a slot in which the gamer gets into the wood wolf clan. - In the new world London you'll travel with the little girl from Paris Tiny Journey. - In the new slot of Slotomax’s called The Builders you'll feel like a real builder working around cement mixers and workers in orange hard hats.

description: Pomotodo is a simple app based on Pomodoro Technique® and To-do List. With its beautiful and simple design, Pomotodo can help you to collect, process, organize, review and do. Start using Pomotodo today, Do Remarkable Work! Combination of two fo the most efficient methods of time management "Pomodoro Technique" and GTD (Getting Things Done) Use Pomotodo to manage your ToDo and record history, all of the data will be safely stored in the cloud, for you to use anytime, anywhere A complete collection of workflow management. Collecting ideas, Plan projects, Complete tasks, Review the history in one App

description: Loan Calculators (EMI Calculator / Eligibilty Calculator / Affordability Calculator) Calculate Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) for Home Loan/Housing Loan/Car Loan/Personal Loan easily in a smarter and easy way using EMI Calculator. You can calculate EMI by entering Loan amount, duration and Interest rate. EMI Calculator also features interest-principal chart with month-wise data. This app provides the user the detailed view of - 1.Interest amount/month . 2.Principal amount/month . 3.Total balance amount. This Smart and handy app is used to calculate EMI(Equated monthly Instalment ) of car ,home and other Loan entities. EMI Calculator / Loan Calculator is used for calculating the monthly EMI Payment . Main features of EMI Calculator : ✓ Easy and fast way to compute your EMI. ✓ You can share the details of your EMI using SMS/EMAIL. ✓ You will get the statistical information about the EMI. ✓ Calculate Eligiblity for Loan by its inbuilt Eligibilty Calculator. ✓ Calculate how much loan you can afford by using its inbuilt affordability calculator. ✓ Get best loan offers by submitting your request. For any type of Advertisement / Query / Suggestions contact me at harshtiwari4s@gmail.com
release_text: 1. Added Eligibilty Calculator 2. Added Affodability Calculator 3. Added rate functionality And some bug fixes Now it becomes a complete loan calculator !!!!!!

Welcome to Pipe Reversal, an easy and exciting puzzle game. It is never-ending struggle for the gas monopoly. Rules: Each player starts from different corners of the board. Touch valve of your color to rotate it clockwise. All connected pipes will be captured. When all opponent valves and pipes captured – you won! Features: - Easy to learn but need strategy to win. - Share your achievements with friends on Google+ - Multiple board sizes. - Multiple opponents’ skills. - Play against Android or your friend. Enjoy the game!
release_text: 1.5.56: - bug fixes previous versions: - improved graphics - added integration with Google+ - added achievements - updated AI logic

description: The perfect App for you to create Mirror Photo and Collage Photo. Do you want a photo look like your have a twin? Or do you want yourself repeat multiple times in one photo? You can try this app and make many different mirror effect photos. With Mirror Photo, you can do more than just mirror effect photo, this app also contains several frequent use photo editing tools. So totally there are FOUR main features in the app, and for each feature, you can choose photo from gallery to edit or apply the effect on the camera in real time: 1) Mirror Photo: -> Totally 50 different mirror effect, including left-right reflection, up-down reflection, 2*2 repetition and so on. -> More than 50 frequent use photo filters. -> Many nice photo frames. -> Easy to use, just touch to move the photo to adjust the reflection position. 2) Blend Photo: -> Blend two photos together in many different creative ways. -> 30 different blending ways, including left-right wave, two photo merge, one photo inside another and so on. -> Control the blending position or blending level by moving or pinching the photos. 3) Shape Photo: -> Create a square size photo with different shapes of mask, the mask can be filled with color or texture. -> Create a square size blur photo, but only the area within the shape are clear. -> More than 100 different shapes, including heart, flower and animals. 4) Collage Photo: -> More than 500 different collage templates for you to create collage photo. -> Adjust the size of each part of the templates. For all the features, you can also add photo stickers and text on the photo. We keep adding nice stickers and choose nice text fonts for you to choose. Should you have any question, feedback or suggestion. Welcome to contact us at: loloapps@outlook.com
release_text: *) Added more photo editing tools for shape editor. *) Added photo filters for photo collage editor. *) Keep the photo editing effect when leave/back the photo editor. *) Improve the photo preview page and fixed bugs.
